一个奋发有为的青年
yígè fènfāyǒuwéi de qīngnián
a promising enterprising youth
在众人眼里，他是一个奋发有为的好男儿。
Zài zhòngrén yǎnlǐ，tā shì yígè fènfā yǒuwéi de hǎonánr。
He is regarded as a promising boy.
我们所说的“小老虎”是特指我们的副班长王发奋。

The &quot;Little Tiger&quot; we\'re talking about is our deputy squad leader Wang Fafen.
他从小发奋苦读，长大终于成了有用之才！
Tā cóng xiǎo fāfèn kǔdú，zhǎngdà zhōng yú chéng le yǒuyòng zhī cái！
He studied hard when he was young and finally became a talented person.
他谱写的这段交响乐，发扬蹈厉令人振奋。
Tā pǔxiě de zhè duàn jiāoxiǎngyuè，fāyáng dǎolì lìngrén zhènfèn。
The short symphony he composed is really inspiring.
老师的表扬鞭策我奋发向上。

奋发进取

他以一种过度兴奋的不柔和的音调发表了演讲。
For her there was always a strange excitement in his presence of something about to happen.
Duì tā láishuō，tā de chūxiàn zǒngshì dàilái yì zhǒng qíguài de xīngfèn，hǎoxiàng shénme shìqing jiāngyào fāshēng。
对她来说，他的出现总是带来一种奇怪的兴奋，好象什么事情将要发生。
His knee injury was sustained while diving for a ball in last night\'s game.
他在昨晚球赛中的奋力扑救使得膝盖旧伤复发。
The buzz of excitement was so great that a formal denial was issued.
Rénmen xīngfèn de xuānnàoshēng tài dà le，jiéguǒ zhèngfǔ zuìhòu fābùle zhèngshì de jìnzhǐlìng。
人们兴奋的喧闹声太大了，结果政府最后发布了正式的禁止令。
每到周末，这里总会有不少父母来为自己的大龄儿女挑对象。
Měi dào zhōumò，zhèlǐ zǒng huì yǒu bùshǎo fùmǔ lái wèi zìjǐ de dàlíng érnǚ tiāo duì xiàng。
On every weekend, many parents come here to select boyfriends/girlfriends for their relatively old daughters/sons.
很多人选择周末去电影院看电影。
Hěnduōrén xuǎnzé zhōumò qù diànyǐngyuàn kàn diànyǐng。
Many people choose to go to the cinema to see films on the weekends.
周末，这里爆发了反战游行。
Zhōumò，zhèlǐ bàofā le fǎnzhàn yóuxíng。
An anti-war demonstration broke out here at the weekend.
周末我们一起去吃河鲜吧！
Zhōumò wǒmen yìqǐ qù chī héxiān ba！
Let\'s eat river fish this weekend.
这周末我们要去郊野春游。
Zhè zhōumò wǒmen yào qù jiāoyě chūnyóu。
We are going to spend our weekends in the countryside.
周末我们要去京郊赏春踏青。
Zhōumò wǒmen yào qù jīngjiāo shǎngchūn tàqīng。
We are going to the suburbs to enjoy the beauty of spring.
这个周末你有时间吗，我能否请你吃饭？
Zhège zhōumò nǐ yǒu shíjiān ma，wǒ néngfǒu qǐng nǐ chī fàn？
Are you free this weekend, can I invite you for dinner?
他每到周末都要和女友去看电影。
Tā měi dào zhōumò dōuyào hé nǚyǒu qù kàn diànyǐng。
He goes to see a movie with his girlfriend every weekend.
周末公司突然让他出差，他和女友的约会愆期了。
Zhōumò gōngsī tūrán ràng tā chūchāi，tā hé nǚyǒu de yuēhuì qiānqī le。
The company abruptly chose him to go away on a business trip at the weekend, so he delayed the date with his girlfriend.
妈妈答应这周末给我和弟弟做香酥鸡吃。
Māma dāying zhè zhōumò gěi wǒ hé dìdi zuò xiāngsūjī chī。
Mother promised to cook crisp chicken for my brother and me this weekend.
杰瑞总喜欢在周末与朋友一起去娱乐城。
Jiéruì zǒng xǐhuan zài zhōumò yǔ péngyou yìqǐ qù yúlèchéng。
Jerry always likes to go to the entertainment center with his friends on weekends.
周末，她不是购物，就是看电视。
Zhōumò，tā búshì gòuwù，jiùshì kàndiànshì。
If she doesn\'t go shopping at the weekend she\'ll watch TV.
周末百货公司将有大酬宾活动。
Zhōumò bǎihuògōngsī jiāngyǒu dàchóubīnhuódòng。
This weekend the department store is having a big sale.
周末的街头，行人穿行不息。
Zhōumòde jiētóu，xíngrén chuānxíngbùxī。
Endless streams of people pass through the streets at the weekends.
他们要去瑞士度周末。
Tāmen yào qù Ruìshì dùzhōumò。
They are going to spend the weekend in Switzerland.
周末我或者在家做饭，或者出去吃。
Zhōumò wǒ huòzhě zài jiā zuòfàn，huòzhě chūqù chī.
At the weekend I will either cook at home or go out to eat.
周末有个同学聚会。
Zhōumò yǒu gè tóngxué jùhuì.
At the weekend there\'s a get-together of classmates.
我想周末去爬山，如果不下雨的话。
Wǒ xiǎng zhōumò qù páshān，rúguǒ bú xiàyǔ de huà.
I\'d like to go mountain-climbing at the weekend, as long as it doesn\'t rain.
到上周末为止，我们收到了上千封求职信。
Dào shàngzhōu mò wéizhǐ，wǒmen shōudàole shàngqiānfēng qiúzhíxìn。
By the end of last week, we had received over a thousand letters of application.
周末我们去山上野餐吧！
Zhōumò wǒmen qù shān shàng yěcān ba！
Let\'s go for a picnic in the mountains this weekend!
他周末远足。
Tā zhōumò yuǎnzú。
At the weekends he goes hiking.
我只在周末有时间。
Wǒ zhǐzài zhōumò yǒu shíjiān。
I only have time at the weekend.
上周期末考试，小明考了个双百分！
Shàngzhōu qīmò kǎoshì，Xiǎo Míng kǎo le gè shuāngbǎifēn！
In last week\'s final exams, Xiaoming got two full marks.
周末。
原油期价比上周末有所攀升。
周末你去值班，过两天给你补假。
共度周末
周末咱们聚一聚，大家热闹热闹。

周末增刊。
this/next/last weekend
这个周末/下周末/上周末
My father spent the weekend topping the shrubs around the house.
Wǒ fùqīn zhěnggè zhōumò dōu zài xiūjiǎn fángzi zhōuwéi de guànmùcóng。
我父亲整个周末都在修剪房子周围的灌木丛。
This bar is always empty, but it comes alive on the weekend.
这家酒吧平时一直没人，但周末就热闹起来了。
On the weekends I always allow myself a drink with my friends.
周末时，我通常会让自己和朋友喝上一杯。
Carla is an office assistant, but on the weekend she works as a waitress in a restaurant.
卡拉是一名办公室助理，但周末时她会去一家饭店做服务员。
During the week I drink anything but apple juice. I drink beer only on the weekend.
我平时不喝苹果汁，只在周末时喝啤酒。
A big hurricane is expected to hit this weekend.
本周末将有一场猛烈的飓风袭来。
We packed so much in this weekend.
我们把这个周末安排得太满了。
Let\'s have a picnic next weekend.
下周末我们去野餐吧。
He\'s an expert boatman, and can be found sailing with his family almost every weekend.
他是个老练的船夫，几乎每个周末都和家人出海。
I\'m going to go to the market to buy some seed for my garden this weekend.
这周末，我要去市场给我的花园买一些种子。
The anti-terrorist squad arrested suspects and seized explosives over last weekend.
反恐怖部队上周末逮捕了嫌疑犯并缴获了炸药。

上周末，我们和朋友一起去打靶射击。

我这周末要去拍一套照片。
The files have to be sorted out at the end of this week.

他说玛丽也许周末会来。

我最好的朋友这周末会过来。

我暗自想，是时候享受一下空闲的周末了。
I saw nobody all weekend.
整个周末我连个人影都没见到。

这周末我不能去动物园了，还有很多作业要做。

It was a perfect weekend.
那是个完美的周末。
My aunt is putting me up for the weekend.

他们全天24小时营业，周末不休息。

周末请从侧门进出。

我们通常每周末都和父母吃饭。

你周末前应该能收到。

上周末我用完了三卷胶卷。

我们上周末在森林里宿营，那里到处都是苍蝇。

周末时我喜欢远离都市。

我们上个周末过得很愉快。

My favorite band is giving a concert this weekend.
我最喜欢的乐队周末时会有一场演出。

花多少时间我不管，但周末之前必须把工作做完。

上周末钓了很多鱼吗？

在周末

期末考试
qīmò kǎoshì
final (or end-of-term) exam
期末小结
qīmò xiǎojié
an end-of-term summary
上周期末考试，小明考了个双百分！
Shàngzhōu qīmò kǎoshì，Xiǎo Míng kǎo le gè shuāngbǎifēn！
In last week\'s final exams, Xiaoming got two full marks.
期末考试结束了，孩子们解绳松绑了。
Qīmò kǎoshì jiéshù le，háizimen jiěshéng sōngbǎng le。
The children will be relieved of their burdens when the exams finish.
这次期末考试是决定你是否留级的关键。
Zhècì qīmò kǎoshì shì juédìng nǐ shìfǒu liújí de guānjiàn。
The final exam is the key to determining whether you will repeat this year\'s work or not.
随着期末的临近，我们的学习日益趋紧。
Suí zhe qīmò de línjìn，wǒmen de xuéxí rìyì qūjǐn。
As the end of the semester is coming, our study is becoming more tense.
我想提调一下这位同学的期末考试试卷。
Wǒ xiǎng tídiào yíxià zhèwèi tóngxué de qīmò kǎoshì shìjuàn。
I want to use this student\'s test paper.
不要去打扰他了，他要为期末考试做准备。
Bù yào qù dǎ rǎo tā le，tā yào wèi qī mò kǎo shì zuò zhǔn bèi。
Do not disturb him, he needs to study for his final exams.
她俩期末考试并列第一。
Tāliǎ qīmòkǎoshì bìnglièdìyī。
They came equal first in the end of term exams.
期末考试她得了第一名。
Qīmòkǎoshì tā déle dìyīmíng.
She came first in the end-of-term exams.
他在期末考试中名列前茅。
Tā zài qīmòkǎoshì zhōng mínglièqiánmáo.
He came out among the top candidates in the end-of-term exams.
一学期的最末一天
yìxuéqī de zuìmò yìtiān
the last day of a school term
周末公司突然让他出差，他和女友的约会愆期了。
Zhōumò gōngsī tūrán ràng tā chūchāi，tā hé nǚyǒu de yuēhuì qiānqī le。
The company abruptly chose him to go away on a business trip at the weekend, so he delayed the date with his girlfriend.
20世纪末期。
期末抽考3门课。
期末考试
临近期末。
期末，校长向全体教职工述职
原油期价比上周末有所攀升。
the late Middle Ages
中世纪末期
the latter part of May
五月末期
Labor Day weekend usually marks the end of summer.
Měiguó láodòngjié zhōumò jiàqī tōngcháng shì xiàrì de jiéshù。
美国劳动节周末假期通常是夏日的结束。
The students panicked when told that final exams were less than a week away.
Dāng bèigàozhī lí qīmòkǎoshì bùzú yì xīngqī shíjiān le，xuéshengmen dùnshí gǎndào kǒnghuāng。
当被告知离期末考试不足一星期时间了，学生们顿时感到恐慌。
I could not manage to pass the final exam last semester.
上学期我没能够通过期末考试。
He failed in the final exam.
他没有通过期末考试。
They have a small cottage where they spend weekends and holidays.
他们在乡下有栋小别墅，可以去那儿度过周末和假期。
Chris and Celia suggested that they could organize an end of term dinner-dance both to raise money.
克里斯和西莉亚建议在学期末可以组织一场餐舞筹款。
Wahoo! I just passed my final exams.
啊哈！我期末考试都及格了。
To my surprise, my exam results are very good.
让我惊喜的是，我的期末考试成绩很好。
She messed up in the final exam.
她期末考试考砸了。
If you keep spending time on that stupid game you\'ll fail the final examination.
要是再把时间花在玩那个蠢游戏上面，你就没法通过期末考试了。
Terminal payments were expected at the end of the month.
Qīmò fùkuǎn yùjì huì zài yuèdǐ jìnxíng。
期末付款预计会在月底进行。
He aced the final exam without putting in a lot of effort.
Tā méiyǒu huāfèi tài dà lìqi jiù tōngguòle qīmò kǎoshì。
他没有花费太大力气就通过了期末考试。
The final examination has the weight in your grade.
Qīmòkǎoshì duì nǐ de fēnshù yǐngxiǎng hěn dà。
期末考试对你的分数影响很大。
The students were drumming before their final exams.
Xuéshengmen zài qīmò kǎoshì qián dōuzài tūjī xuéxí。
学生们在期末考试前都在突击学习。
Many students were preparing for their finals.
Xǔduō xuésheng dōuzài zhǔnbèi qīmò kǎoshì。
许多学生都在准备期末考试。
The library was packed with students studying for finals.
Túshūguǎn jǐmǎnle zhǔnbèi qīmò kǎoshì de xuésheng。
图书馆挤满了准备期末考试的学生。
She hurried back to the school for the final exam.
Tā gǎnhuí xuéxiào cānjiā qīmò kǎoshì。
她赶回学校参加期末考试。
I need some time to review for the final exam.
Wǒ xūyào yìxiē shíjiān wéi qīmòkǎoshì fùxí。
我需要一些时间为期末考试复习。
Some students had stolen the key to the final exam.
Yìxiē xuésheng tōu dàole qīmòkǎoshì de dá\'àn。
一些学生偷到了期末考试的答案。
Don\'t bother the professor while she is grading term papers.
Dāng jiàoshòu zhèngzài pīgǎi qīmò shìjuàn de shíhou，búyào dǎrǎo tā。
当教授正在批改期末试卷的时候，不要打扰他。
I fear the results of the final exams.
Wǒ dānxīn qīmòkǎoshì de jiéguǒ。
我担心期末考试的结果。
It is not surprising then that the day they like most is Friday. Friday is the end of the workweek and it is the beginning of the weekend.
难怪他们最喜欢的是星期五，星期五是工作周的结束，周末的开始。
删节号用在这篇文章的末尾，恰到好处。
Shānjiéhào yòng zài zhèpiān wénzhāng de mòwěi，qiàdàohǎochu。
It is just fine to put the ellipsis at the end of the article.
I need to write a composition about wildlife for homework this weekend.
我要写一篇关于野生动物的作文，这是这个周末的家庭作业。
东汉末年，天下大乱。
Dōnghàn mònián，tiānxià dàluàn。
The country was in great disorder during the end of the Eastern Han dynasty.
东汉末年，司徒王允使用连环计杀了奸贼董卓。
Dōnghàn mònián，Sītú Wángyǔn shǐyòng liánhuánjì shā le jiānzéi Dǒng Zhuó。
At the end of the East Han Dynasty, Situ Wang Yong killed the traitor Dong Zhou by using interlinking plans.
唐朝末年官僚乱政，国力衰退。
Tángcháo mònián guānliáo luànzhèng，guólì shuāituì。
In the remaining years of the Tang dynasty, the country was shattered by bureaucrats, and national power declined gradually.
他们家是清代末年南洋一带有名的富豪。
Tāmen jiā shì Qīngdài mònián nányáng yídài yǒumíng de fùháo。
Their family is famous magnate in the coastal provinces of Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Fujian and Guangdong during the remaining years of the Qing dynasty.
每年岁末年关都是我们单位最忙的时候。
Měinián suìmò niánguān dōushì wǒmen dānwèi zuì máng de shíhou。
The end of every year is the busiest time for our company.
明朝末年
Míngcháo mònián
the end of the Ming dynasty
今年夏末格外的爽气，不像去年那么难熬。
Jīnnián xiàmò géwài de shuǎngqì，bú xiàng qùnián nàme nán\'áo。
Unlike last year\'s terrible weather, it\'s unusually cool this late summer.
七十年代末期
qīshí niándài mòqī
in the late seventies
明季(明朝末年)
清朝末年。
元朝末年
康熙末年。
秦朝末年，陈涉率先起事。
The kids are doing a play for the end of year.
孩子们年末会表演一场话剧。
By the end of the semester, I will not fear math.
到这半学年末的时候，我一定会征服对数学的恐惧。
By the end of the year the fuel supply was still critical.
Nián mò，ránliào gōngjǐ yīrán bèishòu pīpíng。
年末，燃料供给依然倍受批评。
If layered in August, the new plant should be ready to move by late autumn or the following spring.
Rú zài bā yuè jìnxíng yātiáo chǔlǐ，zhè zhǒng xīn zhíwù jiù kěyǐ zài qiūmò huò láinián chūntiān yízāi le。
如在8月进行压条处理，这种新植物就可以在秋末或来年春天移栽了。
We will attend a formal at the end of the year.
Niánmò，wǒmen jiāng chūxí yì chǎng zhèngshì wǔhuì。
年末，我们将出席一场正式舞会。
The carry over is the open commitment at the end of the previous financial year.
上一财政年度末，我们做出了留存的公开承诺。
Two young musicians from the village performed a special concert at the weekend.
Liǎng míng láizì zhège cūnzi de niánqīng yīnyuèjiā zài zhōumò xiànshàngle yì chǎng tèbié de yīnyuèhuì。
两名来自这个村子的年轻音乐家在周末献上了一场特别的音乐会。
He has held large extravagant parties every weekend for five years.
Tā měi zhōumò jǔxíng shēchǐ yànhuì yǐ chíxù wǔnián le。
他每周末举行奢侈宴会已持续五年了。
英雄末路
yīnɡxiónɡ mòlù
a hero in dire straits
如果有一天你穷途末路了，请记得有我这个朋友。
Rúguǒ yǒu yìtiān nǐ qióngtúmòlù le，qǐng jìde yǒu wǒ zhège péngyou。
When you are at an impasse some day, please remember I am your friend and you can turn to me for help.
末路英雄
穷途末路。
在新修的路面上铺盖一层锯末。
末流演员
mòliú yǎnyuán 
a minor actor or actress
清末国势纷乱，老百姓颠沛流离。
Qīngmò guóshì fēngluàn,lǎobǎixìng diānpèi liúlí.
At the end of the Qing Dynasty, the state was under great disorder and people led a vagrant life.
这个流派渐入末流，早已后继乏人了
末流作家。
By the end of the weekend the killer\'s name will be on the lips of the Northern Irish press corps.
Jiézhì zhè zhōumò，shāshǒu de míngzi jiāng huì zài běi\'Ài\'ěrlán de xīnwénquān lǐ liúchuán kāilái。
截至这周末，杀手的名字将会在北爱尔兰的新闻圈里流传开来。
第五行末了的那个字我不认识。
Dì wǔ hángmòliǎo de nàge zì wǒ bú rènshi。
I don\'t know the last word of the fifth line.
点心被我吃完了，盘子里只剩下点心末子了。
Diǎnxīn bèi wǒ chīwán le，pánzi lǐ zhǐ shèngxià diǎnxīn mòzi le。
I ate all the snacks, and there was only some powder left on the plate.
如果有一天你穷途末路了，请记得有我这个朋友。

When you are at an impasse some day, please remember I am your friend and you can turn to me for help.
我用了一下午的时间把煤末做成了这些煤饼。
Wǒ yòng le yíxiàwǔ de shíjiān bǎ méimò zuòchéng le zhèxiē méibǐng。
It took me a whole afternoon to make this coal dust into coal cakes.
通过对格致的了解，清末的一些文人认识到了国家实力的不足。
Tōngguò duì gézhì de liǎojiě，qīngmò de yìxiē wénrén rènshi dào le guójiā shílì dì bùzú。
Scholars in the last stage of the Qing dynasty realized some deficiencies in national strength after they studied chemistry and physics.
周末，这里爆发了反战游行。
Zhōumò，zhèlǐ bàofā le fǎnzhàn yóuxíng。
An anti-war demonstration broke out here at the weekend.

In last week\'s final exams, Xiaoming got two full marks.
如果他来不了的话，那末我们就去他那里吧。

If he doesn’t come, let\'s go to see him.
切末已经准备好了，你就放心演出吧！

The simple stage property is ready, just go out and perform.
侵略者的末日终于到来了。
Qīnluèzhě de mòrì zhōngyú dàoláile.
The end had finally come for the invaders.
不要去打扰他了，他要为期末考试做准备。

报纸登载了9.11事件始末。
Bàozhǐ dēngzǎile jiǔyāoyāo shìjiàn shǐmò。
The newspaper covered the whole story of 9-11.
到上周末为止，我们收到了上千封求职信。
Dào shàngzhōu mò wéizhǐ，wǒmen shōudàole shàngqiānfēng qiúzhíxìn。
By the end of last week, we had received over a thousand letters of application.
等到大家都说完了各自的观点，末后我才发言。
Děngdào dàjiā dōu shuōwán le gèzì de guāndiǎn，mòhòu wǒ cái fāyán。
After people have all expressed their opinions, I spoke at last.
他把煤饼搬走了，地下只剩下一层煤末。
Tā bǎ méibǐng bānzǒu le，dìxià zhǐ shèngxià yì céng méimò。
He moved the coal cakes away, and there was only coal dust left on the floor.
他扭伤了脚，医生建议他用些末药，以便消肿镇痛。
Tā niǔshāng le jiǎo，yīshēng jiànyì tā yòng xiē mòyào，yǐbiàn xiāozhǒng zhèntòng。

快到月末了。
In a casino, you can cash in your chips at the end of the evening for a prize.

会议被延长到这个周末了，成员们对此感到焦虑。

你总是夸夸其谈，激昂演说，到末了后悔不已。

上周末钓了很多鱼吗？

She messed up in the final exam.
她期末考试考砸了。

整个周末我都因吃了迷幻药而异常兴奋。
I went for a fitting last weekend.
Wǒ shànggè zhōumò qù shì yīfu le。
我上个周末去试衣服了。

Tā zhěngjiùle gōngsī，háishì jǐnjǐn tuīchíle tā de mòrì？
他拯救了公司，还是仅仅推迟了它的末日？

我用了一下午的时间把煤末做成了这些煤饼。
Wǒ yòng le yíxiàwǔ de shíjiān bǎ méimò zuòchéng le zhèxiē méibǐng。
It took me a whole afternoon to make this coal dust into coal cakes.
他把煤饼搬走了，地下只剩下一层煤末。
Tā bǎ méibǐng bānzǒu le，dìxià zhǐ shèngxià yì céng méimò。
He moved the coal cakes away, and there was only coal dust left on the floor.
等到大家都说完了各自的观点，末后我才发言。
Děngdào dàjiā dōu shuōwán le gèzì de guāndiǎn，mòhòu wǒ cái fāyán。
After people have all expressed their opinions, I spoke at last.
他扭伤了脚，医生建议他用些末药，以便消肿镇痛。
Tā niǔshāng le jiǎo，yīshēng jiànyì tā yòng xiē mòyào，yǐbiàn xiāozhǒng zhèntòng。
He sprained his foot. The doctor suggests him using myrrh to alleviate the swelling and easing pain.
点心被我吃完了，盘子里只剩下点心末子了。
Diǎnxīn bèi wǒ chīwán le，pánzi lǐ zhǐ shèngxià diǎnxīn mòzi le。
I ate all the snacks, and there was only some powder left on the plate.
有各位前辈老师在这里，我只能陪个末座。
Yǒu gè wèi qiánbèi lǎoshī zài zhèlǐ，wǒ zhǐnéng péi gè mòzuò。
Since seniors and teachers are present here, I just take the least prominent seat.
如果他来不了的话，那末我们就去他那里吧。
Rúguǒ tā láibùliǎo de huà，nàmò wǒmen jiù qù tā nàlǐ ba。
If he doesn’t come, let\'s go to see him.
他们家是清代末年南洋一带有名的富豪。
Tāmen jiā shì Qīngdài mònián nányáng yídài yǒumíng de fùháo。
Their family is famous magnate in the coastal provinces of Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Fujian and Guangdong during the remaining years of the Qing dynasty.
这个周末你有时间吗，我能否请你吃饭？
Zhège zhōumò nǐ yǒu shíjiān ma，wǒ néngfǒu qǐng nǐ chī fàn？
Are you free this weekend, can I invite you for dinner?
他每到周末都要和女友去看电影。
Tā měi dào zhōumò dōuyào hé nǚyǒu qù kàn diànyǐng。
He goes to see a movie with his girlfriend every weekend.
这次期末考试是决定你是否留级的关键。
Zhècì qīmò kǎoshì shì juédìng nǐ shìfǒu liújí de guānjiàn。
The final exam is the key to determining whether you will repeat this year\'s work or not.
周末公司突然让他出差，他和女友的约会愆期了。
Zhōumò gōngsī tūrán ràng tā chūchāi，tā hé nǚyǒu de yuēhuì qiānqī le。
The company abruptly chose him to go away on a business trip at the weekend, so he delayed the date with his girlfriend.
切末已经准备好了，你就放心演出吧！
Qièmò yǐjing zhǔnbèi hǎo le，nǐ jiù fàngxīn yǎnchū ba！
The simple stage property is ready, just go out and perform.
如果有一天你穷途末路了，请记得有我这个朋友。
Rúguǒ yǒu yìtiān nǐ qióngtúmòlù le，qǐng jìde yǒu wǒ zhège péngyou。
When you are at an impasse some day, please remember I am your friend and you can turn to me for help.
随着期末的临近，我们的学习日益趋紧。
Suí zhe qīmò de línjìn，wǒmen de xuéxí rìyì qūjǐn。
As the end of the semester is coming, our study is becoming more tense.
请给我的面条里多加些肉末。
Qǐng gěi wǒ de miàntiáo lǐ duō jiā xiē ròumò。
Please put more minced meat into my noodle soup.
删节号用在这篇文章的末尾，恰到好处。
Shānjiéhào yòng zài zhèpiān wénzhāng de mòwěi，qiàdàohǎochu。
It is just fine to put the ellipsis at the end of the article.
今年夏末格外的爽气，不像去年那么难熬。
Jīnnián xiàmò géwài de shuǎngqì，bú xiàng qùnián nàme nán\'áo。
Unlike last year\'s terrible weather, it\'s unusually cool this late summer.
每年岁末年关都是我们单位最忙的时候。
Měinián suìmò niánguān dōushì wǒmen dānwèi zuì máng de shíhou。
The end of every year is the busiest time for our company.
小孩子哭闹着就是不吃药，我只好把药切成碎末儿、冲成水剂喂他。
Xiǎoháizi kūnào zhe jiùshì bùchīyào，wǒ zhǐhǎo bǎ yào qiēchéng suìmòr、chōngchéng shuǐjì wèi tā。
Crying, the little child just refused to take the medicine. I had to grind the medicine into powder and mix it with water before feeding him.
我想提调一下这位同学的期末考试试卷。
Wǒ xiǎng tídiào yíxià zhèwèi tóngxué de qīmò kǎoshì shìjuàn。
I want to use this student\'s test paper.
不要去打扰他了，他要为期末考试做准备。
Bù yào qù dǎ rǎo tā le，tā yào wèi qī mò kǎo shì zuò zhǔn bèi。
Do not disturb him, he needs to study for his final exams.
要抓主要矛盾，不要只盯着那些细故末节的东西。
Yào zhuā zhǔyào máodùn，búyào zhǐ dīng zhe nàxiē xìgù mòjié de dōngxi。
You must target the principal contradiction, rather than the trivial matters.
根据家谱的记载，我的先祖是清末一名举人。
Gēnjù jiāpǔ de jìzǎi，wǒ de xiānzǔ shì qīngmò yìmíng jǔrén。
According to my family record, my late grandfather was a second degree candidate in the provincial examination.
妈妈答应这周末给我和弟弟做香酥鸡吃。
Māma dāying zhè zhōumò gěi wǒ hé dìdi zuò xiāngsūjī chī。
Mother promised to cook crisp chicken for my brother and me this weekend.
东汉末，曹操延纳天下贤才，雄霸一方。
Dōnghàn mò,Cáo Cāo yánnà tiānxià xiáncái,xióngbà yìfāng.
At the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty, Cao Cao recruited a lot of talented people and set up a separatist regime.
清末，义和团在我国北方有很大影响。
Qīngmò，yìhétuán zài wǒguó běifāng yǒu hěndà yǐngxiǎng。
In the last years of the Qing dynasty, the Yihetuan had an influence on people in north China.
清朝末期官员营私舞弊，政治十分腐败。
Qīngcháo mòqī guānyuán yíngsī wǔbì，zhèngzhì shífēn fǔbài。
The corrupt officers during the last phase of the Qing Dynasty were engaged in fraud for selfish ends.
杰瑞总喜欢在周末与朋友一起去娱乐城。
Jiéruì zǒng xǐhuan zài zhōumò yǔ péngyou yìqǐ qù yúlèchéng。
Jerry always likes to go to the entertainment center with his friends on weekends.
每逢月末，我的工资都会支绌。
Měiféng yuèmò，wǒ de gōngzī dōuhuì zhīchù。
Everytime at the end of a month, my salary would be insufficient.
医生说我可能患有神经末梢疾病。
Yīshēng shuō wǒ kěnéng huànyǒu shénjīngmòshāo jíbìng。
The doctor said that there might be something wrong with my nerve endings.

Suǒyǒu de fùnǚ hé értóng dōu zhuǎnyíle，zhǐ shèngxià wǔzhuāng de wěizhuāng yǒngshì zài jiānshǒu。
所有的妇女和儿童都转移了，只剩下武装的伪装勇士在坚守。
勇往直前
yǒngwǎngzhíqián
take the bull by the horns
勇往直前
勇往直前。
勇往直前。
He would stop at nothing to achieve his goals.
为了达到目的，他会勇往直前的。
Don\'t be frightened to go at it.
Bié hàipà，yào yǒngwǎngzhíqián。
别害怕，要勇往直前。
勇士
yǒngshì
a brave and strong man; warrior
他是个敢于和党阀作战的勇士。
Tā shì gè gǎnyú hé dǎngfá zuòzhàn de yǒngshì。
He is a martial hero who dares to fight against party tyrant.
在他眼里勇敢的斗牛士才是真正的英雄。
Zài tā yǎn lǐ yǒnggǎn de dòuniúshì cáishì zhēnzhèng de yīngxióng。
In his eyes, courageous gladiators are the true heroes.
每当冲锋陷阵时，我们的战士都十分勇敢。
Měidāng chōngfèng xiànzhèn shí，wǒmen de zhànshì dōu shífēn yǒnggǎn。
Our soldiers are very brave in fighting battles.
战士们跟在这勇敢的人后面，一拥而上，一下就冲上山峰。
Zhànshìmen gēn zài zhè yǒnggǎn de rén hòumiàn，yìyōngérshàng，yíxià jiù chōngshàngshānfēng。
Infected with his courage, the soldiers surged after him and at once charged up the heights.
士兵们愈战愈勇。
Shìbīngmen yùzhànyùyǒng。
The more the soldiers fought the braver they became.
这个士兵因为作战英勇而受到嘉奖。
Zhège shìbīngyīnwèi zuòzhàn yīngyǒngér shòudào jiājiǎng。
The soldier was cited for his bravery.
战士们同仇敌忾，英勇赴敌。
Zhànshìmen tóngchóu díkài，yīngyǒng fùdí。
Sharing a bitter hatred for the enemy, soldiers fight against them with great bravery.
虎贲(像虎一样奔走逐兽，比喻勇士、武士)。
勇士
勇士。
义勇之士
招募忠勇之士，杀敌报国。
刚强毅勇的战士。
全军将士奋勇杀敌。
全营军士奋勇杀敌。
这些勇敢的战士令人钦佩。
勇敢的战士。
He is a valiant heart.
他是个可爱的勇士。
the brave spirits who pioneered
开拓的勇士们；开路先锋
The lawyers ultimately concluded that thirty-eight Sioux braves were guilty.
律师们最终断定38名苏人勇士有罪。
a brave man who died helping others
一个为拯救他人而死的勇士
The scientist is a constant warrior in chasing truth in physical science.
在物理学研究领域，那位科学家是为了追寻真理而不屈不挠的勇士。
A real warrior can keep cool while fighting a strong enemy.
真正的勇士能沉着冷静地应对强大的敌人。
All the women and children had been sent away, none but armed and painted braves remained.
Suǒyǒu de fùnǚ hé értóng dōu zhuǎnyíle，zhǐ shèngxià wǔzhuāng de wěizhuāng yǒngshì zài jiānshǒu。
所有的妇女和儿童都转移了，只剩下武装的伪装勇士在坚守。
It is not just the brave that go off to fight wars.
Búzhǐshì yǒngshìmen tóushēn zhànzhēng。
不只是勇士们投身战争。
He soon proved himself a redoubtable warrior, and won the respect of other soldiers.
Tā hěn kuài zhèngmíng tā zìjǐ shì yí gè lìng rén qǐ jìng de yǒngshì，bìng yíngdéle qítā shìbīng de zūnzhòng。
他很快证明他自己是一个令人起敬的勇士，并赢得了其他士兵的尊重。
Men feared him and women lusted after the handsome warrior.
Nánrénmen hàipà tā，nǚrénmen fēnfēn zhuīqiú zhège yīngjùn de yǒngshì。
男人们害怕他，女人们纷纷追求这个英俊的勇士。
They trained him to be a warrior.
Tāmen bǎ tā péiyǎng wéi yì míng yǒngshì。
他们把他培养为一名勇士。
Henriette saw the weaving figure of an Apache warrior reel nakedly on a pony and rush by with a rifle raised.
Hēngruìtè kànjiàn yí gè Ābāqiē yǒngshì de shēnyǐng —— qízhe yì pǐ méiyǒu ānjiān de mǎ，shǒu jǔ yì bǎ bùqiāng，chōng xiàng qiánfāng。
亨瑞特看见一个阿巴切勇士的身影——骑着一匹没有鞍鞯的马，手举一把步枪，冲向前方。
His entire lineage has been warriors.
Tā de zhěnggè jiāzú dōushì yǒngshì。
他的整个家族都是勇士。
knights of great emprise
非常勇武的骑士
He was given the accordance of knighthood for his bravery.
他因表现英勇被授予骑士封号。

They were rough and determined fighting men.

勇气倍增
yǒngqì bèi zēng 
with redoubled courage
鼓起勇气
ɡǔqǐ yǒnɡqì 
pluck up (or muster) one\'s courage
勇气过人
yǒngqì guòrén
excel in courage
提高勇气
tígāo yǒngqì 
pluck up one\'s courage
见她满脸的不高兴，我没有勇气再问下去。
Jiàn tā mǎnliǎn de bùgāoxìng，wǒ méiyǒu yǒngqì zài wèn xiàqù。
She looked so displeased that I didn\'t have the nerve to ask her further questions.
他唤起了我重新活下去的勇气。
Tā huànqǐle wŏ chóngxīn huóxiàqù de yŏngqì。
我拜服于他的勇气和坚强。
Wǒ bàifúyú tā de yǒngqì hé jiānqiáng。
I admire his courage and strong character.
想爬上这座冰峰，需要太多的勇气。
Xiǎng páshàng zhèzuò bīngfēng，xūyào tài duō de yǒngqì。
It takes great courage to climb the icy mountain peak.
他在老板门前来回蹀躞，还是没有勇气提出辞职。
Tā zài lǎobǎn ménqián láihuí diéxiè，háishì méiyǒu yǒngqì tíchū cízhí。
He paced up and down in front of his boss\'s door, still not brave enough to resign.
家庭的灾变并没有使他丧失生活的勇气。
Jiātíng de zāibiàn bìng méiyǒu shǐ tā sàngshī shēnghuó de yǒngqì。
The sudden change in the family didn\'t make him lose his lust for life.
他做得很对，我赞佩他的这种勇气。
Tā zuò de hěn duì，wǒ zànpèi tā de zhèzhǒng yǒngqì。
He did the right thing, and I appreciate his courage.
给我勇气
gěi wǒ yǒngqì
give me courage

Wǒ shǐzhōng méiyǒu yǒngqì gàosù tā。
All along I didn\'t have the courage to tell him.

她完全没有勇气越过它。

rúcǐ yǒnggǎn
so brave

The public should expose and criticize evil deeds and people fearless.
他是名勇敢的水手，从不惧怕惊涛。

He is a brave sailor and is never afraid of big waves.

He is very loyal to his master, willing to charge ahead even into the most dangerous places.

What military education and quality of intelligence, faith, benevolence, bravery and strictness, and national spirit can be spoken of, if a soldier doesn\'t know laws and disciplines?

Wǒmen yào yǒngyú tóng jiānè de dǎitú zuò dòuzhēng。
We shall fight against treacherous enemies bravely.
母亲希望儿子在战场上英勇杀敌，建功立业。
Mǔqīn xīwàng érzi zài zhànchǎng shàng yīngyǒng shādí，jiàngōng lìyè。
The mother hopes her son will make great contribution through fighting bravely against the enemy.
公众要勇敢地揭批坏人坏事。
Gōngzhòng yào yǒnggǎn de jiēpī huàirén huàishì。
The public should expose and criticize evil deeds and people fearless.
他是名勇敢的水手，从不惧怕惊涛。
Tā shì míng yǒnggǎn de shuǐshǒu，cóngbú jùpà jīngtāo。
He is a brave sailor and is never afraid of big waves.
谁记住那位勇治歹徒的警察的警号了？
Shéi jìzhù nà wèi yǒngzhì dǎitú de jǐngchá de jǐnghào le？
Who can remember the police ID of the policeman who caught the gangster?
年轻人不应该拘于旧说，要勇于创新。
Niánqīngrén bùyīnggāi jūyú jiùshuō，yào yǒngyú chuàngxīn。
Young people should not stick to old ideas and must have the courage to innovate.
战场上他是个勇猛抗敌的英雄，日常生活中他又像个斯文的书生。
Zhànchǎng shàng tā shì gè yǒngměng kàngdí de yīngxióng，rìcháng shēnghuó zhōng tā yòu xiàng gè sīwén de shūshēng。
On the battlefield he is a brave hero fighting against enemies; during daily life he is like a refined scholar.
在与老奸巨猾的骗子进行周旋时，所需要的不仅仅是才智还要有勇敢和镇定。
Zài yǔ lǎojiān jùhuá de piànzi jìnxíng zhōuxuán shí，suǒ xūyào de bùjǐnjǐn shì cáizhì háiyào yǒu yǒnggǎn hé zhèndìng。
When struggling with wily cheaters, we need not only ability and wisdom but also boldness and equanimity.
这是要靠集体力量团结合作的事情，个人的匹夫之勇有什么用呀？
Zhè shì yào kào jítǐ lìliang tuánjié hézuò de shìqing，gèrén de pǐfū zhī yǒng yǒu shénme yòng ya？
It\'s a  matter for unity and cooperation, what is the use of courage without discipline?
我们要为见义勇为的英雄庆功！
Wǒmen yào wèi jiànyìyǒngwéi de yīngxióng qìnggōng！
We must celebrate the victory for the heroes who have acted bravely in a just cause.
由于在战斗中有英勇表现，我被荣记了一等功。
Yóuyú zài zhàndòu zhōng yǒu yīngyǒng biǎoxiàn，wǒ bèi róngjì le yīděnggōng。
Because of my brave performance in the battle, I was given a first class award for meritorious service.
这个阵地的守将英勇无比，要想攻克，很不容易。
Zhège zhèndì de shǒujiàng yīngyǒng wúbǐ，yào xiǎng gōngkè，hěnbùróngyì。
The garrison general in this position is matchlessly valiant, it will be very difficult to conquer it.
我们要勇于尝试，做前沿学科的拓荒者。
Wǒmen yào yǒngyú chángshì，zuò qiányán xuékē de tuòhuāngzhě。
We should be brave to try new things, and be pioneers in those advanced subjects.
每当冲锋陷阵时，我们的战士都十分勇敢。
Měidāng chōngfèng xiànzhèn shí，wǒmen de zhànshì dōu shífēn yǒnggǎn。
Our soldiers are very brave in fighting battles.
侵略者遭到了当地乡勇的攻击。
Qīnlüèzhě zāodào le dàngdì xiāngyǒng de gōngjī。
The invaders are attacked by local military groups.
面对凶顽的歹徒，勇敢的民警毫不畏惧。
Miànduì xiōngwán de dǎitú，yǒnggǎn de mínjǐng háobú wèijù。
Facing the dangerous gangsters, the brave policemen were not frightened at all.
民警们毫不畏惧，勇敢地抓捕凶顽。
Mínjǐngmen háobú wèijù，yǒnggǎn de zhuābǔ xiōngwán。
The policemen had no fear, courageously running after the gangsters.
改革就是要一改故辙，勇于创新。
Gǎigé jiùshì yào yìgǎi gùzhé，yǒngyú chuàngxīn。
Reform is to resolutely give up the old ways and courageously think up  new ones.
义勇的人民军队在战斗中所向无敌。
Yìyǒng de rénmín jūnduì zài zhàndòu zhōng suǒ xiàng wúdí。
The people\'s armies, which are righteous and courageous, are irresistible.
张勇每天一大早就到山上刈草喂猪。
Zhāng Yǒng měitiān yídàzǎo jiù dào shān shàng yìcǎo wèizhū。
Every day in the early morning, Zhang Yong goes to the mountain and mows grass to feed the pigs.
野战二十二军是一支毅勇的人民军队。
Yězhàn èrshíèr jūn shì yìzhī yìyǒng de rénmín jūnduì。
The 22nd field army is a steady and brave people\'s army.
他只是一介勇夫，做事都不用脑子。
Tā zhǐshì yíjiè yǒngfū，zuòshì dōu búyòng nǎozi。
He is just a brave person who does things without thinking them through.
我国北方的游牧民族一般都比较勇悍。
Wǒguó běifāng de yóumù mínzú yìbān dōu bǐjiào yǒnghàn。
The nomadic people living in the North of our country are generally very brave and valiant.
岳飞是我国历史上一位著名的勇将。
Yuè Fēi shì wǒguó lìshǐshàng yíwèi zhùmíng de yǒngjiàng。
Yuefei is a general who is famous in our history for his bravery.
我一路上只看见三三两两的散兵游勇。
Wǒ yílùshàng zhǐ kànjiàn sānsānliǎngliǎng de sǎnbīng yóuyǒng。
I just saw several stragglers and disbanded soldiers on my way.
英勇的人民之师训练有素，所向披靡。
Yīngyǒng de rénmín zhī shī xùnliàn yǒusù，suǒ xiàng pīmí。
The brave army of the people is well trained and has had uninterrupted success.
可别小看他，他并未用尽全力，还有馀勇可贾。
Kě bié xiǎokàn tā，tā bìngwèi yòngjìn quánlì，háiyǒu yúyǒng kěgǔ。
Don\'t look down on him. He hasn\'t tried his best and can still make more contributions.
家庭的灾变并没有使他丧失生活的勇气。
Jiātíng de zāibiàn bìng méiyǒu shǐ tā sàngshī shēnghuó de yǒngqì。
The sudden change in the family didn\'t make him lose his lust for life.
他做得很对，我赞佩他的这种勇气。
Tā zuò de hěn duì，wǒ zànpèi tā de zhèzhǒng yǒngqì。
He did the right thing, and I appreciate his courage.
记者应当勇于直书事件真相。
Jìzhě yīngdāng yǒngyú zhíshū shìjiàn zhēn xiàng。

他勇于担当重任。
Tā yǒngyú dāndāngzhòngrèn。

The statement &quot;he is brave and he is not brave&quot; is a contradiction.
“Tā yǒnggǎn，tā bù yǒnggǎn”de chénshù shì yì zhǒng zìxiāngmáodùn de chénshù。
“他勇敢，他不勇敢”的陈述是一种自相矛盾的陈述。
Familiarity with danger makes a brave man braver but less daring.
Duì wēixiǎn de shúxī shǐ yǒnggǎn de rén duō xiē le yǒnggǎn，shǎo xiē le lǔmǎng。
对危险的熟悉使勇敢的人多些了勇敢，少些了鲁莽。
The statement &quot;He is brave or he is not brave&quot; is a tautology.
“Tā yǒnggǎn huò tā bìngfēi bù yǒnggǎn”shì yìzhǒng tóng yì fǎnfù。
“他勇敢或他并非不勇敢”是一种同义反复。

他最大的长处是勇于承认错误。

珍本残卷十分珍贵，有很高的文物价值。

这本古书虽有缺页，仍很珍贵。

这些珍贵的古籍都保存在寺庙的地宫里面。
Zhèxiē zhēnguì de gǔjí dōu bǎocúnzài sìmiào de dìgōng lǐmian。
These precious ancient books were preserved in the temple\'s basement.
她一直很珍爱这对儿金耳坠。
Tā yìzhí hěn zhēn\'ài zhè duìr jīn ěrzhuì。
She has always cherished this pair of gold earrings.
这种珍稀的野生动物告绝。
Zhèzhǒng zhēnxī de yěshēngdòngwù gàojué。
That kind of rare wild animal is reported to be extinct.
时光如流水，忽忽而过，所以我们要珍惜时间。
Shíguāng rú liúshuǐ，hūhū ér guò，suǒyǐ wǒmen yào zhēnxī shíjiān。
Time is like water flowing away quickly, we must cherish it.
我爱我生命中的晦暝时刻，虽然灰暗但是可以让我更珍惜阳光。
Wǒ ài wǒ shēngmìng zhōng de huìmíng shíkè，suīrán huīàn dànshì kěyǐ ràng wǒ gèng zhēnxī yángguāng。
I love those depressing times in my life. Although dark, they made me cherish the sunshine more.
《书法艺术》一书详尽地集解了艺术界的书法珍品。
《Shūfǎyìshù》yìshū xiángjìn de jíjiě le yìshùjiè de shūfǎzhēnpǐn。
The book The Art of Calligraphy collects and explains precious calligraphy works from the artistic world in detail.
传说中鲛人泪可以化为珍珠。
Chuánshuōzhōng jiāorénlèi kěyǐ huàwéi zhēnzhū。
According to the tale, the tears of shark-people can be turned into pearls.
这种珍稀生物已无噍类了，真是可惜啊。
Zhèzhǒng zhēnxī shēngwù yǐ wú jiàolèi le，zhēnshì kěxī a。
What a pity that this kind of rare animal has become extinct.
西安碑林收藏有许多刻石珍品。
Xī\'ān bēilín shōucáng yǒu xǔduō kèshí zhēnpǐn。
Many carved stone treasures lie in the Forest of Steles in Xi\'an.
侵略者掳夺走了很多的文物珍品。
Qīnlüèzhě lǔduó zǒu le hěnduō de wénwù zhēnpǐn。
The invaders pillaged many cultural relics and treasures.
一位传奇老人收藏有唐代的珍品銮舆。
Yí wèi chuánqí lǎorén shōucáng yǒu Tángdài de zhēnpǐn luányú。
A legendary old man collected a precious imperial carriage of the Tang dynasty.
从成色上看，这是一块非常珍贵的美玉。
Cóng chéngsè shàng kàn，zhè shì yí kuài fēicháng zhēnguì de měiyù。
From its purity, you know this is a very precious piece of jade.
经过多年的收集，他已经秘藏了很多稀世的珍宝。
Jīngguò duōnián de shōují，tā yǐjing mìcáng le hěnduō xīshì de zhēnbǎo。
After years of collecting, he has stored up lots of rare treasures.
这是他珍藏的秘籍，从不轻易给别人看的。
Zhè shì tā zhēncáng de mìjí，cóng bùqīngyì gěi biérén kàn de。
This is his secret collection, and he rarely shows it to others.
博物馆里陈列着许多奇珍异宝。
Bówùguǎn lǐ chénlièzhe xǔduō qízhēn yìbǎo。
There are many rare treasures exhibited in the museum.
这一带的丘壑峡谷中，生长着许多珍稀植物。
Zhè yídài de qiūhè xiágǔ zhōng，shēngzhǎng zhe xǔduō zhēnxī zhíwù。
Many valuable and rare plants grow in the stretch of canyons in this area.
这本古书虽有缺页，仍很珍贵。
Zhèběn gǔshū suī yǒu quēyè，réng hěnzhēnguì。
The ancient book is still valuable, although it lacks a few pages.
这个渔夫打捞上来一条珍稀的人鱼。
Zhège yúfū dǎlāo shànglái yìtiáo zhēnxī de rényú。
The fisherman found a rare dugong in the water.
他舍不得用他那把最珍爱的砂壶沏茶待客。
Tā shěbu de yòng tā nà bǎ zuì zhēnài de shāhú qīchá dàikè。
He was reluctant to make tea with his most cherished pottery pot when receiving guests.
爸爸送给妈妈的新年礼物是一串珍珠手链。
Bàba sònggěi māma de xīnnián lǐwù shì yíchuàn zhēnzhū shǒuliàn。
Dad\'s New Year present for mom is a wrist chain of pearls.
这些珍贵的热带观赏鱼对水温的的变化十分敏感。
Zhèxiē zhēnguì de rèdài guānshǎngyú duì shuǐwēn de de biànhuà shífēn mǐngǎn。
These precious tropical fish are very sensitive to the changes of water temperature.
她在山上捡了一块土疙瘩愣说是珍宝。
Tā zài shān shàng jiǎn le yí kuài tǔgēda lèng shuō shì zhēnbǎo。
She picked up a clod of earth on the mountain, and insisted it was a treasure.
乌鱼蛋含有大量蛋白质，一向被视为海味珍品。
Wūyúdàn hányǒu dàliàng dànbáizhì，yí xiàng bèi shìwéi hǎiwèi zhēnpǐn。
The cuttlefish\'s egg gland contains a lot of protein, and is regarded as a choice seafood.
听说博物馆正在展出希世珍品，我们也去看一看吧！
Tīngshuō bówùguǎn zhèngzài zhǎnchū xīshì zhēnpǐn，wǒmen yě qù kànyikàn ba！
There are some rare treasures on exhibition recently, let\'s take a look.
博物馆最近展出的希珍件件价值连城。
Bówùguǎn zuìjìn zhǎnchū de xīzhēn jiànjiàn jiàzhí liánchéng。
The treasures recently on exhibition each cost a fortune.
你的这些收藏品都是旷世奇珍，异常稀贵。
Nǐ de zhèxiē shōucángpǐn dōushì kuàngshìqízhēn，yìcháng xīguì。
Your collections are all rare treasures.
能告诉我这件稀世珍宝你是从哪得到的吗？
Néng gàosù wǒ zhèjiàn xīshì zhēnbǎo nǐ shì cóng nǎ dédào de ma？
Can you tell me where you got this treasure?
保护稀珍动物是我们每一个公民的义务。
Bǎohù xīzhēn dòngwù shì wǒmen měiyígè gōngmín de yìwù。
It is every citizen\'s duty to protect rare animals.
爷爷有一把珍藏了四十多年的弦子。
Yéye yǒu yìbǎ zhēncáng le sìshí duōnián de xiánzi。
My grandfather has a sanxianwhich he has treasured for over 40 years.
他研究方言，收录了一大批珍贵的词语。
Tā yánjiū fāngyán，shōulù le yídàpī zhēnguì de cíyǔ。
In researching dialects, he has accumulated a great number of valuable words and expressions.
黄金有价，真情无价，所以我们要珍惜友情。
Huángjīn yǒujià，zhēnqíng wújià，suǒyǐ wǒmen yào zhēnxī yǒuqíng。
Gold has a certain price, but true love is invaluable; therefore we should treasure friendship.
这种水鸟是种珍禽。
Zhèzhǒng shuǐniǎo shì zhǒng zhēnqín。
This kind of water bird Is very rare.
不法分子把珍禽奇兽都搬上了餐桌。
Bùfǎ fènzǐ bǎ zhēnqín qíshòu dōu bānshàng le cānzhuō。
The lawless persons has taken rare birds, and animals on to the dining-table.
她父亲90高龄，真是珍摄有方啊。
Tā fùqīn jiǔshí gāolíng，zhēnshì zhēnshè yǒufāng a。
Her father is 90 years old, and he has really taken good care of himself.
过去人们吃的粗粮成了现代都市人的珍馐。
Guòqù rénmen chī de cūliáng chéng le xiàndài dūshì rén de zhēnxiū。
The coarse grain people ate in the past have became delicacies in modern cities.
专家建议他们用珍珠岩改良建筑的结构。
Zhuānjiā jiànyì tāmen yòng zhēnzhūyán gǎiliáng jiànzhù de jiégòu。
Specialists suggested that they use pearlite to improve the structure of the building.
这种珍珠贝一般不能食用。
Zhèzhǒng zhēnzhūbèi yìbān bùnéng shíyòng。
This kind of pearl shell can\'t be eaten.
除了珍妮，谁还去过上海？
Chúle Zhēnnī，shuí hái qùguò Shànghǎi？

Tā xǐhuan zìyóuzìzài de shēnghuó，shì gè fàngdàngbùjī de rén。
He likes freedom, and is an unrestrained person.

她很放荡，我听说第一次约会她就和他睡了觉。
Her gestures and postures became more wanton and provocative.
Tā de zīshì yuèfā jùyǒu tiǎodòuxìng，yuèfā fàngdàng。
她的姿势越发具有挑逗性，越发放荡。
He thought she was really hot stuff.
Tā rènwéi tā shízai tài fàngdàng le。
他认为她实在太放荡了。
Lord T. was considered singularly licentious even for the courts of Russia and Portugal; he acquired three wives and fourteen children during his Portuguese embassy alone.
Shènzhì zài Éguó hé Pútáoyá de fǎtíng shàng，T lǎoye yě bèirènwéi shì fēicháng fàngdàng de，jǐnjǐn zài tā dāng Pútáoyá dàshǐ qījiān tā jiù yǒu sān gè qīzǐ hé shísì gè háizi。
甚至在俄国和葡萄牙的法庭上，T老爷也被认为是非常放荡的，仅仅在他当葡萄牙大使期间他就有三个妻子和十四个孩子。
动荡的局势
dòngdàng de júshì
a turbulent situation
世界局势动荡不安。
Shìjiè júshì dòngdàng bù\'ān。
The world situation is characterized by turbulence and intranquility.
历史在斗争中发展，世界在动荡中前进。
Lìshǐ zài dòuzhēng zhōng fāzhǎn，shìjiè zài dòngdàng zhōng qiánjìn。
History develops in struggle and the world advances amidst turbulence.
动荡不安
dòngdàngbù\'ān
turbulent; in turmoil
在带来巨大经济损失的同时，股市的崩盘还会引起社会动荡。
Zài dàilái jùdà jīngjì sǔnshī de tóngshí，gǔshì de bēngpán hái huì yǐnqǐ shèhuì dòngdàng。
In addition to generating huge economic losses, a stock market crash will cause social turbulence.
弊政是社会出现动荡的主要原因之一。
Bìzhèng shì shèhuì chūxiàn dòngdàng de zhǔyào yuányīn zhīyī。
Harmful policies are the major cause of social turbulence.
时局动荡，你还是带着孩子去乡下避乱吧。
Shíjú dòngdàng，nǐ háishì dài zhe háizi qù xiāngxià bìluàn ba。
The current situation is very chaotic, you’d better go to the countryside with your children.

During the War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression, our family lived an unstable life fleeing from war.
现在局势动荡，你这心劲恐怕必须改改了。
Xiànzài júshì dòngdàng，nǐ zhè xīnjìn kǒngpà bìxū gǎigǎi le。
Things are turbulent nowadays, you must limit your zeal.
人们担心，贫富不均可能会引起社会动荡。
Rénmen dānxīn，pínfù-bùjūn kěnéng huì yǐnqǐ shèhuì dòngdàng。
People are worried that inequalities in wealth might cause social unrest.
这些迷信活动，必须荡除。
Zhèxiē míxìn huódòng，bìxū dàngchú。
These superstitious activities must be eliminated.

After a tough week on the markets the Mexican stock market has stabilized.

在这个动荡时期，不要过于自信有把握。

Lěngjì de chángyè shǐ wǒ bùjīn xiǎngqǐ le shàonián zhī shí huǒbànmen wúyōu wúlǜ de dǎnào wánshuǎ de chǎngjǐng。
The still and lonely long night reminds me of the scenes when I  played happily and carefreely with my friends in the days of my youth.
业余时间，他喜欢和同伴们一起打克郎球。

In his spare time, he likes playing cards with his companions.
他指称角落里的那个人就是他的同伴。
Tā zhǐchēng jiǎoluò lǐ de nàge rén jiùshì tā de tóngbàn。
He pointed at the person in the corner, claiming that he is his companion.
他总爱嘲讽他的同伴。
Tā zǒng ài cháofěng tāde tóngbàn。
He loved to sneer at his mates.
小明经常伴同奶奶散步。
Xiǎo Míng jīngcháng bàntóng nǎinai sànbù。
Xiaoming often accompanies his grandmother on walks.
元旦那天，我和弟弟伴同逛商场。

I went shopping with my younger brother on New Year\'s day.

Some of my classmates and I went sightseeing together to enjoy the sights of the spring.
同年龄段的伙伴们都还在校读书时，小李就已经工作了。

那些祭司长和他们的同伴就是滥用权威的典型。
He and his fellow communists were enraged by the exploitation of the workers.

lèihuài lè

累进税
lěijìnshuì
progressive tax; progressive taxation
累进税制
lěijìn shuìzhì
progressive taxation
现在有一种观点强调用累进税来调节贫富差距。
Xiànzài yǒu yìzhǒng guāndiǎn qiángdiào yòng lěijìnshuì lái tiáojié pínfù chāijù。
Now there is one opinion which seeks to adjust the gap between the rich and poor through progressive taxation.
他太累了，一躺下就进入了梦乡。
Tā tài lèi le，yì tǎngxià jiù jìnrù le mèngxiāng。
He was so tired that as soon as his head hit the pillow, he went off to dreamland.
累得一进门就瘫在床上了。
积累知识要循序渐进。
Progressive income taxation will tend to lower the amount of risk-taking.
Lěijìn suǒdéshuì jiāng qūyú jiàngdī fēngxiǎn。
累进所得税将趋于降低风险。
The cumulative totals for each column are also entered.
Měi yí liè de lěijī zǒngshù yě bèi shūrù jìnqù。
每一列的累积总数也被输入进去。
I was worked to death and decided I needed to move on.
Suī lèi de kuài sǐle,dàn wǒ háishì juédìng yào jìxù qiánjìn。
虽累得快死了，但我还是决定要继续前进。
The unpaid interest is rolled up and added to the total debt.
Wèi zhīfù lìxī jiāng lěijī bìng jiārù dàikuǎn zǒngshù zhōng。
未支付利息将累积并加入贷款总数中。
全年实现利润累计为223，000元。
Quánnián shíxiàn lìrùn lěijì wéi èrshí\'èrwàn sānqiān yuán。
Profits for the whole year add up to 223,000 yuan.
他对工作认真负责，做出来的统计表不差累黍。
Tā duì gōngzuò rènzhēn fùzé，zuò chūlái de tǒngjìbiǎo bùchā lěishǔ。
He is devoted to his work, and he made statistics without the slightest error.
全年贷款累计550万元。
到时不能还债，本金与利息将累加计算。
Thanks to loyal readers, the magzine is now celebrating its fifth year with a circulation of 175,000.
Gǎnxiè zhōngshí de dúzhěmen，běn zázhì xiànzài zhèngzài qìngzhù wǔ nián lěijì fāxíngliàng dádào shíqīwàn wǔqiān cè。
感谢忠实的读者们，本杂志现在正在庆祝五年累计发行量达到175000册。
The cost of everything totaled up to more than $10,000.
Suǒyǒu fèiyòng lěijì chāoguò yíwàn měiyuán。
所有费用累计超过一万美元。
The soldiers were put on fatigue to teach them a lesson.
Nàxiē shìbīng bèi pàiqù zuò kǔlèi huójì，yǐ gěi tāmen yí gè jiàoxùn。
那些士兵被派去做苦累活计，以给他们一个教训。
a running total
累积总计
The aggregated results are expected to inform government policy.
Yùjì lěijī de jiéguǒ huì yǐngxiǎng zhèngfǔ zhèngcè。
预计累积的结果会影响政府政策。
Plans to give up the daily commuter drag have been put on ice.
Fàngqì rìcháng tōngqín zhè yī léizhui de jìhuà yǐ bèi yánchí。
放弃日常通勤这一累赘的计划已被延迟。
This bike is designed to handle normal wear and tear.
Zìxíngchē bèi shèjì yònglái jiějué rìcháng de láolèi。
自行车被设计用来解决日常的劳累。
头八个月完成的工程量累积起来，已达到全年任务的百分之九十。
Tóu bā gè yuè wánchéng de gōngchéngliànglěijī qǐlái，yǐ dádào quán nián rènwu de bǎifēnzhī jiǔshí。
The work done in the first eight months amounts to ninety per cent of the year\'s quota.
为国家积累大量资金
wèi guójiā jīlěi dàliàng zījīn 
accumulate large funds for the state
这批资料是点点滴滴积累起来的点滴
zhè pī zīliào shì diǎndiǎndīdī jīlěi qǐlái de diǎndī

jīlěi fēngfù de zīliào
accumulate a wealth of data
他在工作中积累了丰富的经验。
Tā zài gōngzuò zhōng jīlěi le fēngfù de jīngyàn。
He has accumulated a wealth of experience in his work.

积累与消费
jīlěi yǔ xiāofèi 
accumulation and consumption
积累率
jīlěilǜ 
rate of accumulation

jīlěi（xiāofèi）jījīn
accumulation (consumption) fund

jīlěi le jù\'é cáifù
have accumulated a huge amount of wealth
一点一滴地积累资料
yì diǎn yì dī de jīlèi zīliào
collect material bit by bit
增加积累
zēngjiā jīlèi
increase accumulation
资金积累
zījīn jīlěi 
accumulation of funds
官僚资本的过量积累会对国家经济造成一定的负面影响。
Guānliáo zīběn de guòliàng jīlěi huì duì guójiā jīngjì zàochéng yídìng de fùmiàn yǐngxiǎng。
The excessive accumulation of bureaucratic capital would pose a negative effect on the national economy.
他虽然赛场失利，但在大赛中积累了临阵经验，也算是失之东隅，收之桑榆吧。
Tā suīrán sàichǎng shīlì，dàn zài dàsài zhōng jīlěi le línzhèn jīngyàn，yě suànshì shīzhīdōngyú，shōuzhīsāngyú ba。
Although defeated in the match, he accumulated practical experience in the grand contest. It can be said that he lost at sunrise but gained at sunset.
由于疏于平时的管理，长期积累终于酿成大错。
Yóuyú shūyú píngshí de guǎnlǐ，chángqī jīlěi zhōng yú niàngchéng dàcuò。
As we didn\'t pay enough attention to daily management, the accumulation of little errors for so long has finally led to a huge blunder.
丰富的知识是点点滴滴积累成的。
Fēngfùde zhīshi shì diǎndiǎndīdī jīlěichéngde。
In-depth knowledge is accumulated bit by bit.
资本积累
zīběnjīlěi
accumulation of capital
每天学一点，日积月累也能学不少。
Měitiān xué yìdiǎn，rìjī yuèlěi yě néng xué bùshǎo。
Learn a little every day and in time you\'ll have learned a lot.
日积月累
rìjīyuèlěi
accumulate over a long period

受家务牵累
shòu jiāwù qiānlèi
be tied down by household chores
他怕这事说出来会牵累家庭，所以隐瞒了。
Tā pà zhè shì shuō chūlái huì qiānlèi jiātíng，suǒyǐ yǐnmán le。
He was afraid that if he mentioned the matter it would implicate his family, so he kept it secret.
每天学一点，日积月累也能学不少。
Měitiān xué yìdiǎn，rìjī yuèlěi yě néng xué bùshǎo。
Learn a little every day and in time you\'ll have learned a lot.
他觉得累了就停止练习，怕有失闪。
Tā jué de lèi le jiù tíngzhǐ liànxí，pà yǒu shīshǎn。
He stopped practising when he felt tired for fear of accidents.
再苦再累我也受得了。
Zàikǔ zàilèi wǒ yě shòu de liǎo。
I can stand even greater hardships than this.
他为了我们大家，可没少受累。
Tā wèi le wǒmen dàjiā，kě méi shǎo shòulèi。
He\'s been put to no little trouble for our sake.
累进税制
lěijìn shuìzhì
progressive taxation
累死了
lèisǐ le
be tired to death; be dog-tired
受家务拖累
shòu jiāwù tuōlěi 
be tied down by household chores
子女过多是个拖累。
Zǐnǚ guòduō shì gè tuōlěi。
Too many children are a burden.
终年劳累，不得温饱
zhōngnián láolèi，bùdé wēnbǎo 
toil all the year round without enough to eat and wear
累得我都歇不过来了。
Lèi de wǒ dōu xiē bú guòlai le。
I\'m completely done in.
一点儿也不累
yìdiǎnr yě bú lèi
not feel the least bit tired
一点一滴地积累资料
yì diǎn yì dī de jīlèi zīliào
collect material bit by bit
她硬说她不累。
Tā yìngshuō tā bú lèi。
She insisted that she wasn\'t tired.
这么重的活儿把她累得个贼死。
Zhème zhòng de huór bǎ tā lèi de gè zéisǐ。
The hard work completely exhausted her.
增加积累
zēngjiā jīlèi
increase accumulation
资金积累
zījīn jīlěi 
accumulation of funds
日积月累
rìjīyuèlěi
accumulate over a long period
你累了还是病了？
nǐ lèi le háishi bìng le?
Are you tired or ill?
我累得支撑不住了。
Wǒ lèi dé zhīchēng búzhù le。
劳累多日，今天他终于得到了一夕安寝。
Láolèi duōrì，jīntiān tā zhōng yú dédào le yìxī ānqǐn。
After days of hard work, he had a good night sleep at last.
我们才爬到半坡，她就累得走不动了。
Wǒmen cái pádào bànpō，tā jiù lèi de zǒu búdòng le。
We only climbed halfway up the slope, but she was too tired to go on.
他太累了，现在终于可以闭目休养一下了。
Tā tài lèi le，xiànzài zhōng yú kěyǐ bìmù xiūyǎng yíxià le。
He is too tired, and now he can finally close his eyes and  rest for a while.
他对工作认真负责，做出来的统计表不差累黍。
Tā duì gōngzuò rènzhēn fùzé，zuò chūlái de tǒngjìbiǎo bùchā lěishǔ。
He is devoted to his work, and he made statistics without the slightest error.
他白天工作太累了，晚上一躺下，不觉就到了大天亮。
Tā báitiān gōngzuò tài lèi le，wǎnshàng yì tǎngxià，bùjué jiù dào le dàtiānliàng。
Exhausted from work, he fell asleep the moment he lay on his bed.
一个文艺工作者长年累月地练功是十分必要的。
Yígè wényì gōngzuòzhě chángnián lěiyuè de liàngōng shì shífēn bìyào de。
It\'s very necessary for an artist to continue to practice their skills over the years.
他胳膊经常搐动，医生说是劳累过度。
Tā gēbo jīngcháng chùdòng，yīshēng shuō shì láolèi guòdù。
His arms usually twitch . The doctor says it is because of excess tire.
我很累了，吹灯睡觉吧。
Wǒ hěnlèi le，chuīdēng shuìjiào ba。
I am so tired. Let\'s blow out the lamp and go to sleep.
爬到半山腰，他累得直发喘。
Pá dào bànshānyāo，tā lèi de zhí fāchuǎn。
He was short of breath by the time he had climbed half-way up the mountain.
干了一天活儿，她累得四肢乏力。
Gàn le yìtiān huór，tā lèi de sìzhī fálì。
She was exhausted after a day\'s work.
由于长年的劳累，她现在走路时总是佝偻着腰。
Yóuyú chángnián de láolèi，tā xiànzài zǒulù shí zǒngshì gōulóu zhe yāo。
Now because of long-term fatigue, her back is always bent over when she walks.
他这人就是小心眼，针鼻儿大的事能挂累好长时间。
Tā zhè rén jiùshì xiǎoxīnyǎn，zhēnbír dà de shì néng guàlèi hǎo cháng shíjiān。
He is so narrow-minded that even a tiny matter will dwell in his mind for a long time.
结了婚就是多了一种责任，增了一份挂累。
Jié le hūn jiùshì duō le yìzhǒng zérèn，zēng le yífèn guàlèi。
Getting married means you have one more responsibility and more things to care about.
他不想挂累别人，独自把事情承担下来。
Tā bùxiǎng guàlèi biérén，dúzì bǎ shìqing chéngdān xiàlái。
He doesn\'t want to involve anyone else and takes on the whole thing all by himself.
官僚资本的过量积累会对国家经济造成一定的负面影响。
Guānliáo zīběn de guòliàng jīlěi huì duì guójiā jīngjì zàochéng yídìng de fùmiàn yǐngxiǎng。
The excessive accumulation of bureaucratic capital would pose a negative effect on the national economy.
他太累了，一合眼就睡着了。
Tā tài lèi le，yìhéyǎn jiù shuìzháo le。
He was too tired and fell asleep the moment he closed his eyes.
遑遑的一天就这样过去了，我觉得好累啊。
Huánghuáng de yìtiān jiù zhèyàng guòqù le，wǒ juédé hǎo lèi a。
The day past very quickly, I feel very tired now.
我因为家累，被迫放弃出国机会。
Wǒ yīnwèi jiālèi，bèipò fàngqì chūguó jīhuì。
Encumbered with a family, I have to give up the opportunity of going abroad.
这名接线员累得嗓子都哑了。
Zhè míng jiēxiànyuán lèi de sǎngzi dōu yǎ le。
The telephone operator got a hoarse voice from working for too long.
这些天事儿很多，累得我筋疲力尽。
Zhèxiē tiānshìr hěnduō，lèi de wǒ jīnpílìjìn。
I am busily engaged these days and am worn out.
工作一天，她实在太累了，就在靠背椅上睡着了。
Gōngzuò yì tiān，tā shízai tài lèi le，jiù zài kàobèiyǐ shàng shuìzháo le。
After working for a whole day, she was so exhausted that she fell asleep while leaning against the back of a chair.
他对工作不挑剔，无论多累都肯干。
Tā duì gōngzuò bùtiāotī，wúlùn duō lèi dōu kěngàn。
He is ready to do the work however hard it is.
公司这样一直亏累，已经很难支持下去了。
Gōngsī zhèyàng yìzhí kuīlèi，yǐjing hěnnán zhīchí xiàqù le。
The company shows repeated deficits and can hardly hold out.
他患的是劳伤，应该避免劳累，一边治疗一边静养。
Tā huàn de shì láoshāng，yīnggāi bìmiǎn láolèi，yìbiān zhìliáo yìbiān jìngyǎng。
He has an internal lesion caused by overexertion, so he\'d better avoid fatigue and rest quietly to recuperate.
妈妈由于长年的劳累，五十来岁的时候就已经生了老年斑。
Māma yóuyú chángnián de láolèi，wǔshí lái suì de shíhou jiù yǐjing shēng le lǎoniánbān。
Due to age-long exhaustion, my mother got senile plaque when she was fifty years old.
这几年受到家事所累，他比同龄人老相得多。
Zhè jǐnián shòudào jiāshì suǒlèi，tā bǐ tónglíngrén lǎo xiàng de duō。
Having been troubled by family affairs in recent years, he looks much older than his peers.
您在这里一年中累加的消费有两万元。
Nín zài zhèlǐ yìnián zhōng lěijiā de xiāofèi yǒu liǎngwàn yuán。
The cumulative amount of your consumption this year is RMB 20,000.
我家的花一天天地累减，都是因为妈妈没有时间照料它们。
Wǒjiā de huā yìtiāntiān de lěijiǎn，dōushì yīnwèi māma méiyǒu shíjiān zhàoliào tāmen。
The flowers in our house are becoming less and less. That is all because Mother has no time to take care of them.
校园里学生打工的现象累见不鲜。
Xiàoyuán lǐ xuésheng dǎgōng de xiàn xiàng lěijiàn bùxiān。
On campus, it is not rare occurance for students to have part time jobs.
这个小偷已经是第5次被警察抓住了，真是累教不改。
Zhège xiǎotōu yǐjing shì dìwǔcì bèi jǐngchá zhuāzhù le，zhēnshì lěijiào bùgǎi。
This thief has been caught by the police five times. What a person who refuses to mend his ways, despite  repeated punishment.
他既然累诫不改，我们也没有必要再白费唇舌了。
Tā jìrán lěijiè bùgǎi，wǒmen yě méiyǒu bìyào zài báifèi chúnshé le。
Now that he refuses to mend his ways despite of repeated admonition, we needn\'t waste our breath any more.
现在有一种观点强调用累进税来调节贫富差距。
Xiànzài yǒu yìzhǒng guāndiǎn qiángdiào yòng lěijìnshuì lái tiáojié pínfù chāijù。
Now there is one opinion which seeks to adjust the gap between the rich and poor through progressive taxation.
他累日坐在电脑前工作，身体都快垮了。
Tā lěirì zuòzài diànnǎo qián gōngzuò，shēntǐ dōu kuài kuǎ le。
He has been sitting in front of the computer day after day, and he is almost knocked up.
经过累日经年的治疗，他的病情已经渐渐好转了。
Jīngguò lěirì jīngnián de zhìliáo，tā de bìngqíng yǐjing jiànjiàn hǎozhuǎn le。
After years of treatment, he is gradually getting well.
她白天要工作，晚上还要带孩子，一天下来非常地累乏。
Tā báitiān yào gōngzuò，wǎnshàng háiyào dài háizi，yì tiān xiàlái fēicháng de lèifá。
During the daytime she has to work, and at night she must take care of the child. She is very tired when the whole day is over.
他干的是累活儿，让他多休息一会儿吧。
Tā gàn de shì lèihuór，ràng tā duō xiūxi yíhuìr ba。
The work he is doing is tiring.  Let him rest for a longer amount time.
太累了，我现在只想美美地睡上一觉。
Tài lèi le，wǒ xiànzài zhǐxiǎng měiměi de shuì shàng yíjiào。
I am so exhausted that I just want to have a sound sleep.
车间里这些又脏又累的活儿多是由男工来干的。
Chējiān lǐ zhèxiē yòuzāng yòulèi de huór duōshì yóu nángōng lái gàn de。
The dirty and hard work in workshop is mainly done by male workers.
这样的鸟道反正我是无法攀越，累死我了！
Zhèyàng de niǎodào fǎnzhèng wǒ shì wúfǎ pānyuè，lèi sǐ wǒ le！
Only birds can fly over this kind of path, anyhow I can\'t hike over it, I\'m exhausted.
他身体不好，还没怎么干活儿呢，就累趴下了。
Tā shēntǐ bùhǎo，hái méi zěnme gànhuór ne，jiù lèi pāxià le。
He is in bad health. Although he has done little work, he has burned himself out.
日来劳累，他的病情更加严重了。
Rìlái láolèi，tā de bìngqíng gèngjiā yánzhòng le。
Because he has worked too hare recently, his disease is exacerbated.
爬山太累了，我准备雇一个山轿抬我上山。
Páshān tài lèi le，wǒ zhǔnbèi gù yígè shānjiào tái wǒ shàngshān。
It is too tiring to climb the mountain. I am going to hire a sedan chair to carry me up.
若非他身板儿好，这么累的工作他可能早就吃不消了。
Ruòfēi tā shēnbǎnr hǎo，zhème lèi de gōngzuò tā kěnéng zǎo jiù chībuxiāo le。
But for his strong body, he couldn\'t have stood such tiring work for so long.
他虽然赛场失利，但在大赛中积累了临阵经验，也算是失之东隅，收之桑榆吧。
Tā suīrán sàichǎng shīlì，dàn zài dàsài zhōng jīlěi le línzhèn jīngyàn，yě suànshì shīzhīdōngyú，shōuzhīsāngyú ba。
Although defeated in the match, he accumulated practical experience in the grand contest. It can be said that he lost at sunrise but gained at sunset.
由于长年的劳累，他的腰椎已经严重受损。
Yóuyú chángnián de láolèi，tā de yāozhuī yǐjing yánzhòng shòusǔn。
His lumbar vertebrae have been seriously distorted due to long years\' tiring work.
这匹老马由于长年的劳累，已经瘦骨嶙峋了。
Zhè pǐ lǎomǎ yóuyú chángnián de láolèi，yǐjing shòugǔlínxún le。
This old horse has become skinny due to long years\' tiring work.
由于疏于平时的管理，长期积累终于酿成大错。
Yóuyú shūyú píngshí de guǎnlǐ，chángqī jīlěi zhōng yú niàngchéng dàcuò。
As we didn\'t pay enough attention to daily management, the accumulation of little errors for so long has finally led to a huge blunder.
他这几天太累了，总是来不及洗漱倒头就睡。
Tā zhè jǐtiān tài lèi le，zǒngshì láibùjí xǐshù dǎotóu jiù shuì。
He has been too tired in recent days, he couldn\'t wait to brush his teeth and wash his face before going to sleep.
我一整天都在田里趟地，快累死了。
Wǒ yì zhěngtiān dōu zài tián lǐ tàngdì，kuài lèisǐ le。
I have been working all day in the field, which has exhausted me.
这份工作太累了，我再也不想这样踢蹬了。
Zhè fèn gōngzuò tài lèi le，wǒ zài yě bùxiǎng zhèyàng tīdēng le。
The job is very tiring, and I don\'t want to be tormented by it anymore.
我走累了，就坐在田垄上休息。
Wǒ zǒu lèi le，jiù zuòzài tiánlǒng shàng xiūxi。
I was tired after a long walk, so I sat down and had a rest on the ridge.
他躺在温软的床上，忘记了旅途的劳累。
Tā tǎngzài wēnruǎn de chuáng shàng，wàngjì le lǚtú de láolèi。
Lying in his warm bed, he forgets his tiredness from  his travels.
劳累了大半辈子了，你也该息肩歇歇了！
Láolèi le dàbànbèizi le，nǐ yě gāi xījiān xiēxiē le！
You have toiled for a lifetime, it\'s time for you to take a rest.
由于过度劳累，她怀孕才一个多月就小月了。
Yóuyú guòdù láolèi，tā huáiyùn cái yígè duōyuè jiù xiǎoyuè le。
Due to excessive fatigue, she had a miscarriage only a month after becoming pregnant.
登山的时候不能急，累了就小坐片刻。
Dēngshān de shíhou bùnéng jí，lèi le jiù xiǎozuò piànkè。
Do not be hasty when climbing, sit for a while if you get tired.
前面还有很长的路要走，不要急，累了就坐下歇歇腿。
Qiánmiàn háiyǒu hěn cháng de lù yào zǒu，búyào jí，lèi le jiù zuòxià xiēxiētuǐ。
There is still a long way to go, don\'t worry, take a break if you are tired.
老太婆絮烦了半天也不嫌累。
Lǎotàipó xùfán le bàntiān yě bùxiánlèi。
The old woman has been talking for hours, doesn\'t she feel tired?
我现在是一身两役，你想累死我啊。
Wǒ xiànzài shì yì shēn liǎng yì，nǐ xiǎng lèi sǐ wǒ a。
I am taking on two tasks now, are you going to tire me out?
他不知什么原因这一阵都很累。
Tā bùzhī shénme yuányīn zhè yízhèn dōu hěn lèi。
He is always very tired during this period of time, and doesn\'t know why.
妈妈整年累月地为了生活在外奔波。
Māma zhěngnián lěiyuè de wèi le shēnghuó zàiwài bēnbō。
Mother has worked outside for years so we can live.
在转运站里面工作的搬运工们过年的时候是最累的。
Zài zhuǎnyùnzhàn lǐmiàn gōngzuò de bānyùngōngmen guònián de shíhou shì zuì lèi de。
For porters working at transfer posts, Spring Festival is the busiest time.
丰富的知识是点点滴滴积累成的。
Fēngfùde zhīshi shì diǎndiǎndīdī jīlěichéngde。
In-depth knowledge is accumulated bit by bit.
她太累了，走不动。
Tā tàilèi le，zǒubúdòng。
She\'s too tired – she can\'t go on.
他不感到累，反而劲头更足。
Tā bùgǎndàolèi，fǎn\'ér jìntóugèngzú。
He didn\'t feel tired; on the contrary, he had even more energy.
资本积累
zīběnjīlěi
accumulation of capital
由于兼职太多，他终于累垮了。
Yóuyú jiānzhí tàiduō，tā zhōngyú lèikuǎle.
Because he had too many jobs, he eventually collapsed with exhaustion.
队员们交互上场，免得过度劳累。
Duìyuánmen jiāohù shàngchǎng，miǎndé guòdùláolèi.
The players took it in turns to go on, so as not to get too tired.
他搬箱子时，累得吭哧吭哧的。
Tā bānxiāngzǐ shí，lèi de kēngchīkēngchī de.
Moving the box left him huffing and puffing with exhaustion.
你累了，让我来。
Nǐ lèile，ràng wǒ lái.
You\'re tired – let me do it.
经过累次打击，走私得到遏制。
Jīngguò lěicì dǎjī，zǒusī dédào èzhì.
After repeated attacks the smuggling was finally curbed.
孩子身体弱，别累着他。
Háizǐ shēntǐ ruò，bié lèi zhe tā.
The child isn\'t strong – be careful not to tire him out.
战争连累了旅游业。
Zhànzhēng liánlèi le lǚyóuyè.
The war had negative implications for tourism.
自己做事不要连累别人。
Zìjǐ zuòshì búyào liánlèi biérén.
You should not involve other people in things you have done.
难道你就不累？
Nándào nǐ jiù bú lèi?
Aren\'t you tired?
他们穷年累月在这儿工作。
Tāmen qióngniánlěiyuè zài zhèr gōngzuò.
They\'ve worked here for years on end.
累死我了。
Lèisǐ wǒ le。
I\'m completely exhausted.
工作一天之后，他回到家累得浑身酥软。
Gōngzuò yìtiān zhīhòu，tā huídào jiālěi dé húnshēn sūruǎn。
After a day\'s work, he returned home so tired that his whole body felt really weak.
她累的时候，就去散步调剂一下。
Tā lèi de shíhou，jiù qù sànbù tiáojì yíxià。
When she\'s tired, she livens herself up with a walk.
太累了，我们歇会儿吧！
Tài lèile，wǒmen xiēhuìr ba！
I\'m too tired, let\'s rest for a while!
她操劳过度，以致累垮了身体。
Tā cāoláo guòdù，yǐzhì lèikuǎle shēntǐ。
She worked so hard that she damaged her health.
她想去旅游，又怕累。
Tā xiǎngqù lǚyóu，yòu pà lèi。
She wants to go travelling but she\'s afraid it\'ll tire her out.
负债累累
硕果累累
据闻该厂负债累累，即将倒闭。
树干上疤痕累累。
弹痕累累，满目疮痍
累累若丧家之犬。○
硕果累累。
累累白骨
恶行累累。
事故累累出现。
这么大年岁了，别一天到晚累死累活地干。
伤痕累累。
秋来硕果累累
皱痕累累。
罪行累累。
累得直喘
连篇累牍
干惯了，不觉得累
累极了。
可把他累坏了！
累得都眍眼了
累垮了。
劳累。

Wǒmen yào chūqù chī bǐsà，yīnwèi wǒ tài lèi le，zuòbùliǎo fàn。
我们要出去吃比萨，因为我太累了，做不了饭。
He slackened his pace as he got tired.
Tā de bùfá màn le xiàlái，yīnwèi tā lèi le。
他的步伐慢了下来，因为他累了。
You look worn out.
Nǐ kàn shàngqù lèihuài le。
你看上去累坏了。
过于劳累
guòyú láolèi
overtired
终年劳累，不得温饱
zhōngnián láolèi，bùdé wēnbǎo 
toil all the year round without enough to eat and wear
劳累多日，今天他终于得到了一夕安寝。
Láolèi duōrì，jīntiān tā zhōng yú dédào le yìxī ānqǐn。
After days of hard work, he had a good night sleep at last.
成年累月的劳累，使他看起来十分苍老。
Chéngniánlěiyuè de láolèi，shǐ tā kànqǐlái shífēn cānglǎo。
He looks aged, because he has worked hard for years and years.
他胳膊经常搐动，医生说是劳累过度。
Tā gēbo jīngcháng chùdòng，yīshēng shuō shì láolèi guòdù。
His arms usually twitch . The doctor says it is because of excess tire.
由于长年的劳累，她现在走路时总是佝偻着腰。
Yóuyú chángnián de láolèi，tā xiànzài zǒulù shí zǒngshì gōulóu zhe yāo。
Now because of long-term fatigue, her back is always bent over when she walks.
他患的是劳伤，应该避免劳累，一边治疗一边静养。
Tā huàn de shì láoshāng，yīnggāi bìmiǎn láolèi，yìbiān zhìliáo yìbiān jìngyǎng。
He has an internal lesion caused by overexertion, so he\'d better avoid fatigue and rest quietly to recuperate.
妈妈由于长年的劳累，五十来岁的时候就已经生了老年斑。
Māma yóuyú chángnián de láolèi，wǔshí lái suì de shíhou jiù yǐjing shēng le lǎoniánbān。
Due to age-long exhaustion, my mother got senile plaque when she was fifty years old.
日来劳累，他的病情更加严重了。
Rìlái láolèi，tā de bìngqíng gèngjiā yánzhòng le。
Because he has worked too hare recently, his disease is exacerbated.
由于长年的劳累，他的腰椎已经严重受损。
Yóuyú chángnián de láolèi，tā de yāozhuī yǐjing yánzhòng shòusǔn。
His lumbar vertebrae have been seriously distorted due to long years\' tiring work.
这匹老马由于长年的劳累，已经瘦骨嶙峋了。
Zhè pǐ lǎomǎ yóuyú chángnián de láolèi，yǐjing shòugǔlínxún le。
This old horse has become skinny due to long years\' tiring work.
他躺在温软的床上，忘记了旅途的劳累。
Tā tǎngzài wēnruǎn de chuáng shàng，wàngjì le lǚtú de láolèi。
Lying in his warm bed, he forgets his tiredness from  his travels.
劳累了大半辈子了，你也该息肩歇歇了！
Láolèi le dàbànbèizi le，nǐ yě gāi xījiān xiēxiē le！
You have toiled for a lifetime, it\'s time for you to take a rest.
由于过度劳累，她怀孕才一个多月就小月了。
Yóuyú guòdù láolèi，tā huáiyùn cái yígè duōyuè jiù xiǎoyuè le。
Due to excessive fatigue, she had a miscarriage only a month after becoming pregnant.
队员们交互上场，免得过度劳累。
Duìyuánmen jiāohù shàngchǎng，miǎndé guòdùláolèi.
The players took it in turns to go on, so as not to get too tired.
她操劳过度，以致累垮了身体。
Tā cāoláo guòdù，yǐzhì lèikuǎle shēntǐ。
She worked so hard that she damaged her health.
劳累。
劳累。
过度的劳累把他的身体压垮了
过度劳累，头脑昏沉
连续多天加班，实在太劳累了。
weary work
劳累的工作
I am tired, alone and scared.
Wǒ gǎndào láolèi、gūdú hé kǒngjù。
我感到劳累、孤独和恐惧。
Students can become indifferent and dull as the tire throughout the day.
Jīngguò yì zhěng tiān de láolèi，tóngxuémen huì biàn de lěngdàn hé chídùn。
经过一整天的劳累，同学们会变得冷淡和迟钝。
This bike is designed to handle normal wear and tear.
Zìxíngchē bèi shèjì yònglái jiějué rìcháng de láolèi。
自行车被设计用来解决日常的劳累。
His reaction was the product of hunger and fatigue.
Tā shì zài jī\'è hé láolèi de shíhou zuòchū zhè zhǒng fǎnyìng de。
他是在饥饿和劳累的时候做出这种反应的。
He showed signs of strain.
Tā yǒu láolèiguòdù de jìxiàng。
他有劳累过度的迹象。
After a hard day\'s work，I vegetate in front of the television.
Jīngguò yì zhěngtiān láolèi，wǒ tānzài diànshìjī qián yídòngbúdòng。
经过一整天劳累，我瘫在电视机前一动不动。
He was so pumped he couldn\'t sleep.
Tā rúcǐ láolèi，yǐzhìyú wúfǎ rùshuì。
他如此劳累，以至于无法入睡。
为国家积累大量资金
wèi guójiā jīlěi dàliàng zījīn 
accumulate large funds for the state
这批资料是点点滴滴积累起来的点滴
zhè pī zīliào shì diǎndiǎndīdī jīlěi qǐlái de diǎndī

积累丰富的资料

He has accumulated a wealth of experience in his work.

Profound knowledge is accumulated little by little.

The excessive accumulation of bureaucratic capital would pose a negative effect on the national economy.
他虽然赛场失利，但在大赛中积累了临阵经验，也算是失之东隅，收之桑榆吧。
Tā suīrán sàichǎng shīlì，dàn zài dàsài zhōng jīlěi le línzhèn jīngyàn，yě suànshì shīzhīdōngyú，shōuzhīsāngyú ba。
Although defeated in the match, he accumulated practical experience in the grand contest. It can be said that he lost at sunrise but gained at sunset.
由于疏于平时的管理，长期积累终于酿成大错。

zīběnjīlěi
accumulation of capital

Měitiān xué yìdiǎn，rìjī yuèlěi yě néng xué bùshǎo。

日积月累
rìjīyuèlěi
accumulate over a long period

She could feel the tension building up in his body.

The benefits are cumulative.

这些利益一点点积累起来。
For most people，excess fat is gained over many months or years.

a running total
累积总计
The aggregated results are expected to inform government policy.
Yùjì lěijī de jiéguǒ huì yǐngxiǎng zhèngfǔ zhèngcè。

The cumulative totals for each column are also entered.
Měi yí liè de lěijī zǒngshù yě bèi shūrù jìnqù。

guǒshí léiléi 
fruit growing in close clusters; fruit hanging heavy on the trees

她多累也不吭声。

成千累万

qīlíngbāluò de jǐ jiān pò cǎofáng
a few ramshackle huts scattered here and there
匪徒被打得七零八落，四散奔逃。
Fěitú bèi dǎ de qīlíngbāluò，sìsànbēntáo。
Badly battered, the bandits fled in disorder.
屋子里七零八落地放着一些书。
Wūzi lǐ qīlíngbāluò de fàngzhe yìxiē shū.
Books were scattered around the room.
She watched amazed as the broken ranks filed past in utter silence.
Dāng qīlíngbāluò de duìwu mò bú zuò shēng de yúguàn ér guòshí，tā chījīng de zhùshìzhe。
当七零八落的队伍默不作声地鱼贯而过时，她吃惊地注视着。
她喜欢一边看电视一边吃零嘴。
Tā xǐhuan yìbiān kàn diànshì yìbiān chī língzuǐ。
She likes to snack while watching TV.
零嘴。
我找到了一个在餐馆做零杂工的工作。
Wǒ zhǎodào le yígè zài cānguǎn zuò língzágōng de gōngzuò。

língxià wǔ dù

occasional drizzles; scattered showers

The lawn is dotted with little flowers.

pèi línɡjiàn

Huángyè piāolíng。

飘零一身
piāolínɡyìshēn
a solitary wanderer
她把零碎花布拼凑起来，给小闺女做了一件褂子。
Tā bǎ língsuì huābùpīncòu qǐlái，gěi xiǎo guīnǚ zuò le yíjiàn guàzi。

a few ramshackle huts scattered here and there

缺少零件
quēshǎo língjiàn

Shēnshàng yǒu língqián ma?

零星物品
línɡxīnɡ wùpǐn 
sundries; odds and ends

xìxiǎo de língjiàn

língxià wǔ dù

xiè línɡjiàn
remove parts from a machine; strip a machine
零度以下
língdù yǐxià 
below zero; subzero
三十有零
sānshí yǒulíng
thirty odd
一千有零
yìqiān yǒulíng
just over a thousand
零件
línɡjiàn 
part (of a machine)
凋零
diāolíng
(of flowers and plants) wither
零票儿
língpiàor
notes of small denominations; change
零用
língyòng
spend money on minor purchases

我发现我的狗孤零零地躺在我家楼后，而且还病怏怏的。
The tank was stripped down piece by piece.
坦克被一个零件一个零件地拆卸开来。
She was isolated from the rest of the world, with only her thoughts for company.
她被所有人孤立了，只有自己一个人孤零零地待着。
all alone
孤零零的
A zero-sum game is a game in which the sum of the payoffs of all the players is zero whatever strategies they choose.
零和博弈是指在一个博弈中，无论每个参与人选择什么样的策略，所有参与人的支付之和总是为零。
The bell went a ting-a-ling.
铃铛丁零零作响.
Scores from zero to three in the game of tennis are &quot;love&quot;, &quot;fifteen&quot;, &quot;thirty&quot;, &quot;forty&quot; respectively.
Wǎngqiúbǐsài zhōng de défēn cóng líng zhì sān yīcì shì“líng”“shíwǔ”“sānshí”“sìshí”。
网球比赛中的得分从零至3依次是“零”“15”“30”“40”。
The amplifier will then have been adjusted so that zero field corresponds to zero output.
Ránhòu gāi fàngdàqì bèi jìnxíng tiáozhěng，nàyàng língchǎng xiāngdāngyú líng shūchū。
然后该放大器被进行调整，那样零场相当于零输出。
The pillar stood alone, supporting nothing.
Zhùzi gūlingling chùlìzhe，shénme yě méiyǒu zhīchēng。
柱子孤零零矗立着，什么也没有支撑。
Possible distribution channels are wholesalers or small retailers or retail chains or direct mailers or your own stores.
Kěnéng de xiāoshòu qúdào bāokuò pīfāshāng、xiǎoxíng língshòushāng、língshòuliàn、zhíjiē yóujiàn yǐjí nǐ zìjǐ de shāngdiàn。
可能的销售渠道包括批发商、小型零售商、零售链、直接邮件以及你自己的商店。
odds and ends
零碎杂物，残余
null matrix
零矩阵
null sequence
零序
a few odd volumes of Dickens
零星的几卷狄更斯小说
ten dollars and some odd change
十元及一些零钱
odd jobs, at odd moments
额外的零星活，有空的时间
automobile parts
汽车零件
books that retail at a dollar
零售价为一美元的书
a few stray words
一些零碎的词语
a score of 7 to 0
比分是七比零
auto wrecker
拆卸旧汽车零件者
The plural of deer is said to be formed by the addition of a zero allomorph of the plural morpheme.
deer的复数被认为是通过添加零词缀而构成的。
The number one thousand is written with a one and three zeroes.
一千这个数字的写法是一个一加三个零。
The temperature is expected to drop to eight degrees below zero today.
今天的温度可能会降到零下八度。
She said that my chances of getting the job were zero.
她说我得到这份工作的可能性为零。
In my hometown temperatures in winter never rise above zero.
冬天时，我家乡的气温向来都在零度以下。
Every single part of the product has to be modeled on a computer before making it.
产品的每一个零件在制造前首先要在电脑上设计出来。
Some conductors allowed passengers to ride for free when they didn\'t have the exact fare.
如果乘客没零钱，一些售票员会允许他们免费乘车。
The man was pounding on the window of a taxi trying to demand his change.
这个人咣咣敲着出租车的窗户，打算要回找他的零钱。
Let\'s eat proper food instead of eating snacks all day.
不要整天吃零食了，咱们吃点儿有营养的东西吧。
Three big shopping retail companies have been involved in a price war.
三大零售公司卷入了一场价格战。
The final score was seven-love.
最后比分为七比零。
During the winter in Scandinavia, temperatures fall to 30 degrees below zero.
在冬季，斯堪的纳维亚的温度会降到零下30度。
Once the Will Call window closes, unclaimed tickets will not be available.
预定零售窗口一旦关闭，那些没人认领的票就不能使用了。
Will Call tickets allow you to purchase a ticket online and then pick it up at the counter.
你可以通过预定零售部在网上订票，然后到柜台去取。
I am currently in a retail sales job but in two weeks I am starting a desk job.
我现在从事零售业，但两周以后我就要去坐办公室了。
We should dig up those weeds.
一个金属零件戳进了我的脚跟。
below zero
零度以下
bits and pieces {or} bits and bobs
[inf] 零碎儿
I haven\'t got any change.
我没零钱。
small change
零钱
to give sb change for {or} of 10 pounds
给某人10英镑的零钱
10 degrees below (zero)
零下10度
3 degrees below freezing
零下3度
minus 24 (degrees C/F)
零下24(摄氏/华氏度)
odds and ends
[inf] 零碎的东西
The company produces components for the aerospace industry.
这家公司为航空业生产零部件。
to have a snack
吃点零食
Visibility at the city\'s airport came down to zero.
这个城市机场的能见度降为零。
5 degrees below zero
零下5度
The electro-mechanical parts are the best available.
Zhèxiē jīdiànlíngjiàn shì xiànyǒu dāngzhōng zhìliàng zuìhǎo de。
这些机电零件是现有当中质量最好的。
There are three types of articles, namely the zero article, the indefinite article and the definite article.
冠词分为三种：零冠词，不定冠词和定冠词。
Students are going to use ohm gauges to measure the power output of the new robot parts.
学生们要用欧姆表测量新机器人零件的输出功率。
All parts of an engine are rigorously gauged.
一个机器的所有零件都是经过精确测量的。
I lost my purse but luckily I had the precise change in my pocket to buy a bus ticket home.
我丢了钱包，但幸好我口袋里有足够零钱来买回家的公交车票。
These spills are also important parts of the machine.
这些小金属棒也是机器的重要零件。
You probably remember Yao Chin-feng: tall and thin, little round face, slightly pockmarked, thirtyish, been here three years and six months? Well, as a matter of fact it was she who started the strike.&quot;
你大概还记得这个姚金凤吧？瘦长条子，小圆脸儿，有几点细白麻粒，三十多岁，在厂里已经三年零六个月，这次怠工就是她开火的”
As we know, economics is not a zero-sum game.
我们知道经济不是零和游戏。
The vote on initiative 202 will decide the fate of illegal immegrants.
二百零二号决议的投票结果将决定非法移民的命运。
It\'s ten minutes after midnight.
现在是凌晨零点十分。
These toys will be by direct retail.
这些玩具会以直接零售的方式出售。
Retail business is in general depression now.
零售业现在处在大范围萧条状态。
The wholesale agent distributed the products to these retail vendors.
批发商将商品卖给零售商。
Normally, retail profit rate is much higher than that of wholesale.
一般来说，零售的利润率比批发大很多。
It will add to our cost to sell the products in retail outlets.
以零售方式销售产品会增加我们的成本。
These commodities will be retailed at a price of one hundred dollars.
这种产品会以一百元的售价零售。
These books will retail in the name of the Red Cross.
这些书会以红十字会的名义零售。
The furniture in the house seem to be made from scrap lumber.
房子里的家具好像是用零碎木料做成的。
I\'m sure the shopkeeper gave me too little change so I\'m going to check carefully next time ? Once bitten, twice shy.
我断定店主少找给我零头，因此下次我要仔细核对一下才是，一次上当，下次小心。
he men who make the parts of an airplane must use strict measurements.
制造飞机零件的工人必须使用精确的量具。
Our launch of the new cell phone was a success. We already have orders from seven retail stores.
新手机的上市非常成功。我们已经收到了七家零售店的订单。
The school board has a policy of zero tolerance for students caught cheating on exams.
学校董事会制定了对学生考试作弊行为零容忍的政策。
Big corporations are responsible for the death of mom and pop stores.
Dàgōngsī yào duì língshòudiàn de xiāowáng fùzé。
大公司要对零售店的消亡负责。
The temperature outside dropped 20 to 30 degrees below freezing.
Wàimiàn de wēndù jiàngzhì língxià 20 zhì 30 shèshìdù。
外面的温度降至零下20至30摄氏度。
I jobbed over the summer to make a few extra dollars.
Wǒ shǔqī zuò línggōng，zhuànqǔ yìxiē éwài měiyuán。
我暑期做零工，赚取一些额外美元。
I juggled my brother out of his allowance.
Wǒ shuǎle gè xiǎo huāzhāo，dédàole gēge de línghuāqián。
我耍了个小花招，得到了哥哥的零花钱。
The suggested retail price on the ticket was too expensive.
Biāoqiān shàng de jiànyì língshòujià tài guì le。
标签上的建议零售价太贵了。
I was tripped up by the loose cables on the floor.
Wǒ bèi dìshàng língluàn de lǎn xiàn bàndǎo le。
我被地上零乱的缆线绊倒了。

Jīngguò shěnchá hòu，jiàgé zhòujiàng dào líng。
经过审查后，价格骤降到零。

Wēndù zhòujiàng dào le língxià shí dù。

Tā bǎ duōyú de qìchē língjiàn bǎocúnzài guàn nèi。

Fàncài hé língshí díquè méi bìyào qīngdàn wúwèi。
饭菜和零食的确没必要清淡无味。

Zhèjiā shūdiàn búhuì bǎ zhè tào shū chāikāi língmài。
这家书店不会把这套书拆开零卖。

Dāng qīlíngbāluò de duìwu mò bú zuò shēng de yúguàn ér guòshí，tā chījīng de zhùshìzhe。

The UK retail arm of the company reported a £18.0 million operating loss.

The cashier in the supermarket didn\'t give me the correct change.
Chāoshì lǐ de shōuyínyuán bǎ gěi wǒ de língqián zhǎocuò le。
超市里的收银员把给我的零钱找错了。
Retail sales account for only 40 per cent of consumer spending.

My sister usually grazes on junk food throughout the day.

Nothing was too expensive for Nick, he gets loads of pocket money.

这种机器最严重的问题可能是在使用过程中，一些零件会变松。

Yòng fùhào biǎoshì shùzhí xiǎoyú líng。

We retail to the general public and we also supply wholesalers.

From nowhere, she started scratching out a reasonable living.

yì shuānglíngqiǎo de shǒu
a pair of clever hands

Tā yòng qiǎokèlì hé yìdiǎndiǎn lǎngmǔjiǔ zuò dàngāo。
她用巧克力和一点点朗姆酒做蛋糕。
Dawn licked a drop of chocolate off her lips.
Dāngēn tiǎndiào le tā chúnbiān de yìdiǎner qiǎokèlì。
当恩舔掉了她唇边的一点儿巧克力。
The chocolate has entirely melt in the her mouth.
Qiǎokèlì zài tā zuǐ lǐ wánquán rónghuà le。
巧克力在她嘴里完全溶化了。
The cake was made out of chocolate.
Dàngāo shì yòng qiǎokèlì zuò de。
蛋糕是用巧克力做的。
The chocolate is then warmed to make a sauce for the cake.
Ránhòu jiārè qiǎokèlì，shǐ qí chéngwéi dàngāo de pèiliào。
然后加热巧克力，使其成为蛋糕的配料。
I was spinning out the chocolate.

我尽量拉伸巧克力。
He gave her a box of chocolates.

他送给她一盒巧克力。
She needed a fix of chocolate.
Tā fēicháng xiǎng chī qiǎokèlì。
她非常想吃巧克力。
He has a weakness for chocolate.
Tā duì qiǎokèlì fēicháng xǐhuan。
他对巧克力非常喜欢。
She is addicted to chocolate.
Tā chī qiǎokèlì shàngyǐn。
她吃巧克力上瘾。

The recipe listed all the makings for a chocolate cake.
Nàgè pèifāng lièchūle zhìzuò qiǎokèlì dàngāo shǐyòng de suǒyǒu yuánliào。
那个配方列出了制作巧克力蛋糕使用的所有原料。
Rivals could also make a grab for the chocolate box.

竞争对手们也可能会来抢这盒巧克力。
Mama always said life was like a box of chocolates. You never know what you’re gonna get.
Wǒ māma cháng shuō ，shēngmìng jiù xiàng yīhé qiǎokèlì ，jiéguǒ wǎngwǎng chūrényìliào 。
我妈妈常说，生命就像一盒巧克力，结果往往出人意料。

我找他两次，偏巧都不在家。

I called at his house twice, but he happened to be out each time.
太巧了，我一出家门就来了一辆出租汽车。

It was most opportune that a taxi arrived just as I was leaving the house.
搬家的那一天，凑巧赶上下雨。
Bānjiā de nàyìtiān，còuqiǎo gǎnshàng xiàyǔ。
As luck would have it, it rained the day we moved.
大家正念叨他，可巧他来了。

We were just talking about him when he turned up.

这套家具做工精巧。
They keep a store of chocolate.
他们经营着一家巧克力店。
He arrived rather opportunely just when we needed a new butler.

就在我们需要一个新管家的时候他凑巧来了。
Different artists employ different painting techniques.
不同的画家会使用不同的绘画技巧。
这种新巧的设计获得了大奖。
Zhèzhǒng xīnqiǎo de shèjì huòdé le dàjiǎng。
This new exquisite design won a large prize.
这些新体字设计得很精巧。
Zhèxiē xīntǐzì shèjì de hěn jīngqiǎo。
These characters of a new style are wonderfully designed.
用这个方法进行计算可以偷巧。

This method can save a lot of effort.

巧妙的设计。

I need a cunning plan to pull this one off.

现如今有许多设计精巧的小发明。

巧合。
他俩的设计构思如此相近，真是巧合。
I should have deduced something immediately from that coincidence.

我本应从那一巧合中迅速推断出一些东西的。
Glass was discovered by a stroke of luck.

这个名字在讲演中多次出现并非巧合。

情况有那么巧合吗？

这是由不可思议的巧合所引起的。

The interpretation is ingenious and fits the evidence such as it is.

qiǎojiànɡ
a skilled (or clever) workman
他的手艺很巧。

His workmanship is excellent.
你嘴巧，你去说他准听。

我正要去找他，他就来了，真是巧劲儿。

The candy has a chocolate flavour.
真是无巧不成书，我的顶头上司就是被我在街上撞倒的那个人。

What a coincidence: My immediate superior was the man I had knocked down on the street.

xìqiǎo de tú\'àn
an exquisite design

稚拙的技巧
zhìzhuō de jìqiǎo 
simple skills
我最喜欢吃巧克力冰淇淋。
Wǒ zuì xǐhuan chī qiǎokèlì bīngqílín。
I like chocolate ice cream best.
工巧
gōngqiǎo
exquisite; fine
花言巧语
huāyánqiǎoyǔ
sweet words; fine words; flattery; blandishments
你说得倒轻巧。
Nǐ shuō de dào qīngqiǎo。
You talk as if it were a simple matter.
他手可巧了，还会编各种好看的编织袋。
Tā shǒu kě qiǎo le，hái huì biān gèzhǒng hǎokàn de biānzhīdài。
He is very skilled, and can braid all kinds of plastic bags which are very nice.
他高超的演唱技巧，让人拍手称绝。
Tā gāochāo de yǎnchàng jìqiǎo，ràng rén pāishǒu chēngjué。
People always appluad, and praise his singing technique.
这种巧克力的味道醇浓香甜，很好吃。
Zhèzhǒng qiǎokèlì de wèidào chúnnóng xiāngtián，hěnhǎo chī。
This chocolate is very tasty with a mellow and sweet taste.
只有借助于巧劲儿，才能四两拔千斤。
Zhǐyǒu jièzhù yú qiǎojìnr，cáinéng sì liǎng bá qiān jīn。
Only with the help of clever steps can you avoid trouble and achieve greater success with less cost.
这个电影镜头用了叠印的拍摄技巧。
Zhège diànyǐng jìngtóu yòng le diéyìn de pāishè jìqiǎo。
This movie camera lens uses the photographic technique of overprinting.
上班路上，我刚巧碰到了他。
Shàngbān lùshàng，wǒ gāngqiǎo pèngdào le tā。
It so happened that I met him on my way to work.
桥两侧的勾栏制作的精致巧妙，成了一道独特的风景。
Qiáo liǎngcè de gōulán zhìzuò de jīngzhì qiǎomiào，chéng le yídào dútè de fēngjǐng。
The railings at the two sides of the bridge are very exquisite and form a unique scene.
卖关子是评书中常用的手段技巧，术语称留扣子。
Màiguānzi shì píngshū zhōng chángyòng de shǒuduàn jìqiǎo，shùyǔ chēng liúkòuzi。
Keeping the audience guessing is a common technique in storytelling, the term for it is Liukouzi.
这首诗的机抒很是巧妙，颇具韵味。
Zhèshǒushī de jīshū hěnshì qiǎomiào，pō jù yùnwèi。
The composition of this poem is very skilful, full of lingering charm.
新换的这个机子比原来那个灵巧多了。
Xīnhuàn de zhège jīzi bǐ yuánlái nàge língqiǎo duō le。
The new machine is much more ingenious than the old one.
他的钢琴演奏技巧那真是没的说呀！
Tā de gāngqín yǎnzòu jìqiǎo nà zhēnshì méi de shuō ya！
His piano performance skills are excellent.
这盒巧克力外面有一层玫瑰色的包装纸。
Zhè hé qiǎokèlì wàimiàn yǒu yì céng méiguīsè de bāozhuāngzhǐ。
The box of chocolate is wrapped in rose paper.
这套面塑人物真是做工精巧，栩栩如生。
Zhètào miànsù rénwù zhēnshì zuògōng jīngqiǎo，xǔxǔrúshēng。
This set of dough modeling creatures is delicate, and vivid.
骈文的写作需要很多技巧，比如一定要讲究对偶。
Piánwén de xiězuò xūyào hěnduō jìqiǎo，bǐrú yídìng yào jiǎngjiū duìǒu。
Writing parallel prose needs a lot of technique; for example, you must pay attention to antithesis.
他的写作风格奇巧，笔触生动。
Tā de xiězuò fēnggé qíqiǎo，bǐchù shēngdòng。
He writes in a picturesque style with vivid language.
根据传说，妇女们都在七月七日向神灵乞巧。
Gēnjù chuánshuō，fùnǚmen dōu zài qī yuè qī rì xiàng shénlíng qǐqiǎo。
The legend says that women pray for cleverness every seventh evening of the seventh lunar month.
宫殿里华丽的装潢都是出自能工巧匠之手。
Gōngdiàn lǐ huálì de zhuānghuáng dōushì chūzì nénggōng qiǎojiàng zhī shǒu。
The gorgeous decoration in the palace comes from the hands of skillful craftsmen.
就绘画技巧来论，这幅作品还是稍逊于那幅呀！

This work is slightly inferior than that one in terms of painting skill.
他是一个有经验的乐手，深通伴奏技巧。

He is an experienced instrumental performer, and a master of accompaniment techniques.
这座园林中的石舫精巧别致、与众不同。

The Marble Boat in the garden is exquisite and unique.

Tā qiǎomiào de shuǎituō le wěisuítā de xiǎoliúmáng，ránhòu bào le jǐng。
She cleverly got rid of the rogues who followed her, and called the police.
杂技演员的高超技巧真令人叹绝！
Zájì yǎnyuán de gāochāo jìqiǎo zhēn lìngrén tànjué！
The skills demonstrated by acrobats are astounding!
用这个方法进行计算可以偷巧。
Yòng zhège fāngfǎ jìnxíng jìsuàn kěyǐ tōuqiǎo。
This method can save a lot of effort.
他总是喜欢偷巧完成自己的工作。
Tā zǒngshì xǐhuan tōuqiǎo wánchéng zìjǐ de gōngzuò。
He often finishes his task using cunning tricks to avoid hard work.
学习绘画应该刻苦，不要总想着投机取巧。

One should work hard in studying how to paint, rather than think of playing tricks to avoid difficulties all day long.
小王写的这部微型小说构思巧妙，情节跌宕。

This very short story written by Xiao Wang is skillfully constructed and full of twists and turns.
下腰需要很高的技巧，否则容易扭伤。
Xiàyāo xūyào hěngāo de jìqiǎo，fǒuzé róngyì niǔshāng。
It requires great skill to bend down, otherwise you can easily get hurt.
妈妈刚从超市买回一只小巧精致的茶壶。

Mother just bought an exquisite teapot from the supermarket.

My sister is a clever and deft person who can make pretty dresses.

This new exquisite design won a large prize.
这些新体字设计得很精巧。

These characters of a new style are wonderfully designed.
幸巧碰到你，要不然我真不知道该怎么办。

Fortunately I met you, otherwise I wouldn\'t know what to do.

Xiězuò de jīběn jìqiǎo jiùshì yào yánzhī yǒuwù。
The basic technique of writing is to write something concrete.
这只酒壶太过淫巧，其实并无实用价值。

The flagon is overelaborate, and practically useless.
高明的摄影师懂得用光的技巧。

People working in the industrial arts field are clever with their minds and skillful with their hands.
现在的绘图板比原来轻巧多了。

Today\'s drawing boards are much lighter than those of before.

Tangram is a toy comprised of many geometrical pieces that can be put together.
你来得真不巧，王医生不在。

A piece of antiphonal singing from the Huangmei Opera &quot;Goddess Marriage&quot; is quite popular with the general public.
话说红楼梦中的十二金钗，个个都是天仙一样的人儿。
Huàshuō hónglóumèng zhōng de shíèr jīnchāi，gègè dōushì tiānxiān yíyàng de rénr。
Now let me tell the story. The twelve girls in Dream of the Red Chamber are all as beautiful as goddess.
她向我款款走来，就像天上的仙女一样！
Tā xiàng wǒ kuǎnkuǎn zǒulái，jiù xiàng tiānshàng de xiānnǚ yíyàng！
Walking leisurely towards me, she looks just likes a fairy.
飞升天界的神仙都只是传说故事而已。
Fēishēng tiānjiè de shénxiān dōu zhǐshì chuánshuō gùshì éryǐ。
The immortals who ascended to heaven are just imaginary figures.
他给我们讲了一个狐仙得道升天的故事。
Tā gěi wǒmen jiǎng le yígè húxiān dédào shēngtiān de gùshì。
He told us a story about how a fox attained the Tao, and ascended to heaven.
他梦想着有一天可以被点化成仙。

He dreams of being enlightened by a monk one day.

The narcissus is becoming more and more lively under mom\'s careful attendance.
由于没有精心照料，这株水仙花已经凋萎了。
Yóuyú méiyǒu jīngxīn zhàoliào，zhè zhū shuǐxiānhuā yǐjing diāowěi le。

水仙另有一种淡雅的韵致。

一棵水仙
yìkē shuǐxiān
a narcissus
仙人球挺耐旱，半个月不浇水也不会枯死。
Xiānrénqiú tǐng nàihàn，bàngèyuè bùjiāoshuǐ yě búhuì kūsǐ。
Bulbous cactus is drought-enduring and will not wither even without water for half a month.
The retention of enough water in the soil allows cacti to survive through the hot summer.
土地中保留的充足水分使仙人掌熬过了盛夏。
These cactus is planted in a dry and unwatered place.
这些仙人掌被栽于干旱无水之地。

a tender conscience
敏感的良知

上周四，孟买股票交易所的30支成份股的敏感指数下跌了617点。
The stomach is a very sensitive organ.
胃是一个很敏感的器官。

最好使用防过敏的婴儿湿巾来擦拭婴儿的敏感皮肤。
If you don\'t have an ear for a meter, carry on writing free verse or prose.
如果你对韵律不敏感的话，那就继续写自由体诗或散文吧。

他们甚至可以随便围绕敏感话题展开建设性的对话。

橡胶手套对于敏感皮肤是必备之物。
to be sensitive to sth
[+sb\'s needs，feelings，heat，light etc] 对某物敏感
to be sensitive about sth
对某事敏感
Vicious gossip is a rub to sensitive people.
对敏感的人来说，恶意中伤的闲话很伤感情。
The activity of urease is sensitive to bronopol.
尿素酶的活性对溴硝醇比较敏感。

防晒油，润唇膏，帽子和手套可以很好的保护敏感皮肤，避免晒黑，皮肤病或者冻伤。
Jack is a wiseacre who hears the grass grow.
杰克是个自作聪明的人，对什么事都非常敏感。
