艾伦是个自作聪明的人，对什么事都非常敏感。
Tom is a witling who hears the grass grow.
汤姆是个自作聪明的人，对什么事都非常敏感。
The enterprise reform have always been a sensitive topic.
企业改革历来都是敏感话题。

劣质护肤品会刺激敏感的肌肤。

凡是动物都有对外界刺激有比较灵敏感应的特性。
The lips are the most sensible parts of the body.
嘴唇是身体最敏感的部分。
She is very vulnerable to other people\'s criticism.
她对于别人的批评很敏感。
That delicate instrument can record even very slight changes.
那台敏感的仪器可以记录甚至非常轻微的变化。
The teacher chose to evade these particularly sensitive issues.
Zhè wèi lǎoshī xuǎnzé huíbì zhèxiē yóuwéi mǐngǎn de huàtí。
这位老师选择回避这些尤为敏感的话题。
Earthworms have extremely sensitive skins and cannot thrive under certain conditions.
Qiūyǐn de pí fēicháng mǐngǎn，zài tèdìngtiáojiàn xià wúfǎ shēngzhǎng。
蚯蚓的皮非常敏感，在特定条件下无法生长。
Even Scott, who is allergic to fish, was boning fish and preparing the dishes.
Céngjīng yíxiàng duì yú bǐjiào mǐngǎn de Sīkētè yě zài tī yúgǔ zuòfàn。
曾经一向对鱼比较敏感的斯科特也在剔鱼骨做饭。
Sensitive to the criticism, the president bristled at the suggestion that war was inevitable.
Yóuyú duì pīpíngyìjiàn hěn mǐngǎn，zǒngtǒng shífēn fǎnduì zhànzhēng yǐ bùkěbìmiǎn de shuōfǎ。
由于对批评意见很敏感，总统十分反对战争已不可避免的说法。
Weakly coherent surfaces are more susceptible to sheet and wind erosion.
Niánzhuó bù láo de biǎomiàn duì piànzhuàng qīnshí hé fēngshí gèngjiā mǐngǎn。
粘着不牢的表面对片状侵蚀和风蚀更加敏感。
People with light complexioned skin are more sensitive to the sun.
Qiǎnsè pífū de rén duì yángguāng gèng mǐngǎn。
浅色皮肤的人对阳光更敏感。
Pupils sometimes respond to a site more fully if their senses are heightened.
Chūyú xuésheng yìshí de mǐngǎn，tāmen yǒushí huì duì wèizhi jùyǒu gèng chōngfèn de fǎnyìng。
出于学生意识的敏感，他们有时会对位置具有更充分的反应。
She is a very sensitive player and shows great musical ability.
Tā shì yígè hěn mǐngǎn de xuǎnshǒu，yōngyǒu hěn qiáng de yīnyuè tiānfù。
她是一个很敏感的选手，拥有很强的音乐天赋。
Hitherto, she had thought him an unusually sensitive man.
Dào mùqián wéizhǐ，tā yìzhí rènwéi tā shì yí gè hǎnjiàn de mǐngǎn de rén。
到目前为止，她一直认为他是一个罕见的敏感的人。
AIDS is a sensitive area, which many schools are unsure of how to tackle.

艾滋病是一个敏感的话题，许多学校都不知道如何应对。
Another vital area in terms of sensitive political control were the national minorities.
Jiù zhèngzhì kòngzhì mǐngǎndù éryán，lìngwài yí gè zhòngyào de lǐngyù jiùshì shǎoshùmínzú。
就政治控制敏感度而言，另外一个重要的领域就是少数民族。
Penguins and elephant seals show most sensitivity to blue light.

Tā duì duìhuà quēfá mǐngǎn。
他对对话缺乏敏感。

Tā mǐngǎn de jùjuéle suǒyǒu de bāngzhù。

对新闻的敏锐感
an exquisite ear for music
有灵敏的音乐感

敏捷
mǐnjié
quick; nimble; agile

Tā dòngzuò mǐnjié de xiàng zhī bàozi。
He is as agile as a leopard.

She has a ready pen, and writes beautifully.

她自觉才思不敏，所以学起习来更加努力。

He has been clever and fond of studying since he was young, and way ahead of his peers in study.

He sees clearly where the problems lies.

这孩子不仅聪敏而且反应快，是个捷才。

This child is intelligent and swift.
做这件事我的能力有限，还是敬谢不敏了。

I am sorry, but I\'m afraid I can\'t.
她从小就敏悟好学，是个好孩子。

She has been agile and studious since she was very young, and she is always a good girl.

to be sensitive to sth
[+sb\'s needs，feelings，heat，light etc] 对某物敏感
to be sensitive about sth
对某事敏感
Many smokers feel more alert and focused after smoking.
很多吸烟者觉得吸烟后思维更敏捷更集中。
Vicious gossip is a rub to sensitive people.
对敏感的人来说，恶意中伤的闲话很伤感情。
She does\'t like the idea of working with those thin-skinned people.
她不愿意和神经过敏的人在一起工作。
I can never be too careful in my choice of words in front of those thin-skinned fellows.
在那些神经过敏的人面前说话我不得不在措辞上小心再小心。
The activity of urease is sensitive to bronopol.
尿素酶的活性对溴硝醇比较敏感。
Sunscreen, lip balm, hats and mittens will protect sensitive skin from sunburn, windburn, and frostbite.
防晒油，润唇膏，帽子和手套可以很好的保护敏感皮肤，避免晒黑，皮肤病或者冻伤。
I can not catch the squirrel with winged acts.
我抓不到这只行动敏捷的松树。
Jack is a wiseacre who hears the grass grow.
杰克是个自作聪明的人，对什么事都非常敏感。
Allen is a wisenheimer who hears the grass grow.
艾伦是个自作聪明的人，对什么事都非常敏感。
Tom is a witling who hears the grass grow.
汤姆是个自作聪明的人，对什么事都非常敏感。
She retained the passion and quickness of a wunderkind.
她仍保持着神童的激情与敏捷。
The enterprise reform have always been a sensitive topic.
企业改革历来都是敏感话题。
She is a woman of great insight.
她是位有敏锐洞察力的女性。
His intelligence for business is outstanding.
他在商业上有着非凡的敏锐度。
Skincare products of inferior quality may irritate sensitive skin.
劣质护肤品会刺激敏感的肌肤。
Reaction to strong stimuli from the outside world is a characteristic of all animals.
凡是动物都有对外界刺激有比较灵敏感应的特性。
The lips are the most sensible parts of the body.
嘴唇是身体最敏感的部分。
She is very vulnerable to other people\'s criticism.
她对于别人的批评很敏感。
That delicate instrument can record even very slight changes.
那台敏感的仪器可以记录甚至非常轻微的变化。
The teacher chose to evade these particularly sensitive issues.
Zhè wèi lǎoshī xuǎnzé huíbì zhèxiē yóuwéi mǐngǎn de huàtí。
这位老师选择回避这些尤为敏感的话题。
Earthworms have extremely sensitive skins and cannot thrive under certain conditions.
Qiūyǐn de pí fēicháng mǐngǎn，zài tèdìngtiáojiàn xià wúfǎ shēngzhǎng。
蚯蚓的皮非常敏感，在特定条件下无法生长。
It only affects youngsters because their hearing is more acute than adults.
Zhè zhǐnéng yǐngxiǎng qīngshàonián，yīnwèi tāmen de tīngjué yào bǐ chéngniánrén língmǐn。
这只能影响青少年，因为他们的听觉要比成年人灵敏。
The mouse ran alert across the floor.
Lǎoshǔ mǐnjié de cóng dìbǎn shàng pǎo guò。
老鼠敏捷地从地板上跑过。
She felt more alert and agile in her mind.
Tā gǎndào gèngjiā jǐngjué hé jīmǐn。
她感到更加警觉和机敏。
Even Scott, who is allergic to fish, was boning fish and preparing the dishes.
Céngjīng yíxiàng duì yú bǐjiào mǐngǎn de Sīkētè yě zài tī yúgǔ zuòfàn。
曾经一向对鱼比较敏感的斯科特也在剔鱼骨做饭。
Sensitive to the criticism, the president bristled at the suggestion that war was inevitable.
Yóuyú duì pīpíngyìjiàn hěn mǐngǎn，zǒngtǒng shífēn fǎnduì zhànzhēng yǐ bùkěbìmiǎn de shuōfǎ。
由于对批评意见很敏感，总统十分反对战争已不可避免的说法。
Weakly coherent surfaces are more susceptible to sheet and wind erosion.
Niánzhuó bù láo de biǎomiàn duì piànzhuàng qīnshí hé fēngshí gèngjiā mǐngǎn。
粘着不牢的表面对片状侵蚀和风蚀更加敏感。
People with light complexioned skin are more sensitive to the sun.
Qiǎnsè pífū de rén duì yángguāng gèng mǐngǎn。
浅色皮肤的人对阳光更敏感。
Pupils sometimes respond to a site more fully if their senses are heightened.
Chūyú xuésheng yìshí de mǐngǎn，tāmen yǒushí huì duì wèizhi jùyǒu gèng chōngfèn de fǎnyìng。
出于学生意识的敏感，他们有时会对位置具有更充分的反应。
She is a very sensitive player and shows great musical ability.
Tā shì yígè hěn mǐngǎn de xuǎnshǒu，yōngyǒu hěn qiáng de yīnyuè tiānfù。
她是一个很敏感的选手，拥有很强的音乐天赋。
Hitherto, she had thought him an unusually sensitive man.
Dào mùqián wéizhǐ，tā yìzhí rènwéi tā shì yí gè hǎnjiàn de mǐngǎn de rén。
到目前为止，她一直认为他是一个罕见的敏感的人。
AIDS is a sensitive area, which many schools are unsure of how to tackle.
Àizībìng shì yí gè mǐngǎn de huàtí，xǔduō xuéxiào dōu bùzhīdào rúhé yìngduì。
艾滋病是一个敏感的话题，许多学校都不知道如何应对。
His shrewd insights on all issues would be greatly missed.
Tā mǐnruì de kànchū suǒyǒu de wèntí zhōng hěnduō dōu méi bèi fāxiàn。
她敏锐地看出所有的问题中很多都没被发现。
Westminster City Council lays down strict rules for elected persons.
Wēisīmǐnsītè chéngshì wěiyuánhuì zhìdìngle bùkě wéibèi de xuǎnjǔ rén guīdìng。
威斯敏斯特城市委员会制订了不可违背的选举人规定。
His reactions are quick and his learning capacity excellent.
Tā fǎnyìng mǐnjié，xuéxí nénglì qiáng。
他反应敏捷，学习能力强。
Another vital area in terms of sensitive political control were the national minorities.
Jiù zhèngzhì kòngzhì mǐngǎndù éryán，lìngwài yí gè zhòngyào de lǐngyù jiùshì shǎoshùmínzú。
就政治控制敏感度而言，另外一个重要的领域就是少数民族。
Penguins and elephant seals show most sensitivity to blue light.
Qǐ\'é hé hǎixiàng duì lánguāng fēicháng mǐngǎn。
企鹅和海象对蓝光非常敏感。
He\'s a quick nimble defender.
Tā shì yì míng mǐnjié línghuó de hòuwèi。
他是一名敏捷灵活的后卫。
She had a quick, sharp mind of considerable penetration.
Tā yǒu mǐnruì de tóunǎo，shēnsuì de dòngchálì。
她有敏锐的头脑，深邃的洞察力。
She is very much alive to new ideas.
Tā duì xīn de lǐniàn shífēn mǐngǎn。
她对新的理念十分敏感。
Our teacher\'s mind is as sharp as a needle.
Wǒmen lǎoshī de tóunǎo fēicháng mǐnruì。
我们老师的头脑非常敏锐。
The computer is fast on the draw
Diànnǎo sīwéi mǐnjié。
电脑思维敏捷。
He\'s been very quick at that.
Tā duìcǐ hěn jīmǐn。
他对此很机敏。
She wanted to have a feel for the car before she purchased it.
Mǎichē zhīqián，tā duì chē yǒu mǐnruì de jiànshǎnglì。
买车之前，她对车有敏锐的鉴赏力。
She was senstive and felt that somebody had designs against her life.
Tā hěn mǐngǎn，juéde yǒu rén huì hài tā。
她很敏感，觉得有人会害她。
We\'d better keep off sensitive topics.
Wǒmen zuìhǎo bìkāi mǐngǎn huàtí。
我们最好避开敏感话题。
He is able to act quickly and intelligently，so there are no flies on him.
Tā xíngdòng mǐnjié ér cōngmíng，bú huì shàngdàngshòupiàn。
他行动敏捷而聪明，不会上当受骗。
You have to be a good observer to see all the details.
Zhǐyǒu mǐnruì de guānchá zhě cáinéng kàndào suǒyǒu de xìjié。
只有敏锐的观察者才能看到所有的细节。
The sensitivity of his skin to pressure and temperature was normal.
Tā de pífū duì yālì hé wēndù de mǐngǎndù shì zhèngcháng de。
他的皮肤对压力和温度的敏感度是正常的。
The relations between town and gown are always sensitive.
Shìmín hé dàxué shīshēng zhījiān de guānxi fēicháng mǐngǎn。
市民和大学师生之间的关系非常敏感。
The steering of my new car answers to the slightest touch.
Wǒ xīnchē de fāngxiàngpán jíwéi língmǐn，shāoshāo yídòng jiù huì yǒusuǒ fǎnyìng。
我新车的方向盘极为灵敏，稍稍一动就会有所反应。
The breaks of my new car act quickly.
Wǒ xīn chē de shāchē hěn língmǐn。
我新车的刹车很灵敏。
It was a very sensitive topic.
Nà shì yí gè jí mǐngǎn de huàtí。
那是一个极敏感的话题。
A mimosa\'s leaves are sensitive to touch.
Hánxiūcǎo de yèzi duì chùmō hěn mǐngǎn。
含羞草的叶子对触摸很敏感。
He had a special antenna for public relations.
Tā zài chǔlǐ gōnggòng guānxì fāngmiàn yǒu yì zhǒng fēicháng tèshū de mǐnruì chùjiǎo。
他在处理公共关系方面有一种非常特殊的敏锐触角。
The prince was crowned in Westminster Abbey.
Wángzǐ shì zài Wēisīmǐnsītè jiàotáng jiāmiǎn de。
王子是在威斯敏斯特教堂加冕的。
He had a keen ear.
Tā tīngjué hěn mǐnruì。
他听觉很敏锐。
The nanny acted quickly by grabbing the toddler and covering him with a wet towel.
Bǎomǔ dòngzuò mǐnjié，yìbǎ zhuāzhù pánshānxuébù de háizi，bìng yòng yí kuài shīmáojīn bǎ tā gàishàng。
保姆动作敏捷，一把抓住蹒跚学步的孩子，并用一块湿毛巾把他盖上。
It is difficult for a woman to understand a man\'s sensitivity to any slur on his virility.
Nǚrén hěnnán lǐjiě nánrén duì dǐhuǐ qí nánzǐ qìgài de mǐngǎn。
女人很难理解男人对诋毁其男子气概的敏感。
Although dull at classical learning，at mathematics he was uncommonly quick.
Suīrán duì gǔdiǎn zhīshi de xuéxí yǒuxiē chídùn，dàn duì shùxué，tā què hǎnjiàn de mǐnjié。
虽然对古典知识的学习有些迟钝，但对数学，他却罕见地敏捷。
An acute observer of politics and politicians.
Yí wèi duì zhèngzhì hé zhèngzhìjiā yǒu mǐnruì yǎnguāng de guānchájiā。
一位对政治和政治家有敏锐眼光的观察家。
Observant and thoughtful，he was given to asking sagacious questions.
Mǐnruì ér shēnsī，tā xǐhuan wèn nàxiē míngzhì gāoshēn de wèntí。
敏锐而深思，他喜欢问那些明智高深的问题。
Long-term exposure to this medicine may sensitize you to the allergen.
Chángqī shǐyòng zhè zhǒng yào kěnéng huì shǐ nǐ yìyú guòmǐn。
长期使用这种药可能会使你易于过敏。
His paintings reveal a sensitive interpreter of nature.
Tā de huìhuà xiǎnshìle tā shì yí gè mǐngǎn de zìrán chǎnshìzhě。
他的绘画显示了他是一个敏感的自然阐释者。
Chaos could be prevented only by clear-sighted leadership.
Zhǐyǒu yǎnguāng mǐnruì de lǐngxiù rénwù cái néng zhìzhǐ zhè cì sāoluàn。
只有眼光敏锐的领袖人物才能制止这次骚乱。
Our inability to see everything minutely and clearly is due merely to the infirmity of our senses.
Wǒmen bù nénggòu xiángjìn qīngxī de kàndào měi yí jiàn shì，zhè jǐnjǐn shì yīnwèi wǒmen de gǎnjué búgòu língmǐn。
我们不能够详尽清晰地看到每一件事，这仅仅是因为我们的感觉不够灵敏。
The skin of old persons is less reactive than that of younger persons.
Lǎoniánrén de pífū bùrú niánqīngrén de mǐngǎn。
老年人的皮肤不如年轻人的敏感。
Dogs have a remarkable acuteness of smell.
Gǒu de xiùjué tèbié língmǐn 。
狗的嗅觉特别灵敏。
His military training desensitized him.
Tā zài jūnduì shòudào de xùnliàn shǐ tā biàn de bù mǐngǎn。
他在军队受到的训练使他变得不敏感。
He argued with great acuteness.
Tā zài biànlùn shí sīlù fēicháng mǐnruì。
他在辩论时思路非常敏锐。
Photographic film is light-sensitive.
Jiāojuǎn duì guāng hěn mǐngǎn。
胶卷对光很敏感。
He\'s as sharp as a steel trap.
Tā de tóunǎo fǎnyìng jiùxiàng bǔshòujiā yíyàng de mǐnjié。
他的头脑反应就像捕兽夹一样的敏捷。
The task was uncongenial to one sensitive to rebuffs.
Zhège gōngzuò bú tài shìhé duìyú yánlì huíjué mǐngǎn de rén。
这个工作不太适合对于严厉回绝敏感的人。
Their minds coarsened.
Tāmen de tóunǎo bù mǐnruì le。
他们的头脑不敏锐了。
He was not sensitized to her emotional needs.
Tā duì tā de qínggǎn xūqiú bù mǐngǎn。
他对她的情感需求不敏感。
He has a tin ear for dialogue.
Tā duì duìhuà quēfá mǐngǎn。
他对对话缺乏敏感。
He was keenly aware of his own shortcomings.
Tā nénggòu mǐngǎn de yìshídào zìjǐ de quēdiǎn。
他能够敏感地意识到自己的缺点。
His adroit replies to hecklers won him many followers.
Tā duì zhìwènzhě de jīmǐn yìngdá shǐ tā yíngdéle hěn duō zhuīsuízhě。
他对质问者的机敏应答使他赢得了很多追随者。
An overdelicate digestive system.
Guòyú mǐngǎn de xiāohuàxìtǒng。
过于敏感的消化系统。
He touchily refused all offers to help.
Tā mǐngǎn de jùjuéle suǒyǒu de bāngzhù。
他敏感地拒绝了所有的帮助。
A highly sensitive explosive is easily exploded by a shock.
Yí zhèndòng jiù kě qīngyì de shǐ gāo língmǐndù de zhàyào bàozhà。
一震动就可轻易的使高灵敏度的炸药爆炸。
The sensitiveness of mimosa leaves does not depend on a change of growth.
Hánxiūcǎo yèzi de mǐngǎnxìng búhuì yīn shēngzhǎng ér biànhuà。
含羞草叶子的敏感性不会因生长而变化。
I admired the keenness of his mind.
Wǒ xiànmù tā tóunǎo de mǐnruì。
我羡慕他头脑的敏锐。
The smartness of the pace soon exhausted him.
Mǐnjié de bùfá hěnkuài jiù ràng tā jīngpí-lìjié。
敏捷的步伐很快就让他精疲力竭。
He acted sensibly in the crisis.
Tā zài wēijī zhōng fǎnyìng jīmǐn。

He was acutely insightful.
Tā yǒu mǐnruì de dòngchálì。
他有敏锐的洞察力。
由于灵敏度太低，这种仪器已经被淘汰了。

Because of lack of sensitivity, the apparatus has already fallen into disuse.

这辆车的减速器性能很差，可以换一个了。

I have bought a new car and am going to pick it up next month.
那辆警车闪烁着警灯疾驰而去。
Nà liàng jǐngchē shǎnshuò zhe jǐngdēng jíchí ér qù。
The police vehicle drove away quickly with its lights flashing.
那儿有辆救火车正在进行救火演习。

A fire engine is rehearsing now.
这辆巨型卡车是我们厂新买的。

This giant truck was bought by our factory recently.

The deadhead cabbie had no passengers all day long.

At the sight of the lady\'s bicycle, she took a fancy to it and decided to buy it.
按照里程表显示的公里数，这辆车已经该报废了。

在公路上立标是为了使行驶的车辆有章可循。

Erecting signs on the road aims to provide traffic rules.
这是一座蝶式立交桥，去往各个方向的车辆井然有序。

This is a butterfly-shaped crossroads. The vehicles driving towards all directions are in good order.

I rarely use my bike lately, I have seldom used it since I bought it.

A car suddenly appeared and knocked me down.

She sped by me in a dark green roadster.

traffic

过往的车辆
guòwǎng de chēliàng
vehicular traffic

Vehicles this way!
道路施工，车辆绕行。
Dàolù shīgōng，chēliàng ràoxíng。
Detour. Road under repair.
发生车祸后，肇事车辆竟然逃离现场，目击者无不愤激。
Fāshēng chēhuò hòu，zhàoshì chēliàng jìngrán táolí xiànchǎng，mùjīzhě wúbú fènjī。
The person who caused the car accident ran away, which aroused strong indignation among the witnesses.
机动车辆禁止擅自改型。
Jīdòng chēliàng jìnzhǐ shànzì gǎixíng。
Motor vehicles are not allowed to be retrofitted without approval.
一棵大树横断在马路上，来往的车辆都堵住了。
Yì kē dàshù héngduàn zài mǎlù shàng，láiwǎng de chēliàng dōu dǔzhù le。
A huge tree crossing the street blocked the road, so all vehicles can\'t pass through.
司机开车时要遵守交通规则，做到红灯亮，车辆停。
Sījī kāichē shí yào zūnshǒu jiāotōng guīzé，zuòdào hóngdēng liàng，chēliàng tíng。
Drivers must observe the traffic rules while driving. Once the light turns to red, they must stop the car.
交通警察正在突击检查违规车辆。
Jiāotōng jǐngchá zhèngzài tūjī jiǎnchá wéiguī chēliàng。
Traffic policemen are having a surprise inspection of cars that violate traffic regulations.
在公路上立标是为了使行驶的车辆有章可循。
Zài gōnglù shànglìbiāo shì wèi le shǐ xíngshǐ de chēliàng yǒuzhāng kěxún。
Erecting signs on the road aims to provide traffic rules.
这是一座蝶式立交桥，去往各个方向的车辆井然有序。
Zhè shì yízuò diéshì lìjiāoqiáo，qùwǎng gègè fāngxiàng de chēliàng jǐngrán yǒuxù。
This is a butterfly-shaped crossroads. The vehicles driving towards all directions are in good order.
等待受检的车辆已经排成了一条长龙。
Děngdài shòujiǎn de chēliàng yǐjing páichéng le yìtiáo chánglóng。
Cars waiting to be checked have queued up like a long dragon.
我们都知道，车辆行驶到弯道的时候应该减速。
Wǒmen dōu zhīdào，chēliàng xíngshǐ dào wāndào de shíhou yīnggāi jiǎnsù。
We all know that cars should slow down on curved roads.
由于车辆的增多，市政府决定把原有的街道展宽。
Yóuyú chēliàng de zēngduō，shìzhèngfǔ juédìng bǎ yuányǒu de jiēdào zhǎnkuān。
With the surging of cars, the Municipal Government decided to broaden the original streets.
因为车辆过多，公路上很堵。
Yīnwèi chēliàng guòduō，gōnglùshàng hěndǔ。
The road was blocked due to an excessive number of vehicles.
前方修路，车辆绕行。
Qiánfāng xiūlù，chēliàng ràoxíng.
There are road-works ahead – please make a detour.
警察拦截住一辆可疑车辆进行搜查。
Jǐngchá lánjié zhù yíliàng kěyí chēliàng jìnxíng sōuchá。
The police stopped a suspicious vehicle and carried out a search.
这两辆车的间距太小了，很难再放下一辆车。
Zhè liǎngliàng chē de jiānjù tài xiǎo le，hěnnán zài fàngxià yí liàng chē。
The two cars park so closely next to each other that there is no room to place a third one between them.
车祸后，那辆车已经面目全非。
Chēhuò hòu，nà liàng chē yǐjīng miànmùquánfēi.
After the accident, the car was totally unrecognizable.
卡车装不下，格外找了一辆大车。
Kǎchē zhuāng bú xià，géwài zhǎo le yí liàng dà chē。
As the truck couldn\'t hold all the goods, an additional cart was ordered.
顺着这条车道沟，应该可以找到那辆马车。
Shùn zhe zhètiáo chēdàogōu，yīnggāi kěyǐ zhǎodào nà liàng mǎchē。
You may find the carriage along the rut.

Wǒ xīnmǎi le yí liàng chē，xià yuè qù jiēchē。

按照里程表显示的公里数，这辆车已经该报废了。

According to the miles shown on the odometer, the car should be discarded as useless.
这辆车看上去很别致。
Zhèliàngchē kànshàngqù hěnbiézhì。
This car has a unique look.
这辆车的设计不但美观，而且实用。
Zhèliàngchēde shèjì búdàn měiguān，érqiě shíyòng。

Yíliàngchē gāng guòqù。
A car just went past.

我们去出租汽车总公司联系了一辆大客车。

Zhè liàng xīnqí gǔguài de pǎochē duì wǒ láishuō shì yí cì shìjuéxiǎngshòu。
这辆新奇古怪的跑车对我来说是一次视觉享受。
He jumped from a roof and managed to land on the soft top of a passing van.
Tā cóng wūdǐng shàng tiào xiàlái，shèfǎ luòzài yí liàng lùguò de xiāng xíng huòchē de ruǎn dǐng shàng。
他从屋顶上跳下来，设法落在一辆路过的厢型货车的软顶上。
I wanted to buy the new pearl colored car.
Wǒ xiǎng mǎi zhè liàng xīn de zhēnzhūsè de chē。
我想买这辆新的珍珠色的车。
This bucket of bolts is never going to get us past that blockade.

这辆破旧不堪的汽车决不能带我们通过封锁。
Police say a car containing three men drew up outside the house in Hudson Street.

警察说那辆载有三个人的车子在哈德逊街的房子处停了下来。

你去坐左手边的车,就是慢慢驶来的那辆。
An old Ford laboured up the slope.
Yí liàng lǎoshì de Fútè qìchē chīlì de pápō。
一辆老式的福特汽车吃力地爬坡。

我那辆开了20年的老爷车终于在路上熄火了。
Seconds later an empty train travelling away from London ran into the wreckage.
Jǐ miǎo zhōng hòu yí liàng líkāi lúndūn de kōng huǒchē zhuàngshàngle nàxiē cánhái。
几秒钟后一辆离开伦敦的空火车撞上了那些残骸。
We happened to drop across an abandoned car full of money.

He\'d give his ears for a bike of his own.
Tā bùxī yíqiè dàijià yào yōngyǒu yí liàng shǔyú zìjǐ de zìxíngchē。
他不惜一切代价要拥有一辆属于自己的自行车。
The paintings were delivered to the museum in an air-conditioned armored car.
Zhèxiē yóuhuà shì yòng yí liàng zhuāngyǒu kōngtiáo de zhuāngjiǎchē yùndào bówùguǎn de。
这些油画是用一辆装有空调的装甲车运到博物馆的。
My brother is interested in muscle cars so he bought a classic Mustang.
我哥哥对大功率高速汽车很感兴趣，所以他买了一辆野马经典款。
It was a tilbury harnessed to a small white horse.
那是一辆有一匹白马驾驶的小车。
For no apparent reason, he collided with a car coming in the opposite direction.
Háowúzhēngzhào de，tā hé yí liàng cóng fǎn fāngxiàng shǐ guòlái de qìchē xiāngzhuàng le。
毫无征兆的，他和一辆从反方向驶过来的汽车相撞了。
I know you crashed my car, but don\'t worry. It\'s cool. I wanted a new one anyway.
我知道你撞坏了我的车，不过别担心。太好了，我正想换辆新的。
The car plant is designed to have a capacity of 250,000 vehicles a year.
Gāi qìchē zhìzàochǎng yùjì zuì gāo niánchǎnliàng wéi 250,000 liàng。
该汽车制造厂预计最高年产量为250,000辆。
Your asking price is not reasonable for a car with so many miles on it.
你这辆开了这么多里程数的老爷车还要价这么高，太不明智了。
A perfectly streamlined car would cut fuel bills thirty percent at thirty miles an hour.

She drives a compact that gets 40 miles to the gallon.

collect and circulate funds

他是资深的金融专家，能够处理棘手的问题。

西方的金融体系就是一个强有力的例证。
A financial system, which allocates scarce investment capital, is no different.
pèizhì xīquē tóuzī zīběn de jīnróngtǐxì yì shì rúcǐ。
配置稀缺投资资本的金融体系亦是如此。
Some senior figures in the financial world are looking for solutions to this.
yìxiē jīnrónglǐngyù zhōng de zīshēn rénshì zhèng xúnqiú jiějué zhī dào。
一些金融领域中的资深人士正寻求解决之道。
So strengthening the financial system means more capital.
yīncǐ，jiāqiáng jīnróngtǐxì yìwèi zhe gèngduō zīběnjīn。
因此，加强金融体系意味着更多资本金。
Scepticism about US financial policy is widespread in China.

在中国，人们普遍对美国金融政策怀有疑虑。

wǒ rènwéi，Jīnróngshìchǎng zǒngshì zài niǔqū de fǎnyìng xiànshí。

这篇报道损害了政治家们的声誉。
Crops can be great impairers of the soil.
Nóngzuòwù kěnéng huì duì tǔrǎng zàochéng yánzhòng sǔnhài。
农作物可能会对土壤造成严重损害。
It would have been laughable if it hadn\'t hurt so much.
Rúguǒ tā bú zàochéng zhème dà de sǔnhài，nà cái shì duōduōguàishì ne。
如果它不造成这么大的损害，那才是咄咄怪事呢。
He dishonored his family by committing a serious crime.
Tā fàn xià yánzhòng zuìxíng，sǔnhàile jiātíng míngyù。
他犯下严重罪行，损害了家庭名誉。
collateral target damage from a bombing run
Hōngzhà zàochéng de jiànjiē sǔnhài
轰炸造成的间接损害
Scars defaced her cheeks.
Shāngbā sǔnhàile tā de róngmào。
伤疤损害了她的容貌。
Screen savers prevent the damage that occurs when the same areas of light and dark are displayed too long.
Píngmùbǎohù chéngxù kě fángzhǐ yóuyú guāngliàng hé hēi\'àn qūyù de chángshíjiān xiǎnshì ér duì píngmù zàochéng de sǔnhài。
屏幕保护程序可防止由于光亮和黑暗区域的长时间显示而对屏幕造成的损害。
Check fraud can leave victims hundreds of pounds out of pocket.
支票诈骗会使受害者损失几百英镑。
The company has promised to reimburse the customer for any loss or damage.
公司已经承诺赔偿顾客遭受的一切损失或伤害。
We didn\'t get any injuries but there might be some bruised pride.
Wǒmen háofà wèi sǔn，dàn zìzūnxīn huòxǔ shòudàole shānghài。
我们毫发未损，但自尊心或许受到了伤害。
李教授的离世是学校的巨大损失，也是我们学生的巨大损失。
Lǐ jiàoshòu de líshì shì xuéxiào de jùdà sǔnshī，yě shì wǒmen xuésheng de jùdà sǔnshī。
Professor Li\'s passing was a great loss to the school, and students.
应该让喜欢损人的人感受一下被损的滋味。
Yīnggāi ràng xǐhuan sǔnrén de rén gǎnshòu yíxià bèi sǔn de zīwèi。
People who like mocking others should experience the feeling of being mocked.
人寿(海损)保险
rénshòu(hǎisǔn)bǎoxiǎn 
life (maritime) insurance
院子里杂草丛生，但房子本身完好无损。
Yuànzi lǐ zácǎo cóngshēng，dàn fángzi běnshēn wánhǎowúsǔn。
The yard is full of weeds, but the house itself is in good condition.
补偿所受的损失
bǔcháng suǒ shòu de sǔnshī 
compensate sb. for a loss
不可估量的损失
bùkě gūliáng de sǔnshī

sǔnshī cǎnzhòng

传输损耗
chuánshū sǔnhào 
transmission loss
损耗已经打进去了。
Sǔnhào yǐjing dǎ jìnqù le。
Allowances have been made for damages.
抵偿损失
dǐcháng sǔnshī 
compensate for (or make good) a loss
以损人开始，以害己告终
Yǐ sǔnrén kāishǐ, yǐ hàijǐ gàozhōng。
start with the aim of harming others and end up by harming oneself
损坏东西要赔，是我们解放军的老规矩。
Sǔnhuài dōngxi yào péi，shì wǒmen jiěfàngjūn de lǎo guīju。
To pay compensation for damage done is an old rule in our PLA.
不做有损国格的事
bú zuò yǒusǔn guógé de shì

共同(单独)海损
gòngtóng（dāndú）hǎisǔn

hǎisǔn lǐsuàn

Nàxiē wūmiè wú sǔn yú wǒmen yìgēn háomáo。

jiǎnshǎo shuǐguǒ zài yùnshū zhōng de hàosǔn

huícǎi sǔnshī

Hěnduō ɡǔdài jiànzhù zāodào huǐsǔn。

Tā tài jiǎngyìqi，sǔnhài le yuánzé。

qǐyè kuīsǔn

jiǔ bìnɡ ér kuīsǔn

wúfǎ míbǔ de sǔnshī

The machine shows scarcely any sign of wear and tear.

niǔzhuǎn qǐyè kuīsǔn

赔偿损失
péichánɡ sǔnshī
compensate (or pay) for a loss

Zhèběnshū yǒu jǐ yè yǐjing pòsǔn。
Some pages of the book are damaged.

qīngwēi de sǔnshī

她的嘴真损，老取笑人。
Tā de zuǐ zhēn sǔn，lǎo qǔxiào rén。
She has a really sharp tongue—always ridiculing people.

yāoqiú péicháng quánbùsǔnshī

看到损害群众利益的行为，我们就要进行劝阻。
Kàndào sǔnhài qúnzhòng lìyì de xíngwéi，wǒmen jiùyào jìnxíng quànzǔ。
Whenever we see a person doing something antisocial, we should try to stop him.
渗漏损失
shènlòu sǔnshī

受损失

zēngsǔn

有益无损
yǒuyì wúsǔn

Tā ài sǔnrén。
He delights in making caustic remarks.
说话别太损。
Shuōhuà bié tài sǔn。
Don\'t be so sarcastic.
这法子真损。
Zhè fǎzi zhēn sǔn。
That\'s a mean trick.

sǔnhài zhuāngjiɑ

sǔnhài jiànkāng

Sǔnhuài gōngwù yào péi。

sǔnbīngzhéjiàng

In addition to generating huge economic losses, a stock market crash will cause social turbulence.
我们鄙夷像他那样损人利己的人。
Wǒmen bǐyí xiàng tā nàyàng sǔnrénlìjǐ de rén。

这件古董残损的很厉害，不会卖出好价钱的。

The antique is too damaged to sell at a good price.

Gāng kāishǐ chǎogǔ de rén chūxiàn kuīsǔn shì chángshì。

Zhècì chēhuò shǐdé chētǐ wánquán bèi sǔnhuài le。
The car\'s body was completely destroyed after the accident.

Zuìjìn zāoyù sānliánbài，qiúduì de shìqì dàshòu cuòsǔn。
Recently, with three defeats in succession, the morale of the team has fallen greatly.
用这笔代金来补偿你们的损失吧。
Yòng zhè bǐ dàijīn lái bǔcháng nǐmen de sǔnshī ba。
We will compensate you for your damages with this allowance.
由于连年亏损，公司只能靠出卖土地抵补债务了。

这些赔款根本抵销不了他的损失。

This compensation can\'t make up for his loss at all.

Both sides lost a lot in this bloody war.
这鼎真精美，只可惜耳子有些破损了。

损坏的东西我一定照价奉赔。

他的腹背肌劳损是由于运动不当造成的。

The strain of his abdominal muscles and dorsal muscles was induced by exercising improperly.
虚假产品使一些消费者蒙受了经济损失，更有甚者，有的还能害死人。
Xūjiǎ chǎnpǐn shǐ yìxiē xiāofèizhě méngshòu le jīngjì sǔnshī，gèngyǒu shènzhě，yǒu de hái néng hàisǐ rén。
Fake products inflict economic losses on some consumers. Moreover, some of them can kill people.

Gǔyǔ shuō de hǎo，“mǎnzhāosǔn，qiānshòuyì”。
As an old saying goes: &quot;Complacency brings bad effects while modesty brings benefits.&quot;
他的骨骼肌受损，不知道什么时候恢复。
Tā de gǔgéjī shòusǔn，bùzhīdào shénme shíhou huīfù。
It is hard to tell when the injury to his skeletal muscles can recover.

Qǐgōng xiānshēng gùshì，shì Zhōngguó shūfǎjiè nǎizhì wénhuàjiè de yí dà sǔnshī。

Zhècì huòluàn chíxù le hěnjiǔ，duì rénlì wùlì dōu yǒu hěndà de sǔnshī。

这台机器的机体已经损坏，无法修复。
Zhètái jīqì de jītǐ yǐjing sǔnhuài，wúfǎ xiūfù。
The body of this machine has been damaged beyond repair.
因为经常坐在电脑前工作，我们肩胛附近的肌肉已经损伤。
Yīnwéi jīngcháng zuòzài diànnǎo qián gōngzuò，wǒmen jiānjiǎ fùjìn de jīròu yǐjing sǔnshāng。
Due to heavy work load in front of the computer, I\'ve hurt a muscle near the scapula.
今年遭遇大范围水灾，各部门领导努力保证物资供应，不让资源减损，让群众正常生活。
Jīnnián zāoyù dàfànwéi shuǐzāi，gè bùmén lǐngdǎo nǔlì bǎozhèng wùzī gōngyìng，bú ràng zīyuán jiǎnsǔn，ràng qúnzhòng zhèngcháng shēnghuó。
Many areas have been swept by floods this year; in order to make sure that people in these areas lead a normal life, cadres from all sectors have taken measures to ensure the supply of materials.
前不久，这个城市遭受了龙卷风的狂烈袭击，损失很严重。
Qián bùjiǔ，zhège chéngshì zāoshòu le lóngjuǎnfēng de kuángliè xíjī，sǔnshī hěnyánzhòng。
A ferocious tornado attacked the city not long ago, and caused serious damage.
由于我们提前采取了措施，因此这次溃堤没有造成什么损失！
Yóuyú wǒmen tíqián cǎiqǔ le cuòshī，yīncǐ zhècì kuìdī méiyǒu zàochéng shénme sǔnshī！
We had adopted advance measures, so the burst dam didn\'t cause any damage.
今年这个村遭受了严重的涝害，百姓们损失惨重。
Jīnnián zhège cūn zāoshòu le yánzhòng de làohài，bǎixìngmen sǔnshī cǎnzhòng。
This year the village has suffered a serious water logging catastrophe. The common people have had heavy losses.
院子里的篱栅大部分都破损了，赶快修一修吧。
Yuànzi lǐ de lízhà dàbùfen dōu pòsǔn le，gǎnkuài xiūyixiū ba。
Most of the fence around the yard is broken. Have it repaired quickly.
这台机器的轮盘由于长时间的使用已经磨损得差不多了。
Zhètái jīqì de lúnpán yóuyú cháng shíjiān de shǐyòng yǐjing mósǔn de chàbuduō le。
After been used for a long time, the disk of the equipment is worn.
我们要做好防潮工作，预防粮食霉损。
Wǒmen yào zuòhǎo fángcháo gōngzuò，yùfáng liángshí méisǔn。
We should take precautions against the damp, to prevent the grain from going mouldy.
这次火灾使得秘府中的古籍损失过半。
Zhècì huǒzāi shǐdé mìfǔ zhōng de gǔjí sǔnshī guòbàn。
The fire destroyed more than half of the ancient books in the secret repository.
这片棉区遭到了虫害，损失很大。
Zhè piàn miánqū zāodào le chónghài，sǔnshī hěndà。
This cotton area is infested with insects, and the economic toll is heavy.
昨天小区里闹贼了，听说被盗的那家损失惨重。
Zuótiān xiǎoqū lǐ nàozéi le，tīngshuō bèi dào de nàjiā sǔnshī cǎnzhòng。
Burglars broke into the housing estate yesterday, I heard that that family suffered heavy losses.
枪战进行了一天一夜，双方都损失惨重。
Qiāngzhàn jìnxíng le yìtiān yí yè，shuāngfāng dōu sǔnshī cǎnzhòng。
The gunfight endured all day long, both sides suffering heavy loss.
这座桥的桥桩破损厉害，专家担心它已不能负重。
Zhèzuò qiáo de qiáozhuāng pòsǔn lìhai，zhuānjiā dānxīn tā yǐ bùnéng fùzhòng。
The pier of the bridge has been so badly damaged that experts worry it is unable to bear weight.
热膨胀效应经常会造成一些机器的损坏。
Rèpéngzhàng xiàoyìng jīngcháng huì zàochéng yìxiē jīqì de sǔnhuài。
Heat effect often leads to damage to some machines.
这次台风给附近的桑农带来了不小的损失。
Zhècì táifēng gěi fùjìn de sāngnóng dàilái le bùxiǎo de sǔnshī。
The typhoon has brought great losses to the nearby mulberry planters.
纪念碑的上部已经被严重损坏，需要进行修补了。
Jìniànbēi de shàngbù yǐjing bèi yánzhòng sǔnhuài，xūyào jìnxíng xiūbǔ le。
The upper part of the monument has been seriously broken, and needs to be repaired.
这台摄像机的摄像管损坏了，要更换一个新的。
Zhètái shè xiàng jī de shè xiàng guǎn sǔnhuài le，yào gēnghuàn yígè xīn de。

shòu sǔnshī
suffer losses
遭受损失
zāoshòu sǔnshī
sustain losses

补偿所受的损失

compensate sb. for a loss

zāoshòu zhóngdà sǔnshī
suffer (or sustain) heavy losses

méngshòule jùdà sǔnshī
suffer a great loss

pay great attention to basic theoretical research
你刚来这里工作，要多用时间打基础。

Since you are a newcomer here, you should give a great sum of time in laying the foundations.
想成为舞蹈家，你必须打下良好的基础。

You must have a solid foundation to be a dancer.

We should act like a ramming machine, and lay a solid foundation.
老师说，没有夯实的基础就不能举一反三。
Lǎoshī shuō，méiyǒu hāngshí de jīchǔ jiù bùnéng jǔyīfǎnsān。
The teacher said that we can not learn through analogy, unless we have a solid foundation.
要想把学习搞上去，就要狠抓基础。

Please give us some advice as to what is the best way to do it.
将军命令作战参谋写了份战表。
Jiāngjūn mìnglìng zuòzhàn cānmóu xiě le fèn zhànbiǎo。
The general ordered its strategy adviser to write a letter issuing a challenge.
你帮我参谋一下，看他俩谁更优秀。
Nǐ bāng wǒ cānmóuyíxià，kàn tāliǎ shuí gèngyōuxiù。
I need you to give me some advice – who do you think is the best out of those two?
参谋
打入敌军参谋部。
作战参谋
找个有经验的人当参谋
这件事我给你参谋一下吧
他在司令员手下当过参谋。
当好领导的参谋和助手。
He was held in solitary confinement in the General Intelligence headquarters and was reportedly tortured.
Tā bèi dāndú jiānjìn zài cānmóubù zǒngbù，bìngqiě jùshuō bèi yánxíng kǎowèn。
他被单独监禁在参谋部总部，并且据说被严刑拷问。
to be a party to a conspiracy
阴谋的参与者
He had a hand in the plot to assassinate the president.
Tā cānyùle ànshā zǒngtǒng de mìmóu。
他参与了暗杀总统的密谋。
我们的意见不谋而合。
Wǒmen de yìjiàn bùmóu\'érhé。
Our views happened to coincide.
不谋而合
bùmóu\'érhé
agree without prior (or previous) consultation; happen to hold the same view
不谋而合
bùmóu\'érhé
agree without prior consultation
不谋而合
小叔是个坦克手，他在坦克上照的照片，看起来真神气。
Xiǎoshū shì gè tǎnkèshǒu，tā zài tǎnkè shàng zhào de zhàopiàn，kànqǐlái zhēn shénqì。
My uncle is a tank soldier, he looks really good on a tank in this picture.
小磊的叔叔是名检察官，为人十分正直。
Xiǎo Lěi de shūshu shì míng jiǎncháguān，wéirén shífēn zhèngzhí。
Xiao Ming\'s uncle is a righteous public prosecutor.
叔叔家的小狗总是把掉在地上的线团当玩具。
Shūshu jiā de xiǎogǒu zǒngshì bǎ diàozài dìshàng de xiàntuán dāng wánjù。
The puppy in my uncle\'s always plays with balls of thread which fall to the ground.
小芳总是管乡下二叔的儿子叫“乡下佬”。
Xiǎo Fāng zǒngshì guǎn xiāngxià èrshū de érzi jiào xiāngxiàlǎo。
Xiao Fang always call her uncle\'s son &quot;a country boy&quot;.
他从小就过继给了他的叔叔。
Tā cóngxiǎo jiù guòjì gěile tāde shūshu。
He was adopted by his uncle when he was little.
叔婆今年添了个小孙孙，高兴得整日合不拢嘴。
Shūpó jīnnián tiān legè xiǎosūnsūn，gāoxìng de zhěngrì hébùlǒng zuǐ。
Getting a little grandson this year, my husband\'s aunt is so happy that she smiled all day long.
小叔子。
I will visti my uncle, who lives in a small village.
我会去拜访我叔叔，他住在一个小村庄里。
小芳总是管乡下二叔的儿子叫“乡下佬”。
Xiǎo Fāng zǒngshì guǎn xiāngxià èrshū de érzi jiào xiāngxiàlǎo。
Xiao Fang always call her uncle\'s son &quot;a country boy&quot;.
我卧病在床时叔叔买了些太子参给我滋补身子。
Wǒ wòbìng zài chuáng shí shūshu mǎi le xiē tàizǐsēn gěi wǒ zībǔ shēnzi。
When I was sick and bedridden, my uncle bought me some caryophyllaceous ginseng, hoping that it would bring me a quick recovery.
叔叔三十二岁才生了一个儿子，稀罕得不得了。
Shūshu sānshíèr suì cái shēng le yígè érzi，xīhan de bùdéliǎo。
My uncle had a son when he was 32, which he treasured very much.
叔叔一直为娶到一位贤德的妻子而骄傲。
Shūshu yìzhí wèi qǔdào yíwèi xiándé de qīzǐ ér jiāo\'ào。
My uncle is always proud of having a virtuous wife.
叔叔总是喜欢在亲朋好友面前显扬自己的宝贝儿子。
Shūshu zǒngshì xǐhuan zài qīnpéng hǎoyǒu miànqián xiǎnyáng zìjǐ de bǎobèi érzi。
My uncle always likes to brag about the worthy son of his in front of his relatives.
小叔子。
My uncle tilled the soil with mules and plows
我叔叔用骡子和犁耕地。
He was granted bail to his uncle\'s house.
Tā bèi zhǔn yǔ bǎoshì dào tā shūshu de fángzi zhōng。
他被准予保释到他叔叔的房子中。
叔岳。
叔叔忙着呢，你别捣乱。
Shūshu máng zhe ne，nǐ bié dǎoluàn。
Uncle\'s busy. Don\'t disturb him.
少先队员说道：“我们要向雷锋叔叔学习。”
Shàoxiānduìyuán shuōdào:“wǒmen yào xiàng Léi Fēng shūshu xuéxí。”
&quot;We must learn from Uncle Lei Feng,&quot; said the Young Pioneer.
我叔叔在澳洲拥有一个私人牧场。
Wǒ shūshu zài Àozhōu yōngyǒu yígè sīrén mùchǎng。
My uncle has a farm in Australia.
他跟剧团里的叔叔学会了吹梆笛。
Tā gēn jùtuán lǐ de shūshu xuéhuì le chuī bāngdí。
He learned how to play bamboo flute from a man in a troupe.
这枚戈比是一个俄罗斯叔叔给的。
Zhè méi gēbǐ shì yígè Éluósī shūshu gěi de。
The kopeck was given by an uncle from Russia.
我认识一个收集古币的叔叔，他的收藏非常丰富。
Wǒ rènshi yígè shōují gǔbì de shūshu，tā de shōucáng fēicháng fēngfù。
I know an old man who collects ancient coins and possesses an extensive collection.
他刚生下来就过房给他叔叔了。
Tā gāng shēngxiàlái jiù guòfáng gěi tā shūshu le。
He was adopted by his uncle soon after he was born.
他准备托人带一封简札给远方的叔叔。
Tā zhǔnbèi tuō rén dài yì fēng jiǎnzhá gěi yuǎnfāng de shūshu。
He intends to have someone take the letter to his uncle, who is living far away.
我叔叔今天从北京回来，我们要去火车站接车。
Wǒ shūshu jīntiān cóng Běijīng huílái，wǒmen yào qù huǒchēzhàn jiēchē。
My uncle is coming back from Beijing today, so I am going to pick him up at the train station.
作为晚辈，你理该去看望生病的叔叔。
Zuòwéi wǎnbèi，nǐ lǐgāi qù kànwàng shēngbìng de shūshu。
As a junior, you should go to visit your ailing uncle.
那个戴着箬笠在雨中捕鱼的人是我叔叔。
Nàgè dài zhe ruòlì zài yǔ zhōng bǔyú de rén shì wǒ shūshū。
The man wearing a bamboo hat, and fishing in the rain was my uncle.
我卧病在床时叔叔买了些太子参给我滋补身子。
Wǒ wòbìng zài chuáng shí shūshu mǎi le xiē tàizǐsēn gěi wǒ zībǔ shēnzi。
When I was sick and bedridden, my uncle bought me some caryophyllaceous ginseng, hoping that it would bring me a quick recovery.
叔叔是个老水手了，一直都在跑外洋。
Shūshu shì gè lǎoshuǐshǒu le，yìzhí dōu zài pǎo wàiyáng。
My uncle is an experienced sailor, who has always sailed in remote seas.
叔叔新买了栋别墅，光卫生间就有四个。
Shūshu xīnmǎi le dòng biéshù，guāng wèishēngjiān jiù yǒu sì gè。
My uncle recently bought a villa with four toilets in it.
叔叔是南京图书馆专门负责制文献检索的工作人员。
Shūshu shì Nánjīng túshūguǎn zhuānmén fùzé zhìwénxiàn jiǎnsuǒ de gōngzuò rényuán。
My uncle is responsible for file searching in the Nanjing Library.
叔叔三十二岁才生了一个儿子，稀罕得不得了。
Shūshu sānshíèr suì cái shēng le yígè érzi，xīhan de bùdéliǎo。
My uncle had a son when he was 32, which he treasured very much.
叔叔的下颏上有一颗痣。
Shūshu de xiàkē shàng yǒu yì kē zhì。
My uncle has a mole on his chin.
叔叔一直为娶到一位贤德的妻子而骄傲。
Shūshu yìzhí wèi qǔdào yíwèi xiándé de qīzǐ ér jiāo\'ào。
My uncle is always proud of having a virtuous wife.

My uncle always likes to brag about the worthy son of his in front of his relatives.
叔叔家的小狗总是把掉在地上的线团当玩具。
Shūshu jiā de xiǎogǒu zǒngshì bǎ diàozài dìshàng de xiàntuán dāng wánjù。
The puppy in my uncle\'s always plays with balls of thread which fall to the ground.
父亲很舍不得张叔叔离开，坚持要去车站相送。
Fùqīn hěn shěbùdé Zhāng shūshu líkāi，jiānchí yào qù chēzhàn xiāngsòng。
My father is reluctant to let Uncle Zhang leave and insists on seeing him off at the train station.
叔叔临终前托付的事情你一定要办到。
Shūshu lín zhōng qián tuōfù de shìqing nǐ yídìng yào bàndào。
You must do what uncle told you to do at his deathbed.
叔叔在公司里根本就是个橡皮图章。
Shūshu zài gōngsī lǐ gēnběn jiùshì gè xiàng pí túzhāng。
My uncle has only name but no real power in his company.
叔叔一向行迹不定，你很难找到他。
Shūshu yí xiàng xíngjì búdìng，nǐ hěn nán zhǎodào tā。
Uncle has no fixed whereabouts. It will be difficult for you to find him.
叔叔在这家寺庙当行者。
Shūshu zài zhè jiā sìmiào dāng xíngzhě。
Uncle is a non-tonsured monk in this temple.
叔叔刚刚请人从欧洲带回一枝名贵的渔竿。
Shūshu gānggāng qǐng rén cóng Ōuzhōu dàihuí yìzhī míngguì de yúgān。
Uncle just asked someone to bring back an expensive fishing rod.
小磊的叔叔是名检察官，为人十分正直。
Xiǎo Lěi de shūshu shì míng jiǎncháguān，wéirén shífēn zhèngzhí。
Xiao Ming\'s uncle is a righteous public prosecutor.
叔叔是市公安局刑事警察大队的大队长。
Shūshu shì shì gōng\'ānjú xíngshì jǐngchá dàduì de dàduìzhǎng。
Uncle is chief of the criminal police of the city police bureau.
叔叔是一名引水员，每天工作非常辛苦。
Shūshu shì yìmíng yǐnshuǐyuán，měitiān gōngzuò fēicháng xīnkǔ。
My uncle is a pilot who works very hard every day.
他从小就过继给了他的叔叔。
Tā cóngxiǎo jiù guòjì gěile tāde shūshu。
He was adopted by his uncle when he was little.

My uncle arrived here this afternoon on a surprise visit.

My uncle is six feet tall.
我叔叔有六英尺高。

My uncle is a religious man and he has been strictly observing the tithe rule.
我的叔叔是个虔诚的人，他一直严格遵守十一奉制度。
My uncle tilled the soil with mules and plows
我叔叔用骡子和犁耕地。
My uncle died when I was six so I only have a vague memory of him.
我的叔叔在我六岁的时候去世了，所以我对他只有模糊的印象。
My uncle had a surgery to remove a blood clot from his blood vessel.
我叔叔做了手术，移除了血管中的血块。
I will visti my uncle, who lives in a small village.
我会去拜访我叔叔，他住在一个小村庄里。
My uncle trains spots to sport fishes.
我叔叔训练斑头鸽抓鱼。
Two of my uncles died from heart trouble.
Wǒ de liǎng gè shūshu dōu sǐ yú xīnzàngbìng。
我的两个叔叔都死于心脏病。
Uncle Roberto crept downstairs with a cricket bat to find out why the door had slammed.
Luóbócí shūshu názhe bǎn qiúpāi huǎnmàn xià lóutī，kànkàn wèishénme mén pēng de guān shàng le。
罗伯茨叔叔拿着板球拍缓慢下楼梯，看看为什么门砰地关上了。
He was granted bail to his uncle\'s house.
Tā bèi zhǔn yǔ bǎoshì dào tā shūshu de fángzi zhōng。
他被准予保释到他叔叔的房子中。
I got a lot of money from my wealthy uncle.
Wǒ cóng wǒ fùyù de shūshu nàlǐ dédào yí dà bǐ qián。
我从我富裕的叔叔那里得到一大笔钱。
He advanced to his Uncle with the wafer of communion bread in his hand.
Tā shǒuli názhe shèngcān miànbāo hé shèngbǐng，xiàng tā shūshu zǒuqù。
他手里拿着圣餐面包和圣饼，向他叔叔走去。
He entered upon a large inheritance from his uncle.
tā cóng shūshu nàlǐ jìchéngle yì bǐ pángdà de yíchǎn。
他从叔叔那里继承了一笔庞大的遗产。
He was given the run of his uncle \'s library.
Tā bèi zhǔnxǔ shǐyòng tā shūshu de cángshūshì。
他被准许使用他叔叔的藏书室。
I \'m going to ring up my uncle.
Wǒ yào gěi wǒ shūshu dǎ diànhuà。
我要给我叔叔打电话。
An appeal to his uncle was his last resort.
Xiàng tā shūshu de yí cì qiúzhù shì tā de shàng yí cì tóubèn。
向他叔叔的一次求助是他的上一次投奔。
Many fond hopes are pinned on rich uncles.
Xǔduō xīwàng dōu jìtuō zài le yǒuqián shūshu de shēnshàng。
许多希望都寄托在了有钱叔叔的身上。
My uncle rings every Sunday at the local church.
Wǒ shūshu měi gè xīngqītiān zài Dāngdì jiàotáng qiāo zhōng。
我叔叔每个星期天在当地教堂敲钟。
叔婆今年添了个小孙孙，高兴得整日合不拢嘴。

Getting a little grandson this year, my husband\'s aunt is so happy that she smiled all day long.
她是个贤惠和善的媳妇，嫁到夫家后，把婆媳叔嫂关系处理得很融洽。
Tā shì gè xiánhuì héshàn de xífù，jiàdào fūjiā hòu，bǎ póxí shūsǎo guānxì chǔlǐ de hěnróngqià。
She is a virtuous and kind daughter-in-law, getting along well with her husband\'s brothers and sisters-in-law after marriage.
叔婆。
父母死后，他和叔父同居。
Fùmǔ sǐ hòu，tā hé shūfù tóngjū。
After his parents died, he lived with his uncle.
我的叔公是位慈祥可爱的老人。
Wǒ de shūgōng shì wèi cíxiáng kě\'ài de lǎorén。
My husband\'s uncle is a kind and lovely elderly man.
叔叔在公司里根本就是个橡皮图章。

Uncle is chief of the criminal police of the city police bureau.
他控制不住自己，说了几句话，冲犯了他叔父。
Tā kòngzhì bú zhù zìjǐ，shuō le jǐ jù huà，chōngfàn le tā shūfù。
He forgot himself and said something that offended his uncle.
父母死后，他和叔父同居。
Fùmǔ sǐ hòu，tā hé shūfù tóngjū。
After his parents died, he lived with his uncle.

堂房叔父
Uncle waited up for me and was so cross that I was really frightened.

叔父为了等我一直没睡，他那么生气，真把我给吓着了。
叔伯兄弟

Nàgè dài zhe ruòlì zài yǔ zhōng bǔyú de rén shì wǒ shūshū。
The man wearing a bamboo hat, and fishing in the rain was my uncle.
我卧病在床时叔叔买了些太子参给我滋补身子。
Wǒ wòbìng zài chuáng shí shūshu mǎi le xiē tàizǐsēn gěi wǒ zībǔ shēnzi。
When I was sick and bedridden, my uncle bought me some caryophyllaceous ginseng, hoping that it would bring me a quick recovery.
叔叔是个老水手了，一直都在跑外洋。
Shūshu shì gè lǎoshuǐshǒu le，yìzhí dōu zài pǎo wàiyáng。
My uncle is an experienced sailor, who has always sailed in remote seas.
叔叔新买了栋别墅，光卫生间就有四个。
Shūshu xīnmǎi le dòng biéshù，guāng wèishēngjiān jiù yǒu sì gè。
My uncle recently bought a villa with four toilets in it.
叔叔是南京图书馆专门负责制文献检索的工作人员。
Shūshu shì Nánjīng túshūguǎn zhuānmén fùzé zhìwénxiàn jiǎnsuǒ de gōngzuò rényuán。
My uncle is responsible for file searching in the Nanjing Library.
叔叔三十二岁才生了一个儿子，稀罕得不得了。
Shūshu sānshíèr suì cái shēng le yígè érzi，xīhan de bùdéliǎo。
My uncle had a son when he was 32, which he treasured very much.
叔叔的下颏上有一颗痣。
Shūshu de xiàkē shàng yǒu yì kē zhì。
My uncle has a mole on his chin.
叔叔一直为娶到一位贤德的妻子而骄傲。
Shūshu yìzhí wèi qǔdào yíwèi xiándé de qīzǐ ér jiāo\'ào。
My uncle is always proud of having a virtuous wife.
叔叔总是喜欢在亲朋好友面前显扬自己的宝贝儿子。
Shūshu zǒngshì xǐhuan zài qīnpéng hǎoyǒu miànqián xiǎnyáng zìjǐ de bǎobèi érzi。
My uncle always likes to brag about the worthy son of his in front of his relatives.
叔叔家的小狗总是把掉在地上的线团当玩具。
Shūshu jiā de xiǎogǒu zǒngshì bǎ diàozài dìshàng de xiàntuán dāng wánjù。
The puppy in my uncle\'s always plays with balls of thread which fall to the ground.
父亲很舍不得张叔叔离开，坚持要去车站相送。
Fùqīn hěn shěbùdé Zhāng shūshu líkāi，jiānchí yào qù chēzhàn xiāngsòng。
My father is reluctant to let Uncle Zhang leave and insists on seeing him off at the train station.
叔叔临终前托付的事情你一定要办到。
Shūshu lín zhōng qián tuōfù de shìqing nǐ yídìng yào bàndào。
You must do what uncle told you to do at his deathbed.
叔叔在公司里根本就是个橡皮图章。
Shūshu zài gōngsī lǐ gēnběn jiùshì gè xiàng pí túzhāng。
My uncle has only name but no real power in his company.
叔叔一向行迹不定，你很难找到他。
Shūshu yí xiàng xíngjì búdìng，nǐ hěn nán zhǎodào tā。
Uncle has no fixed whereabouts. It will be difficult for you to find him.
叔叔在这家寺庙当行者。
Shūshu zài zhè jiā sìmiào dāng xíngzhě。
Uncle is a non-tonsured monk in this temple.
叔叔刚刚请人从欧洲带回一枝名贵的渔竿。
Shūshu gānggāng qǐng rén cóng Ōuzhōu dàihuí yìzhī míngguì de yúgān。
Uncle just asked someone to bring back an expensive fishing rod.
小磊的叔叔是名检察官，为人十分正直。
Xiǎo Lěi de shūshu shì míng jiǎncháguān，wéirén shífēn zhèngzhí。
Xiao Ming\'s uncle is a righteous public prosecutor.
叔叔是市公安局刑事警察大队的大队长。
Shūshu shì shì gōng\'ānjú xíngshì jǐngchá dàduì de dàduìzhǎng。
Uncle is chief of the criminal police of the city police bureau.
叔叔是一名引水员，每天工作非常辛苦。
Shūshu shì yìmíng yǐnshuǐyuán，měitiān gōngzuò fēicháng xīnkǔ。
My uncle is a pilot who works very hard every day.
他从小就过继给了他的叔叔。
Tā cóngxiǎo jiù guòjì gěile tāde shūshu。
He was adopted by his uncle when he was little.
他控制不住自己，说了几句话，冲犯了他叔父。
Tā kòngzhì bú zhù zìjǐ，shuō le jǐ jù huà，chōngfàn le tā shūfù。
He forgot himself and said something that offended his uncle.
村里传说他叔要从国外回来了。
Cūn lǐ chuánshuō tā shū yào cóngguówài huílái le。
The villagers are all saying that his uncle is soon coming home from abroad.

After his parents died, he lived with his uncle.
我的叔公是位慈祥可爱的老人。

My husband\'s uncle is a kind and lovely elderly man.
叔婆今年添了个小孙孙，高兴得整日合不拢嘴。
Shūpó jīnnián tiān legè xiǎosūnsūn，gāoxìng de zhěngrì hébùlǒng zuǐ。
Getting a little grandson this year, my husband\'s aunt is so happy that she smiled all day long.
她是个贤惠和善的媳妇，嫁到夫家后，把婆媳叔嫂关系处理得很融洽。
Tā shì gè xiánhuì héshàn de xífù，jiàdào fūjiā hòu，bǎ póxí shūsǎo guānxì chǔlǐ de hěnróngqià。
She is a virtuous and kind daughter-in-law, getting along well with her husband\'s brothers and sisters-in-law after marriage.
小叔是个坦克手，他在坦克上照的照片，看起来真神气。
Xiǎoshū shì gè tǎnkèshǒu，tā zài tǎnkè shàng zhào de zhàopiàn，kànqǐlái zhēn shénqì。
My uncle is a tank soldier, he looks really good on a tank in this picture.
小芳总是管乡下二叔的儿子叫“乡下佬”。

她是我叔伯妹妹。

Uncle waited up for me and was so cross that I was really frightened.

the four large rivers—the Changjiang, the Huanghe, the Heilongjiang and the Zhujiang
珠江的一条支流
Zhū Jiāng de yìtiáo zhīliú 
a tributary of the Zhujiang River

珠江三角洲是外商投资的福地。

珠峰北坳
zhūfēng běi\'ào 
the North Col of Mount Qomolangma (Mount Everest)
珠峰的新绝对高程数据为8844.43米。
Zhūfēng de xīn juéduì gāochéng shùjù wéi bāqiānbābǎisìshísìdiǎnsìsān mǐ。
According to the latest figures, the height of Mount Qomolangma is 8848.43 meters.
他们登上了珠峰，创造了奇迹。
Tāmen dēngshàng le zhūfēng，chuàngzào le qíjì。
They have miraculously climbed to the top of Mount Qomolangma.
珠穆朗玛峰是世界第一高峰。

Mount Qomolangma (Everest) is the world\'s highest peak.
珠穆朗玛峰是世界第一高峰。

Mount Qomolangma is the highest summit in the world.

攀登珠穆朗玛峰是一项极大的挑战。

火炬现在正在珠穆朗玛峰顶。
They would attempt the mount of Everest in the morning.

他们将在早上尝试攀爬珠穆朗玛峰。
For most of us, the thought of having to climb Everest would induce a heart attack.
Duì wǒmen dàduōshù rén éryán，dēngshàng Zhūmùlǎngmǎfēng de zhège niàntou huì ràng rén gǎndào xīnjīngròutiào。
对我们大多数人而言，登上珠穆朗玛峰的这个念头会让人感到心惊肉跳。
Many mountaineers go up mt. Everest but not all summit.

a jeweller\'s (shop)

zhūbǎoshānɡ 
jeweller

According to the latest figures, the height of Mount Qomolangma is 8848.43 meters.
一颗大大的汗珠从他的额头滚落下来。
Yì kē dàdà de hànzhū cóng tā de étóu gǔnluò xiàlái。
A big bead of sweat rolls down from his forehead.
他患有结石病，一病发就疼得汗珠直淌。
Tā huànyǒu jiéshíbìng，yí bìngfā jiù téng de hànzhū zhítǎng。
He has lithiasis, and the violent pain makes him sweat.
这对娇儿痴女是他的掌上明珠。
Zhè duì jiāoér chīnǚ shì tā de zhǎngshàng míngzhū。
He dotes on his little son and daughter.
传说中鲛人泪可以化为珍珠。
Chuánshuōzhōng jiāorénlèi kěyǐ huàwéi zhēnzhū。
According to the tale, the tears of shark-people can be turned into pearls.
东方明珠岿然不动地屹立在浦东新区。

The &quot;East Bright Pearl&quot; stands erect and unshakable in Pudong, Shanghai.
莲座上的莲花还带着水珠，看着清新漂亮。
Liánzuò shàng de liánhuā hái dài zhe shuǐzhū，kàn zhe qīngxīn piàoliàng。
The lotus flowers on the bottom of lotus seeds are still with beads, which look quite fresh and beautiful.
他讲故事时生动风趣妙语联珠，大家都很喜欢听。
Tā jiǎng gùshì shí shēngdòng fēngqù miàoyǔ liánzhū，dàjiā dōu hěnxǐhuan tīng。
When he tells stories, he narrates vividly and humourously, making witty remarks. Every one likes to listen.
他口才很好，说出话来妙语连珠。
Tā kǒucái hěnhǎo，shuōchūhuàlái miàoyǔliánzhū。
He is eloquent, and has endless witty remarks.
他的爱好是清玩珠宝。
Tā de àihào shì qīngwán zhūbǎo。
He likes to admire the beauty of jewelry.
一滴清莹的泪珠从她面颊上滑了下来。
Yì dī qīngyíng de lèizhū cóng tā miànjiáshàng huá le xiàlái。
A glistening tear slid down from her cheek.
她不像年轻时那样漂亮了，真是人老珠黄啊。
Tā bú xiàng niánqīng shí nàyàng piàoliàng le，zhēnshì rénlǎo zhūhuáng a。
Like a pearl yellows with age, she is not as beautiful as she used to be.

The abacus fell down on the ground, and the beads went everywhere.
她是个算盘珠似的人，从来做事都是缺乏主动性的。
Tā shì gè suànpanzhū sì de rén，cónglái zuòshì dōushì quēfá zhǔdòngxìng de。

他为联合国做翻译。
His intent was to provide a new translation.

他的目标是提供一种新的翻译。
She rendered the French poem into English.
Tā bǎ zhè shǒu fǎyǔ shī fānyìchéng yīngyǔ。
她把这首法语诗翻译成英语。
His books are eminently translatable.
Tā de shū tèbié róngyì fānyì。
他的书特别容易翻译。
The translation is...light-handed...and generally unobtrusive.
Zhè piān fānyì de hěn qiǎomiào，zǒngtǐshàng bù xiǎnde tángtū。
这篇翻译得很巧妙，总体上不显得唐突。
同声传译
tóngshēngchuányì 
simultaneous interpretation
有七种语言的同声传译设备
yǒu qī zhǒng yǔyán de tóngshēngchuányì shèbèi 
be provided with facilities for simultaneous interpretation in seven languages
《水浒传》有英译本。
In this case interpreting is taken to mean both consecutive and simultaneous interpreting.
Zài zhège ànlì zhōng，fānyì yào cǎiqǔ jiāotì chuányì hé tóngshēng chuányì liǎng zhǒng fāngshì。
在这个案例中，翻译要采取交替传译和同声传译两种方式。
a running translation
同声传译
I am competent in consecutive interpreting related to medical and legal fields.
我可能胜任医学和法律领域的交替传译工作。
Mia is capable of consecutive interpreting.
米厄可以做交替传译。
Understanding protein folding is the next step in deciphering the genetic code.
Pòyì yíchuánmìmǎ de xià yí bù shì liǎojiě dànbáizhì zhédié。
破译遗传密码的下一步是了解蛋白质折叠。

Wǒmen jiéhuòle chuánshū xìnhào bìng kāishǐ pòyì。
我们截获了传输信号并开始破译。

It is impossible to translate the whole report in one day. Please just translate the more important passages.
虽然他翻译了全文，但却遗落了最重要的部分。

Although he translated the full text, he left out the most important part.
这部小说译得不太好，需要重译
Accuracy is essential in a translation.
翻译的准确性很重要。
Note-taking is very important when you interpret a long talk.

楼下的小朋友聚在一起炫耀自己的溜溜球。

Children gather together downstairs to show off their yo-yos.
过春节的时候，他的儿女们都齐聚满堂。
Guò chūnjié de shíhou，tā de érnǚmen dōu qíjù mǎntáng。
In Spring Festival, his children all gathered in the room.
他的那般朋友每次聚会都会喝醉酒。
Tā de nàbān péngyou měi cì jùhuì dōuhuì hēzuìjiǔ。
His friends got drunk at every party.
好友聚会时，她表演了一段京剧的南梆子唱段。

Three years after we graduated, we organized a reunion.

When everybody was having lively fun together, he chose to sit alone, lost in his thoughts.
民间传说每年七夕节是牛郎和织女聚会的日子。
Mínjiān chuánshuō měinián qīxījié shì niúláng hé zhīnǚ jùhuì de rìzi。
It is said in folk legends that the Herd-boy and Weaving-girl get together every Chinese valentine\'s day.
破五的习俗是指正月初五这天家人团聚一堂，吃饺子。

The custom of Po Wu means that family members reunite to eat dumplings on the fifth day of the first lunar month.
这条针织的围巾仿佛是千里鹅毛，凝聚了她太多的情意。
Zhè tiáo zhēnzhī de wéijīn fǎngfú shì qiānlǐ émáo，níngjù le tā tài duō de qíngyì。

今天下午的聚餐，我们吃的是海鲜全席！

For the meal this afternoon, we shall eat only sea food!

Drinking tea and chatting with some friends in a waterside pavilion is an really elegant kind of party.

我们的储备粮有限，必须尽快找到新的粮食来源。

他们正在存蓄过冬吃的粮食。

They are storing up grain for the winter.
几场战役下来，敌军的粮食消耗殆尽。
Jǐ chǎng zhànyì xiàlái，díjūn de liángshí xiāohào dàijìn。
After several battles, the enemy practically has no food.
这些粮食再不倒仓就会霉变。
Zhèxiē liángshí zài bùdǎocāng jiùhuì méibiàn。
The grain will grow mold if we don\'t take it into the open air.
这几间倒座儿房冬天可以用来储存粮食。
Zhè jǐ jiān dàozuòr fáng dōngtiān kěyǐ yònglái chǔcún liángshí。
These rooms opposite to the main house can be used to store rice in winter.
晾晒之后，这些粮食都掉秤了。
Liàngshài zhīhòu，zhèxiē liángshí dōu diàochèng le。
The rice has become lighter after drying in the sun.
新收的粮食必须在翻晒之后，才能进仓库。
Xīn shōu de liángshi bìxū zài fānshài zhīhòu，cáinéng jìn cāngkù。
The newly harvested grain must be turned over on the threshing ground before being put in storage.
有了新的灌溉技术，伏旱天粮食也不会减产。
Yǒu le xīn de guàngài jìshù，fúhàntiān liángshí yě búhuì jiǎnchǎn。
With the new irrigation technology, the land will yield no less grain even in dry weather.
放粮食的柜子中总有怪声，我怀疑里边有老鼠。
Fàng liángshí de guìzi zhōng zǒngyǒu guàishēng，wǒ huáiyí lǐbian yǒu lǎoshǔ。
There are always strange sounds coming from the grain cabinet. I guess that there are mouse in there.
今年的洪涝灾害，造成粮食颗粒无收。
Jīnnián de hónglào zāihài，zàochéng liángshí kēlì wúshōu。
This year\'s waterlog disaster made the crop unharvestable.
这家粮行的粮食品种最全，价格也最公道。
Zhè jiāliángháng de liángshí pǐnzhǒng zuì quán，jiàgé yě zuì gōngdào。
The grain corporation has the most types of grain, and its price is also the most reasonable.
农村都实行了轮栽，粮食产量有了显著提高。
Nóngcūn dōu shíxíng le lúnzāi，liángshí chǎnliàng yǒu le xiǎnzhù tígāo。
Crop rotations are exercised in the country, which increases the output of crops remarkably.
今年又是一个丰收年，粮食满仓。
Jīnnián yòushì yígè fēngshōunián，liángshí mǎncāng。
This is another bumper harvest year, the storehouse is full of grain.
我们要做好防潮工作，预防粮食霉损。
Wǒmen yào zuòhǎo fángcháo gōngzuò，yùfáng liángshí méisǔn。
We should take precautions against the damp, to prevent the grain from going mouldy.
平籴是一种利国利民的粮食收购制度。
Píngdí shì yìzhǒng lìguó lìmín de liángshí shōugòu zhìdù。
Selling the grain stored in public granaries at fair prices in famine years is a grain purchase system which is good both for the country and its people.
我们要最大限度地开发山荒来种植粮食。
Wǒmen yào zuì dà xiàndù de kāifā shānhuāng lái zhòngzhí liángshi。
We will exploit the waste land on the mountain by planting the maximum possible crops.
要下雨了，赶紧把粮食苫盖好。
Yào xiàyǔ le，gǎnjǐn bǎ liángshishān gàihǎo。
It is going to rain. Hurry to cover the grain.
这个摊群大部分都是卖粮食的摊位。

The group of stalls here sell grain.
粮站里现在还用瓝子存放粮食吗？？

Are they still using rough-wrought mats to store grain in depot?

In many places, people once used rough-wrought mats to store grain.
像他这样吃饭真是糟踏粮食。
Xiàng tā zhèyàng chīfàn zhēnshì zāotà liángshi。
The way he eats really wastes food.
一个国家需要贮备大量的粮食，以供灾难时分发给灾民。
Yígè guójiā xūyào zhùbèi dàliàng de liángshi，yǐ gòng zāinàn shífēn fāgěi zāimín。
A country should have a large amount of grain in reserve to distribute to victims of natural disasters.
贮量决定了能分发给灾民的粮食的数量。
Zhùliàng juédìng le néng fēnfā gěi zāimín de liángshi de shùliàng。
The volume of storage determines the possible amount of grain distributed to victims.
国家保护价粮食收购政策有效保障了农民的利益。
Guójiā bǎohùjià liángshí shōugòu zhèngcè yǒuxiào bǎozhàng le nóngmín de lìyì。
The state policy of purchasing grain at a protected price has effectively secured the interests of farmers.
种植粮食作物的同时也要搞农业的附加值生产。
Zhòngzhí liángshí zuòwù de tóngshí yěyào gǎo nóngyè de fùjiāzhí shēngchǎn。
While planting crops, we should also undertake agricultural value-added production.
为提高粮食产量，村里发起了一场绿色革命。
Wèi tígāo liángshí chǎnliàng，cūn lǐ fāqǐ le yìcháng lǜsè gémìng。
To increase grain output, a green revolution has been launched in the village.
农民们吃着自家自留地里种出的粮食，感到无比高兴。
Nóngmínmén chī zhe zìjiā zìliúdì lǐ zhǒng chū de liángshi，gǎndào wúbǐ gāoxìng。
The farmers feel extremely happy when eating the grain produced by their private plots.

Liángshí duījīrúshān。

Zài wǒmen de shèhuì，liángshi chúle jiǎndān de yòng zuò chōngjī wài hái yòngyú xǔduō qítā de yuányīn。

Much grain is in storage.

The autumn harvest accounts for 70% of the annual grain production.

你要在离任之前把钱粮做一个交接。

Hand over the land tax before you leave your post.
国家对钱粮都有一定的库存，以备不时之需。
Guójiā duì qiánliáng dōu yǒu yídìng de kùcún，yǐ bèi bùshí zhī xū。
The government keeps a certain stock of money and grain for emergency needs.
这些番邦小国每年都要向天朝进贡钱粮。
Zhèxiē fānbāng xiǎoguó měi nián dōu yào xiàng tiāncháo jìngòng qiánliáng。
These small countries paid tribute to China\'s royal government every year in ancient times.
自从国家取消了农业税，农民就可以不纳粮了，负担减轻了许多！
Zìcóng guójiā qǔxiāo le nóngyèshuì，nóngmín jiù kěyǐ bú nàliáng le，fùdān jiǎnqīng le xǔduō！
Since the abolishment of agricultural duty, farmers no longer need to pay for money and rice, and their burden has reduced a lot.
迎闯王，不纳粮。

Liángshí jiàgé de gāodī，yǔ dāngnián de liángshí fēngqiàn qíngkuàng yǒuguān。
The price of the grain is determined by harvest conditions.
我们要把粮食都坚壁起来，绝不能让粮食落在敌人手里。
Wǒmen yào bǎ liángshí dōu jiānbì qǐlái，jué bùnéng ràng liángshí luòzài dírén shǒulǐ。
We shall place food in a cache to prevent  the enemy seizing it.

农民们收了粮食后会主动向国家完粮。

粮食征购
liángshi zhēnggòu 
grain purchases by the state
元代南方的粮食主要经过漕河运抵北方。
Yuándài nánfāng de liángshí zhǔyào jīngguò cáohé yùndǐ běifāng。
In the Yuan Dynasty, rice was transferred to the north by way of rivers.
河南、河北、山东是我国三大粮食主产区。
Hénán、Héběi、Shāndōng shì wǒguó sān dà liángshí zhǔchǎnqū。
Henan, Hebei, and Shandong provinces are three major rice-producing areas in our country.
我们的储备粮有限，必须尽快找到新的粮食来源。
Wǒmen de chǔbèiliáng yǒuxiàn，bìxū jìnkuài zhǎodào xīn de liángshí láiyuán。
Our reserve food is limited. We must find new resources as soon as possible.
村民们在村头集会，庆贺今年的粮食丰收。
Cūnmínmen zài cūntóu jíhuì，qìnghè jīnnián de liángshí fēngshōu。
Villagers are gathering at the entrance of the village to celebrate this year\'s grain harvest.
他们正在存蓄过冬吃的粮食。
Tāmen zhèngzài cúnxù guòdōng chī de liángshí。
They are storing up grain for the winter.
几场战役下来，敌军的粮食消耗殆尽。
Jǐ chǎng zhànyì xiàlái，díjūn de liángshí xiāohào dàijìn。
After several battles, the enemy practically has no food.
这些粮食再不倒仓就会霉变。
Zhèxiē liángshí zài bùdǎocāng jiùhuì méibiàn。
The grain will grow mold if we don\'t take it into the open air.
这几间倒座儿房冬天可以用来储存粮食。
Zhè jǐ jiān dàozuòr fáng dōngtiān kěyǐ yònglái chǔcún liángshí。
These rooms opposite to the main house can be used to store rice in winter.
晾晒之后，这些粮食都掉秤了。
Liàngshài zhīhòu，zhèxiē liángshí dōu diàochèng le。
The rice has become lighter after drying in the sun.
新收的粮食必须在翻晒之后，才能进仓库。
Xīn shōu de liángshi bìxū zài fānshài zhīhòu，cáinéng jìn cāngkù。
The newly harvested grain must be turned over on the threshing ground before being put in storage.
有了新的灌溉技术，伏旱天粮食也不会减产。
Yǒu le xīn de guàngài jìshù，fúhàntiān liángshí yě búhuì jiǎnchǎn。
With the new irrigation technology, the land will yield no less grain even in dry weather.
放粮食的柜子中总有怪声，我怀疑里边有老鼠。
Fàng liángshí de guìzi zhōng zǒngyǒu guàishēng，wǒ huáiyí lǐbian yǒu lǎoshǔ。
There are always strange sounds coming from the grain cabinet. I guess that there are mouse in there.
今年的洪涝灾害，造成粮食颗粒无收。
Jīnnián de hónglào zāihài，zàochéng liángshí kēlì wúshōu。
This year\'s waterlog disaster made the crop unharvestable.
这家粮行的粮食品种最全，价格也最公道。
Zhè jiāliángháng de liángshí pǐnzhǒng zuì quán，jiàgé yě zuì gōngdào。
The grain corporation has the most types of grain, and its price is also the most reasonable.
农村都实行了轮栽，粮食产量有了显著提高。
Nóngcūn dōu shíxíng le lúnzāi，liángshí chǎnliàng yǒu le xiǎnzhù tígāo。
Crop rotations are exercised in the country, which increases the output of crops remarkably.
今年又是一个丰收年，粮食满仓。
Jīnnián yòushì yígè fēngshōunián，liángshí mǎncāng。
This is another bumper harvest year, the storehouse is full of grain.
我们要做好防潮工作，预防粮食霉损。
Wǒmen yào zuòhǎo fángcháo gōngzuò，yùfáng liángshí méisǔn。
We should take precautions against the damp, to prevent the grain from going mouldy.
平籴是一种利国利民的粮食收购制度。
Píngdí shì yìzhǒng lìguó lìmín de liángshí shōugòu zhìdù。
Selling the grain stored in public granaries at fair prices in famine years is a grain purchase system which is good both for the country and its people.
我们要最大限度地开发山荒来种植粮食。
Wǒmen yào zuì dà xiàndù de kāifā shānhuāng lái zhòngzhí liángshi。
We will exploit the waste land on the mountain by planting the maximum possible crops.
要下雨了，赶紧把粮食苫盖好。
Yào xiàyǔ le，gǎnjǐn bǎ liángshishān gàihǎo。
It is going to rain. Hurry to cover the grain.

粮站里现在还用瓝子存放粮食吗？？

像他这样吃饭真是糟踏粮食。

A country should have a large amount of grain in reserve to distribute to victims of natural disasters.

国家保护价粮食收购政策有效保障了农民的利益。
Guójiā bǎohùjià liángshí shōugòu zhèngcè yǒuxiào bǎozhàng le nóngmín de lìyì。
The state policy of purchasing grain at a protected price has effectively secured the interests of farmers.
种植粮食作物的同时也要搞农业的附加值生产。

the price ratios between grain and cotton

bōfā jiùjǐliáng

grain subsidy
粮食满仓。
Liángshi mǎncāng。
The granary is bursting with grain.
仓库里潮气太大，粮食就容易发霉。
Cāngkù lǐ cháoqì tài dà，liángshi jiù róngyì fāméi。
The grain is liable to mildew when the humidity in the barn is too high.
储粮备荒
chǔliánɡ bèihuānɡ 
store up grain against natural disasters
储备粮食
chǔbèi liángshi
store up grain; build up supplies of grain
储积余粮，以备急需
Chǔjī yúliánɡ ,yǐ bèi jíxū。
store up surplus grain for use in time of need
存粮
cúnliáng 
store up grain
收购粮食不准打白条。
Shōugòu liángshi bùzhǔn dǎ báitiáo。
It is prohibited to write IOUs instead of paying the farmers when purchasing their grain.
吃返销粮
chī fǎnxiāoliáng
eat &quot;resold grain&quot;
浪费这么好的粮食简直是犯罪。
Làngfèi zhème hǎo de liángshi jiǎnzhí shì fànzuì。
It\'s a crime to waste such good food.
粮仓丰满。
Liángcāng fēngmǎn。
The granaries are full.
粮食有富余。
Liángshi yǒu fùyu。
There is a surplus of grain.
明天郊游，请自带干粮。
Míngtiān jiāoyóu，qǐng zì dài gānliáng。
Bring your own food on tomorrow\'s outing.
干粮袋
gānliángdài
haversack; ration bag
交公粮
jiāo gōngliáng
deliver tax grain to the state
耗了不少粮食
hào le bùshǎo liángshi
have consumed much grain
积粮
jī liánɡ 
store up grain
商品粮基地
shāngpǐnliángjīdì 
marketable grain base
那家新粮店开张了。
Nà jiā xīn liángdiàn kāizhāng le。
The new grain store has opened for business.
每一粒粮食都来之不易。
Měi yí lì liángshi dōu láizhībúyì。
Every single grain is the result of toil.
粮棉双丰收
Liáng mián shuāng fēngshōu
a bumper harvest of grain and cotton
东北是祖国的粮仓。
Dōngběi shì zǔguó de liángcāng。
The Northeast is the granary of the country.
粮棉轮作
liángmián lúnzuò 
rotation of cereal crops and cotton
粮仓里装得满登登的。
Liángcānglǐ zhuāng de mǎndēngdēng de。
The grainary was stuffed full of grain.
昔日穷山沟，今日米粮川。
xīrì qiónɡshānɡōu, jīnrì mǐliánɡchuān
The barren gully of yesterday has become a granary.
粮食都已入库。
Liángshi dōu yǐ rù kù。
All the grain has been put in storage. or All the grain is already in the granary.
晒粮食
shài liángshi
dry grain in the sun
食粮供应
shíliáng gōngyìng
food supplies
精神食粮
jīngshén shíliáng
spiritual food
收藏粮食
shōucáng liángshi
store up grain
输入粮食
shūrù liángshi
import grain
粮食、棉花双丰收
liángshi、miánhuā shuāng fēngshōu
bumper harvests of both grain and cotton
统销粮
tǒnɡxiāoliánɡ 
grain marketed only by the state
屯粮
túnliáng
store up grain
这头驴子能驮三袋粮食。
Zhè tóu lǘzi néngtuó sān dài liángshi。
This donkey can carry three sacks of grain.
看着院子里堆成山的粮食，全家人都喜笑颜开。
Kàn zhe yuànzi lǐ duīchéngshān de liángshi，quánjiā rén dōu xǐxiàoyánkāi。
Looking at the grain piled high in the courtyard, the whole family were wreathed in smiles.
粗粮细作
cūliángxì zuò
make delicacies out of coarse food grain
蓄积粮食
xùjī liángshi
store up grain
游击队把粮食藏严实了才转移。
Yóujīduì bǎ liángshi cáng yánshi le cái zhuǎnyí。
The guerrillas carefully hid their food grain before they moved on.
粮食自给有余
liángshi zìjǐ yǒuyú。
have grain enough and to spare
把余粮卖给国家
bǎ yúliáng màigěi guójiā 
sell surplus grain to the state
别糟践粮食。
Bié zāojian liángshi。
Don\'t waste grain.
糟蹋粮食
zāotà liángshi
waste grain
粮食征购
liángshi zhēnggòu 
grain purchases by the state
征集军粮
zhēnɡjí jūnliánɡ 
collect grain for the army
贮粮备荒
zhù liánɡ bèi huānɡ 
store grain against a lean year
国家专项储备粮
guójiā zhuān xiàng chǔbèiliáng
assigned national grain reserve
米粮川
mǐliángchuān
rich rice-producing area
公粮
gōngliáng
agricultural tax paid in grain; grain delivered to the state; public grain
粮秣
liángmò
army provisions; rations and forage; grain and fodder
征粮
zhēngliáng
impose grain levies; collect grain taxes
俗话说“兵马未动，粮草先行”，在创办企业时必须首先筹集足够的资金。
Súhuà shuō“bīngmǎ wèidòng，liángcǎo xiānxíng”，zài chuàngbàn qǐyè shí bìxū shǒuxiān chóují zúgòu de zījīn。
As the saying goes that “Food and fodder should go ahead of troops and horses”, ample funds must be prepared in the first place when establishing a company .
元代南方的粮食主要经过漕河运抵北方。
Yuándài nánfāng de liángshí zhǔyào jīngguò cáohé yùndǐ běifāng。
In the Yuan Dynasty, rice was transferred to the north by way of rivers.
古代一批批漕粮通过水路运到北京。
Gǔdài yìpīpī cáoliáng tōngguò shuǐlù yùndào Běijīng。
In ancient times, rice was transferred to Beijing via rivers.
河南、河北、山东是我国三大粮食主产区。
Hénán、Héběi、Shāndōng shì wǒguó sān dà liángshí zhǔchǎnqū。
Henan, Hebei, and Shandong provinces are three major rice-producing areas in our country.
我们要做好陈粮的防潮工作。
Wǒmen yào zuòhǎo chénliáng de fángcháo gōngzuò。
We should protect our previously harvested surplus grain from water damage.
最近成品粮的价格有所上升。
Zuìjìn chéngpǐnliáng de jiàgé yǒusuǒ shàngshēng。
Recently, the price of processed grain has slightly increased.
他是吃皇粮的，真让人羡慕。
Tā shì chī huángliáng de，zhēn ràng rén xiànmù。
He receives his salary from the government, and is envied by many people.
当初他的家境不好，只有去当兵吃粮。
Dāngchū tā de jiājìng bùhǎo，zhǐyǒu qù dāngbīng chīliáng。
At that time his family is poor, he had to serve in the army to get soldier\'s pay and provisions.
他现在搬进城里住了，也是吃商品粮的人了。
Tā xiànzài bānjìn chéng lǐ zhù le，yě shì chī shāngpǐnliáng de rén le。
He moved to the city and became a commodity grain eater now.
粮店今天出粜了五百斤大米。
Liángdiàn jīntiān chūtiào le wǔbǎi jīn dàmǐ。
The grain shop has sold 500 kilos of rice today.
村民们在村头集会，庆贺今年的粮食丰收。
Cūnmínmen zài cūntóu jíhuì，qìnghè jīnnián de liángshí fēngshōu。
Villagers are gathering at the entrance of the village to celebrate this year\'s grain harvest.
村民们正在存粮，准备过冬。
Cūnmínmen zhèngzài cúnliáng，zhǔnbèi guòdōng。
The villagers are storing up grain, making preparations for the coming winter.
把这些存粮低价卖了吧。
Bǎ zhèxiē cúnliáng dījià mài le ba。
Sell all the grain in stock at a low price.
他们正在存蓄过冬吃的粮食。
Tāmen zhèngzài cúnxù guòdōng chī de liángshí。
They are storing up grain for the winter.
几场战役下来，敌军的粮食消耗殆尽。
Jǐ chǎng zhànyì xiàlái，díjūn de liángshí xiāohào dàijìn。
After several battles, the enemy practically has no food.
这些粮食再不倒仓就会霉变。
Zhèxiē liángshí zài bùdǎocāng jiùhuì méibiàn。
The grain will grow mold if we don\'t take it into the open air.
这几间倒座儿房冬天可以用来储存粮食。
Zhè jǐ jiān dàozuòr fáng dōngtiān kěyǐ yònglái chǔcún liángshí。
These rooms opposite to the main house can be used to store rice in winter.
晾晒之后，这些粮食都掉秤了。
Liàngshài zhīhòu，zhèxiē liángshí dōu diàochèng le。
The rice has become lighter after drying in the sun.
如果再走不出这片森林，他们就没有足够的干粮度命了。
Rúguǒ zài zǒu bùchū zhèpiàn sēnlín，tāmen jiù méiyǒu zúgòu de gānliáng dùmìng le。
If they can\'t manage to walk out of the forest, they will run short of food rations.
新收的粮食必须在翻晒之后，才能进仓库。
Xīn shōu de liángshi bìxū zài fānshài zhīhòu，cáinéng jìn cāngkù。
The newly harvested grain must be turned over on the threshing ground before being put in storage.
每户村民都顺利购买到了返销粮。
Měi hù cūnmín dōu shùnlì gòumǎi dào le fǎnxiāo liáng。
All the villagers bought the state-purchased grain successfully.
这片丰腴的土地，自古以来就有“粮米之仓”的美誉。
Zhè piàn fēngyú de tǔdì，zìgǔ yǐlái jiù yǒu“liángmǐ zhī cāng”de měiyù。
This abundant land has been honored as &quot;the store of grain and rice&quot; since ancient times.
有了新的灌溉技术，伏旱天粮食也不会减产。
Yǒu le xīn de guàngài jìshù，fúhàntiān liángshí yě búhuì jiǎnchǎn。
With the new irrigation technology, the land will yield no less grain even in dry weather.
供销社在收购农民的余粮。
Gōngxiāoshè zài shōugòu nóngmín de yúliáng。
The supply and marketing cooperative is purchasing farmers\' surplus grains.
放粮食的柜子中总有怪声，我怀疑里边有老鼠。
Fàng liángshí de guìzi zhōng zǒngyǒu guàishēng，wǒ huáiyí lǐbian yǒu lǎoshǔ。
There are always strange sounds coming from the grain cabinet. I guess that there are mouse in there.
今年的洪涝灾害，造成粮食颗粒无收。
Jīnnián de hónglào zāihài，zàochéng liángshí kēlì wúshōu。
This year\'s waterlog disaster made the crop unharvestable.
人们称政府官员是吃皇粮的工作人员。
Rénmen chēng zhèngfǔ guānyuán shì chī huángliáng de gōngzuò rényuán。
Government officials are called working staff paid by the imperial court.
这列火车解运的是救灾粮。
Zhè liè huǒchē jièyùn de shì jiùzāiliáng。
This train delivers food to disaster-stricken areas.
江姐曾经在华蓥山带领穷苦百姓抗粮抗丁。
Jiāngjiě céngjīng zài Huáyíng Shān dàilǐng qióngkǔ bǎixìng kàngliáng kàngdīng。
Miss Jiang used to lead the poor common people in resisting the grain levy and compulsory conscription.
清政府黑暗软弱，再加上税赋沉重，曾经逼得各地农民不断地抗粮起义。
Qīngzhèngfǔ hēi\'àn ruǎnruò，zài jiāshàng shuìfù chénzhòng，céngjīng bīdé gè dì nóngmín búduàn de kàngliáng qǐyì。
The government of the Qing Dynasty was corrupt and weak and also had heavy levies. Farmers from all over China rose up in revolt and resisted the grain levy one after another.
丰收年的时候，我看见农村里大大小小有好多粮囤。
Fēngshōunián de shíhou，wǒ kànjiàn nóngcūn lǐ dàdàxiǎoxiǎo yǒu hǎo duō liángtún。
In harvest years, I saw many grain barns of different sizes in the country.
粮农的增产不增收问题一直没有得到根本上的解决。
Liángnóng de zēngchǎn bùzēngshōu wèntí yìzhí méiyǒu dédào gēnběn shàng de jiějué。
The problem of increased production without the increased income of farmers hasn\'t been solved.
东北是我国较大的粮区之一。
Dōngběi shì wǒguó jiàodà de liángqū zhīyī。
The northeast is one of the biggest grain-producing areas in our country.
乱世中吃粮饷的人随时有生命之忧。
Luànshì zhōng chī liángxiǎng de rén suíshí yǒu shēngmìng zhī yōu。
In troubled times, people who lived on provisions and funds for troops could lose their lives at any minute.
农村都实行了轮栽，粮食产量有了显著提高。
Nóngcūn dōu shíxíng le lúnzāi，liángshí chǎnliàng yǒu le xiǎnzhù tígāo。
Crop rotations are exercised in the country, which increases the output of crops remarkably.
今年又是一个丰收年，粮食满仓。
Jīnnián yòushì yígè fēngshōunián，liángshí mǎncāng。
This is another bumper harvest year, the storehouse is full of grain.
我们要做好防潮工作，预防粮食霉损。
Wǒmen yào zuòhǎo fángcháo gōngzuò，yùfáng liángshí méisǔn。
We should take precautions against the damp, to prevent the grain from going mouldy.
五粮液是中国著名的美酒。
Wǔliángyè shì Zhōngguó zhùmíng de měijiǔ。
Five-Grain Liquor is a good kind of wine famous in China.
自从国家取消了农业税，农民就可以不纳粮了，负担减轻了许多！
Zìcóng guójiā qǔxiāo le nóngyèshuì，nóngmín jiù kěyǐ bú nàliáng le，fùdān jiǎnqīng le xǔduō！
Since the abolishment of agricultural duty, farmers no longer need to pay for money and rice, and their burden has reduced a lot.
平籴是一种利国利民的粮食收购制度。
Píngdí shì yìzhǒng lìguó lìmín de liángshí shōugòu zhìdù。
Selling the grain stored in public granaries at fair prices in famine years is a grain purchase system which is good both for the country and its people.
你要在离任之前把钱粮做一个交接。
Nǐ yào zài lírèn zhīqián bǎ qiánliáng zuò yígè jiāojiē。
Hand over the land tax before you leave your post.
国家对钱粮都有一定的库存，以备不时之需。
Guójiā duì qiánliáng dōu yǒu yídìng de kùcún，yǐ bèi bùshí zhī xū。
The government keeps a certain stock of money and grain for emergency needs.
今年的秋粮产量很高。
Jīnnián de qiūliáng chǎnliàng hěngāo。
The autumn grains this year have given a  pretty high yield.
我们要最大限度地开发山荒来种植粮食。
Wǒmen yào zuì dà xiàndù de kāifā shānhuāng lái zhòngzhí liángshi。
We will exploit the waste land on the mountain by planting the maximum possible crops.
要下雨了，赶紧把粮食苫盖好。
Yào xiàyǔ le，gǎnjǐn bǎ liángshishān gàihǎo。
It is going to rain. Hurry to cover the grain.
请市民们放心，目前商品粮的供应相当充足。
Qǐng shìmínmen fàngxīn，mùqián shāngpǐnliáng de gōngyīng xiāngdāng chōngzú。
Let the citizens be assured. We currently have an abundant supply of commodity grain.
这个摊群大部分都是卖粮食的摊位。
Zhège tānqún dàbùfen dōushì mài liángshí de tānwèi。
The group of stalls here sell grain.
这些番邦小国每年都要向天朝进贡钱粮。
Zhèxiē fānbāng xiǎoguó měi nián dōu yào xiàng tiāncháo jìngòng qiánliáng。
These small countries paid tribute to China\'s royal government every year in ancient times.
过去很多地方用踅子屯积粮食。
Guòqù hěnduō dìfāng yòng xuézi túnjī liángshi。
In many places, people once used rough-wrought mats to store grain.
今年是百年未遇的灾年，各地的义仓都在放粮。
Jīnnián shì bǎinián wèiyù de zāinián，gè dì de yìcāng dōu zài fàngliáng。
This year is a famine year not seen in a hundred years, all public granaries are distributing grains of rice.
计划经济时代，议价粮也不容易买到。
Jìhuá jīngjì shídài，yìjiàliáng yě bùróngyì mǎi dào。
In a planned economy, it\'s not easy to buy grain at a negotiated price.
没有经过加工的原粮是无法食用的。
Méiyǒu jīngguò jiāgōng de yuánliáng shì wúfǎ shíyòng de。
People can\'t eat unprocessed grains.
像他这样吃饭真是糟踏粮食。
Xiàng tā zhèyàng chīfàn zhēnshì zāotà liángshi。
The way he eats really wastes food.
过去人们吃的粗粮成了现代都市人的珍馐。
Guòqù rénmen chī de cūliáng chéng le xiàndài dūshì rén de zhēnxiū。
The coarse grain people ate in the past have became delicacies in modern cities.
国家对征购粮有优惠政策。
Guójiā duì zhēnggòuliáng yǒu yōuhuì zhèngcè。
The State has some preferential policies for grain purchased by the state.
他为这支农民军队支应粮饷。
Tā wèi zhèzhī nóngmín jūnduì zhīyìng liángxiǎng。
He provided grains, and money for this farm force.
一个国家需要贮备大量的粮食，以供灾难时分发给灾民。
Yígè guójiā xūyào zhùbèi dàliàng de liángshi，yǐ gòng zāinàn shífēn fāgěi zāimín。
A country should have a large amount of grain in reserve to distribute to victims of natural disasters.
贮量决定了能分发给灾民的粮食的数量。
Zhùliàng juédìng le néng fēnfā gěi zāimín de liángshi de shùliàng。
The volume of storage determines the possible amount of grain distributed to victims.
国家保护价粮食收购政策有效保障了农民的利益。
Guójiā bǎohùjià liángshí shōugòu zhèngcè yǒuxiào bǎozhàng le nóngmín de lìyì。
The state policy of purchasing grain at a protected price has effectively secured the interests of farmers.
街对面开了一家粮油供应点。
Jiē duìmiàn kāi le yì jiāliángyóu gōngyìngdiǎn。
A grain and oil supply center has opened across the street.
这些优秀的文艺作品是老百姓的精神食粮。
Zhèxiē yōuxiù de wényì zuòpǐn shì lǎobǎixìng de jīngshén shíliáng。
These excellent literary and art works are the spiritual food of the people.
种植粮食作物的同时也要搞农业的附加值生产。
Zhòngzhí liángshí zuòwù de tóngshí yěyào gǎo nóngyè de fùjiāzhí shēngchǎn。
While planting crops, we should also undertake agricultural value-added production.
为提高粮食产量，村里发起了一场绿色革命。
Wèi tígāo liángshí chǎnliàng，cūn lǐ fāqǐ le yìcháng lǜsè gémìng。
To increase grain output, a green revolution has been launched in the village.
农民们吃着自家自留地里种出的粮食，感到无比高兴。
Nóngmínmén chī zhe zìjiā zìliúdì lǐ zhǒng chū de liángshi，gǎndào wúbǐ gāoxìng。
The farmers feel extremely happy when eating the grain produced by their private plots.
粮食堆积如山。
Liángshí duījīrúshān。
The grain was piled up like a mountain.
粜了粗粮籴细粮。
粗粮细粮花搭着吃。
粮食探子(用来插入粮袋提取少量样品的用具)。
漕粮
糇粮。
糗粮
粮食作物产值和畜牧业产值约为二与一之比。
把这堆粮食簸簸。
粮仓
粮草
粮食受潮了
储粮备荒
仓库里存着很多粮食

完粮纳税。
粮秣。
囤里的粮食全给沤了
用席把粮食苫上
屯粮。
囤粮。
完粮。
原粮。
征粮。
贮粮。
连年大丰收，粮食爆库。
粮仓充盈。

The autumn grains this year have given a  pretty high yield.

Crop rotations are exercised in the country, which increases the output of crops remarkably.
为提高粮食产量，村里发起了一场绿色革命。

To increase grain output, a green revolution has been launched in the village.
河南、河北、山东是我国三大粮食主产区。
Hénán、Héběi、Shāndōng shì wǒguó sān dà liángshí zhǔchǎnqū。
Henan, Hebei, and Shandong provinces are three major rice-producing areas in our country.
粮农的增产不增收问题一直没有得到根本上的解决。
Liángnóng de zēngchǎn bùzēngshōu wèntí yìzhí méiyǒu dédào gēnběn shàng de jiějué。
The problem of increased production without the increased income of farmers hasn\'t been solved.
有了新的灌溉技术，伏旱天粮食也不会减产。
Yǒu le xīn de guàngài jìshù，fúhàntiān liángshí yě búhuì jiǎnchǎn。
With the new irrigation technology, the land will yield no less grain even in dry weather.
种植粮食作物的同时也要搞农业的附加值生产。
Zhòngzhí liángshí zuòwù de tóngshí yěyào gǎo nóngyè de fùjiāzhí shēngchǎn。
While planting crops, we should also undertake agricultural value-added production.

风一吹，门哐当一声就关上了！
Fēng yìchuī，mén kuāngdāng yìshēng jiù guānshàng le！
The door banged shut after a gust of wind.
司号员的冲锋号一吹响，我们的战士像洪水一般冲向了敌人的阵营。
Sīhàoyuán de chōngfēnghào yì chuīxiǎng，wǒmen de zhànshì xiàng hóngshuǐ yìbān chōng xiàng le dírén de zhènyíng。
The moment the bugler sounded the charge, our soldiers rushed towards the enemy\'s positions like a flood.
被晨风一吹，他感到清醒多了。
Bèi chénfēng yìchuī，tā gǎndào qīngxǐng duō le。
The scent of the morning air made him feel refreshed.
他浑身被雨淋透了，寒风一吹就不住地瑟索。
Tā húnshēn bèi yǔ líntòu le，hánfēng yí chuī jiù bú zhù de sèsuǒ。
He was drenched, and couldn\'t help shivering in the cold wind.
他穿着湿透了的衣服，风一吹，就感到透心凉。
Tā chuān zhe shītòu le de yīfu，fēng yì chuī，jiù gǎndào tòuxīnliáng。
In his soaked clothes, he felt bitterly cold when a blast of wind passed by.
今天晚上有一场吹奏乐演出，我们一起去看看。
Jīntiān wǎnshàng yǒu yìchǎng chuīzòuyuè yǎnchū，wǒmen yìqǐ qù kànkàn。
There is a music performance today, how about going to see it together?
《奇双会》是一出吹腔戏。
《Qíshuānghuì》 shì yìchū chuīqiāngxì。
&quot;Surprising Double Meeting&quot; is blowing tunes style of opera.
一阵寒风吹过，我猛地打了一个激灵。
Yízhèn hánfēng chuīguò，wǒ měng de dǎ le yígè jīlǐng。
I shivered suddenly when a cold wind passed by.
一阵寒风吹来，他不由得打了一个冷颤。
Yízhèn hánfēng chuīlái，tā bùyóudé dǎ le yígè lěngchàn。
A gust of cold wind blows, and he can\'t help shivering.
吹一口气
chuī yì kǒu qì 
give a puff
不要一有风吹草动就惊慌失措。
Búyào yì yǒu fēngchuīcǎodòng jiù jīnghuāngshīcuò。
Don\'t fly into a panic at the mere rustle of leaves in the wind.
一不会吹，二不会拍
yī bú huì chuī，èr bú huì pāi
not be given to bragging or toadying
噗，一口气吹灭了蜡烛
Pū，yìkǒuqì chuīmiè le làzhú
blow out a candle with one puff
胡吹一气
húchuī yíqì 
tell tall stories
槐树上开满了槐花，一阵风吹来，槐花飘香。
Huáishù shàng kāimǎn le huáihuā，yí zhèn fēng chuīlái，huáihuā piāoxiāng。
The Huaishu is full of Huai blosoms. As a blast of wind blows, the fragrance is sent out.
一阵风吹过，木塔上的铃铎发出了叮叮的响声。
Yízhènfēng chuīguò，mùtǎ shàng de língduó fāchū le dīngdīng de xiǎngshēng。
A fit of breeze blows, and the bell on the wood tower tinkles.
迎面吹来一阵冷风，她禁不住打了个寒战。
Yíngmiàn chuī lái yízhèn lěngfēng，tā jīnbuzhù dǎ le gè hánzhàn。
She couldn\'t help shivering in the face of a gust of cold wind.
墙上一棵草，风吹两边倒。
Qiángshàngyì kē cǎo，fēngchuī liǎngbiāndǎo。
A tuft of grass atop the wall sways right and left in the wind (a saying).
一阵秋风吹过，落花遍地。
Yízhèn qiūfēng chuīguò，luòhuā biàndì。
The floor is covered with fallen flowers after an autumn wind.
初月当空，一阵阵凉风吹过。
Chūyuè dāngkōng，yízhènzhèn liángfēng chuīguò。
The crescent was hanging in the sky, and a cool wind was blowing.
叫啸着的狂风把一棵大树都吹折了。
Jiàoxiào zhe de kuángfēng bǎ yì kē dàshù dōu chuīshé le。
The roaring wind damaged a big tree.
裁员这股冷风吹了有一阵，大家整天都提心吊胆的怕这事落在自己身上。
Cáiyuán zhègǔ lěngfēng chuī le yǒuyízhèn，dàjiā zhěngtiān dōu tíxīn diàodǎn de pà zhèshì luò zài zìjǐ shēnshàng。
The cold wind of staff trimming reduction has been blowing for a while. Everyone is in fear, and afraid it will befall on themselves.
一阵风从窗口吹来，翻动着他摊开的书页。
Yízhènfēng cóng chuāngkǒu chuī lái，fāndòng zhe tā tānkāi de shūyè。
A gust of wind blows from the window, ruffling through the leaves of the book he had left open.
只听啪啦一声，树枝被大风吹折了。
Zhǐtīng pālā yìshēng，shùzhī bèi dàfēng chuīshé le。
With a cracking sound, the branch was snapped off by the severe gale.
风吹过麦野，掀起了一层层的麦浪。
Fēng chuīguò màiyě，xiānqǐ le yìcéngcéng de màilàng。
When wind blows across the wheat field, the wheat billows in the wind.
一阵芬芳的气息从花丛中吹过来。
Yízhèn fēnfāng de qìxī cónghuācóng zhōng chuī guòlai。
A waft of sweet-smelling fragrance blew over from the flower bush.
凉风吹来，我的倦意消除了一半。
Liángfēng chuīlái，wǒ de juànyì xiāochú le yíbàn。
Cool wind blows past, and half of my tiredness is dispelled.
改革的春风吹遍中国大地，中国的形势一片大好。
Gǎigé de chūnfēng chuībiàn Zhōngguódàdì，Zhōngguó de xíngshì yípiàn dàhǎo。
总的说来，这是一本好书，若对不足之处过多指摘，未免吹毛求疵。
Zǒng de shuōlái，zhè shì yìběn hǎoshū，ruò duì bùzúzhīchù guòduō zhǐzhāi，wèimiǎn chuīmáoqiúcī。
On the whole it\'s a good book; and it would be nitpicking to dwell on those small defects.
这次考试的吹风会昨天刚开完，今天老师会不会带来一些信息呢？
Zhècì kǎoshì de chuīfēnghuì zuótiān gāng kāiwán，jīntiān lǎoshī huìbuhuì dàilái yìxiē xìnxī ne？
We just had a meeting about this exam yesterday, will the teacher bring some more information about it today?

每一阵风都吹走一些树叶。

做广告来吹嘘一种产品

他吹胡笳的样子深深的印在我的脑海里。

他吹得花里胡哨的，不能信。
Tā chuī de huālihúshào de，bùnéng xìn。

别听他胡吹，他是个半瓶醋。

gǔchuī gémìng
advocate revolution
竭力鼓吹
jiélì ɡǔchuī
boost with all one\'s might; energetically advocate
他鼓吹他所谓的发明。
Tā gǔchuī tā suǒwèide fāmíng。
He boasted about his so-called invention.
以前吹火筒的功能就类似于现在的鼓风机。

经不起风吹雨打
jīngbuqǐ fēngchuīyǔdǎ
cannot withstand natural calamities
历经多年的风吹雨打，老树的躯干有些倾侧了。

The trunk of the old tree is slightly inclined, after being buffered by wind and rain for many years.
这么嫩弱的花蕾怎么能经得起暴风雨的吹打呢？

canvas that weathers well
