注定会遭受此种吹毛求疵的批评的第一部莫扎特歌剧毫无生气地上演了五次。
他就爱吹牛。
Tā jiù ài chuīniú。
He\'s a boastful person.
吹牛皮
chuī niúpí
talk big
他总是吹牛皮，没人相信他。
Tā zǒngshì chuī niúpí，méirén xiāngxìn tā。
He is always boasting, so no one trusts him.
他自称是个方外高人，我却觉得他吹牛。
Tā zìchēng shì gè fāngwài gāorén，wǒ què jué de tā chuīniú。
He calls himself a person outside the boundaries of this earthly world, which I regard as bullshit.
啥都不干，净吹牛
shádōu bú gàn，jìng chuīniú
all talk and no action
吹牛
吹牛拍马
少吹牛，多干事儿
to talk big
说大话，吹牛，自吹自擂
We don\'t call you old windbag for nothing
我们不是无缘无故地说你是吹牛大王。
His big bragging needs to stop.
Tā ài chuīniú de máobìng yīnggāi gǎi diào le。
他爱吹牛的毛病应该改掉了。
Well I made my boast, but it was followed by an embarrassed silence.
Zài wǒ chuīniú zhīhòu，dàjiā dōu xiànrùle gāngà de chénmò。
在我吹牛之后，大家都陷入了尴尬的沉默。
He bragged to friends: &quot;All I want is to kill a copper.&quot;
Tā hé tā de péngyou chuīniú ：“Suǒyǒu wǒ xiǎng yào de jiùshì yào shā yí gè jǐngchá。”
他和他的朋友吹牛：“所有我想要的就是要杀一个警察。”
He told us a lot of stories but I think he was just blowing smoke.
Tā gěi wǒ jiǎngle hěnduō gùshi，dànshì wǒ juéde tā zài chuīniú。
他给我讲了很多故事，但是我觉得他在吹牛。
The entire presentation was a snow job.
Zhěnggè chénshù jiùshì zài chuīniú。
整个陈述就是在吹牛。
Whenever he won we were exposed to his gasconade.
Měicì tā yíng，wǒmen dōu yào tīng tā chuīniú。
每次他赢，我们都要听他吹牛。
He talked big all evening.
Tā chuīle yì wǎnshàng niú。
他吹了一晚上牛。
迎面吹来一阵冷风，她禁不住打了个寒战。
Yíngmiàn chuī lái yízhèn lěngfēng，tā jīnbuzhù dǎ le gè hánzhàn。
She couldn\'t help shivering in the face of a gust of cold wind.
冷风吹了我个透心儿凉。
Lěngfēngchuī le wǒ gè tòuxīnrliáng。
The cold wind chilled me to the bone.
冬天里冷风吹过，我的嘴唇裂开了。
Dōngtiānlǐ lĕngfēng chuīguò，wŏ de zuǐchún lièkāi le。
裁员这股冷风吹了有一阵，大家整天都提心吊胆的怕这事落在自己身上。
Cáiyuán zhègǔ lěngfēng chuī le yǒuyízhèn，dàjiā zhěngtiān dōu tíxīn diàodǎn de pà zhèshì luò zài zìjǐ shēnshàng。
The cold wind of staff trimming reduction has been blowing for a while. Everyone is in fear, and afraid it will befall on themselves.
晚风吹来，身上冷丝丝的。
Wǎn fēngchuīlái，shēn shànglěngsīsī de。
The night wind was blowing, and I felt a bit chilly.
冷冽的寒风吹得路上的行人浑身打颤。
Lěngliè de hánfēng chuī de lùshàng de xíngrén húnshēn dǎzhàn。
The chilly wind makes passers-by shiver all over.
北风冷飕飕地迎面吹来。
Běifēng lěngsōusōu de yíngmiàn chuīlái。
The north wind blew cold in my face.
一阵寒风吹来，他不由得打了一个冷颤。
Yízhèn hánfēng chuīlái，tā bùyóudé dǎ le yígè lěngchàn。
A gust of cold wind blows, and he can\'t help shivering.
吹冷风。
光吹冷风，不干事
指标定得过高，要吹吹冷风
冷风吹得她直打冷噤
冷风把双颊吹得胭红。
门开了一道缝儿，风吹到身上冷丝丝的。
北风卷着雪花冷飕飕的，吹得他浑身打战。
The air conditioner stopped blowing out cold air.
Zhège kōngtiáo búzài chuī lěngfēng。
这个空调不再吹冷风。
Fans were used to fling off cool air.
Diànshàn kěyǐ yònglái chuīchū lěngfēng。
电扇可以用来吹出冷风。
The air conditioning was blasting cold air at us.
Kōngtiáo duìzhe wǒmen chuīzhe lěngfēng。
空调对着我们吹着冷风。
The icy wind struck through our coats.
Bīnglěng de fēng chuītòule wǒmen de wàitào。
冰冷的风吹透了我们的外套。
他们俩吹了。
Tāmen liǎ chuī le。
That couple have broken up.
冷风吹了我个透心儿凉。
Lěngfēngchuī le wǒ gè tòuxīnrliáng。
The cold wind chilled me to the bone.
裁员这股冷风吹了有一阵，大家整天都提心吊胆的怕这事落在自己身上。
Cáiyuán zhègǔ lěngfēng chuī le yǒuyízhèn，dàjiā zhěngtiān dōu tíxīn diàodǎn de pà zhèshì luò zài zìjǐ shēnshàng。
The cold wind of staff trimming reduction has been blowing for a while. Everyone is in fear, and afraid it will befall on themselves.
他们去夏威夷的计划吹了。
Tāmen qù Xiàwēiyíde jìhuà chuīle。
Their plan to go to Hawaii fell through.
我和女友吹了。
Wǒ hé nǚyǒu chuīle。
I\'ve broken up with my girlfriend.
我们去大陆投资的计划告吹了。
Wǒmen qù Dàlù tóuzīde jìhuà gàochuī le。
Our plans to invest on the mainland came to nothing.
又是春天了，暖风吹绿了树叶和草芽。
Yòu shì chūntiān le，nuǎnfēng chuīlǜ le shùyè hé cǎoyá。
Spring comes again, the warm winds blow the leaves and sprouting grass.
风太大了，伞骨都被吹折了。
Fēng tài dà le，sǎngǔ dōu bèi chuī shé le。
The wind was too strong. The framework of the umbrella was snapped by it.
把气球吹崩了
bǎ qìqiú chuībēng le 
burst a balloon
门吹开了。
Mén chuīkāi le。
The door blew open.
什么风把你给吹来了？
Shénme fēngbǎ nǐ gěi chuīlái le?
What brings you here?
噗，一口气吹灭了蜡烛
Pū，yìkǒuqì chuīmiè le làzhú
blow out a candle with one puff
风把他的气球吹到了半空。
Fēng bǎ tā de qìqiú chuīdào le bànkōng。
The wind blew his balloon into the sky.
多亏抢救及时，要不然你早就吹灯了。
Duōkuī qiǎngjiù jíshí，yàobùrán nǐ zǎo jiù chuīdēng le。
You should thank the timely rescue; without it you would already be dead.
他这人爱耍滑，我跟他吹台了。
Tā zhè rén ài shuǎhuá，wǒ gēn tā chuītái le。
He always acts in a slick way, so I ended my relationship with him.
号兵吹响了紧急集合的哨子。
Hàobīng chuīxiǎng le jǐnjí jíhé de shàozi。
The bugler sounds an emergent rally.
叫啸着的狂风把一棵大树都吹折了。
Jiàoxiào zhe de kuángfēng bǎ yì kē dàshù dōu chuīshé le。
The roaring wind damaged a big tree.
我军吹响了反攻的进军号。
Wǒ jūn chuīxiǎng le fǎngōng de jìnjūnhào。
The signal for our army to advance sounded.
国家吹响了开发西部的进军号。
Guójiā chuīxiǎng le kāifā xībù de jìnjūnhào。
The state is calling for people to develop Western China.
只听啪啦一声，树枝被大风吹折了。
Zhǐtīng pālā yìshēng，shùzhī bèi dàfēng chuīshé le。
With a cracking sound, the branch was snapped off by the severe gale.
90分钟战罢，主哨吹响了比赛结束的哨音。
Jiǔshífēnzhōng zhànbà，zhǔshào chuīxiǎng le bǐsài jiéshù de shàoyīn。
After a 90 minute contest, the referee blew the whistle to end the game.
大树让风吹倒了。
Dàshù ràng fēng chuīdǎole.
The big tree was blown down by the wind.
她眼看着信被风吹跑了。
Tā yǎnkànzhē xìn bèi fēng chuīpǎo le。
She looked on as the letter got blown away by the wind.
墙上挂着的丝瓜都已经给风吹干瘪了。
Qiáng shàng guà zhe de sīguā dōu yǐjing gěi fēng chuī gānbiě le。
The towel gourds hanging on the wall have been dried out by the wind.
他跟剧团里的叔叔学会了吹梆笛。
Tā gēn jùtuán lǐ de shūshu xuéhuì le chuī bāngdí。
He learned how to play bamboo flute from a man in a troupe.
我很累了，吹灯睡觉吧。
Wǒ hěnlèi le，chuīdēng shuìjiào ba。
I am so tired. Let\'s blow out the lamp and go to sleep.
天热极了，风吹过来都使人感到热烘烘的。
Tiān rè jí le，fēng chuī guòlái dōu shǐ rén gǎndào rèhōnghōng de。
It\'s so hot that even the wind feels hot.
听说李霸天已经吹灯拔蜡了，乡亲们心里都很高兴。
Tīngshuō Lǐ Bàtiān yǐjing chuīdēng bálà le，xiāngqīnmen xīnlǐ dōu hěngāoxìng。
Hearing that the despot Li had died, all the villagers were very happy.
她结婚的时候请了个乐队，吹打弹唱的，特别热闹。
Tā jiéhūn de shíhou qǐng le gè yuèduì，chuīdǎ tánchàng de，tèbié rènào。
She hired a band when getting married and it was very lively with the band playing the instruments.
一阵寒风吹过，我猛地打了一个激灵。
Yízhèn hánfēng chuīguò，wǒ měng de dǎ le yígè jīlǐng。
I shivered suddenly when a cold wind passed by.
风吹过麦野，掀起了一层层的麦浪。
Fēng chuīguò màiyě，xiānqǐ le yìcéngcéng de màilàng。
When wind blows across the wheat field, the wheat billows in the wind.
他浑身被雨淋透了，寒风一吹就不住地瑟索。
Tā húnshēn bèi yǔ líntòu le，hánfēng yí chuī jiù bú zhù de sèsuǒ。
He was drenched, and couldn\'t help shivering in the cold wind.
被晨风一吹，他感到清醒多了。
Bèi chénfēng yìchuī，tā gǎndào qīngxǐng duō le。
The scent of the morning air made him feel refreshed.
他这人只会自我吹捧，你可别高看了他。
Tā zhè rén zhǐhuì zìwǒ chuīpěng，nǐ kě bié gāokàn le tā。
He just knows how to glorify himself, don\'t overestimate him.
一阵寒风吹来，他不由得打了一个冷颤。
Yízhèn hánfēng chuīlái，tā bùyóudé dǎ le yígè lěngchàn。
A gust of cold wind blows, and he can\'t help shivering.
他不费吹灰之力就通过了考试。
Tā búfèichuīhuīzhīlì jiù tōngguòle kǎoshì。
He got through the exam with very little effort.
冬天里冷风吹过，我的嘴唇裂开了。
Dōngtiānlǐ lĕngfēng chuīguò，wŏ de zuǐchún lièkāi le。
槐树上开满了槐花，一阵风吹来，槐花飘香。
Huáishù shàng kāimǎn le huáihuā，yí zhèn fēng chuīlái，huáihuā piāoxiāng。
The Huaishu is full of Huai blosoms. As a blast of wind blows, the fragrance is sent out.
凉风吹来，我的倦意消除了一半。
Liángfēng chuīlái，wǒ de juànyì xiāochú le yíbàn。
Cool wind blows past, and half of my tiredness is dispelled.
他穿着湿透了的衣服，风一吹，就感到透心凉。
Tā chuān zhe shītòu le de yīfu，fēng yì chuī，jiù gǎndào tòuxīnliáng。
In his soaked clothes, he felt bitterly cold when a blast of wind passed by.
风一吹，门哐当一声就关上了！
Fēng yìchuī，mén kuāngdāng yìshēng jiù guānshàng le！
The door banged shut after a gust of wind.
现在社会上吹喇叭抬轿子的人太多了，风气都被搞坏了。
Xiànzài shèhuìshàng chuī lǎbā tái jiàozi de rén tài duō le，fēngqì dōu bèi gǎohuài le。
So many people flatter each other nowadays that the atmosphere of society has been ruined.
一阵风吹过，木塔上的铃铎发出了叮叮的响声。
Yízhènfēng chuīguò，mùtǎ shàng de língduó fāchū le dīngdīng de xiǎngshēng。
A fit of breeze blows, and the bell on the wood tower tinkles.
迎面吹来一阵冷风，她禁不住打了个寒战。
Yíngmiàn chuī lái yízhèn lěngfēng，tā jīnbuzhù dǎ le gè hánzhàn。
She couldn\'t help shivering in the face of a gust of cold wind.
历经多年的风吹雨打，老树的躯干有些倾侧了。
Lìjīng duōnián de fēngchuī yǔdǎ，lǎoshù de qūgàn yǒuxiē qīngcè le。
The trunk of the old tree is slightly inclined, after being buffered by wind and rain for many years.
司号员的冲锋号一吹响，我们的战士像洪水一般冲向了敌人的阵营。
Sīhàoyuán de chōngfēnghào yì chuīxiǎng，wǒmen de zhànshì xiàng hóngshuǐ yìbān chōng xiàng le dírén de zhènyíng。
The moment the bugler sounded the charge, our soldiers rushed towards the enemy\'s positions like a flood.
买卖要吹了
他们俩吹了
他俩没缘，谈恋爱两年，还是吹了。
恋爱关系告吹了
呼的一声，吹灭了蜡烛。
噗的一口气吹灭了蜡烛
那笔交易又吹灯了
听说她和男朋友吹灯了。
试验吹台了。
吹响了开发大西北的号角。
寒风吹透了衣衫。
狂风把树杈子都吹折(ｓｈé)了
你把我吹嘘得离了谱了
凉风吹来，爽快极了。
出门让风一吹，睡意都给赶跑了。
不费吹灰之力就办成了
门开了一道缝儿，风吹到身上冷丝丝的。
She is through with him.
她和他吹了。
Snow blew in from the north.
Xuě cóng běibiān chuīle jìnlái。
雪从北边吹了进来。
A gust of wind caused the curtains to blow out.
Yí zhèn fēng bǎ chuānglián chuīle qǐlái。
一阵风把窗帘吹了起来。
He played the trumps in sequence.
Tā yīcì chuīle nàxiē lǎba。
他依次吹了那些喇叭。
He talked big all evening.
Tā chuīle yì wǎnshàng niú。
他吹了一晚上牛。
She adjusted the fan so that the airflow was directed right at her.
Tā tiáozhěngle yíxià fēngshàn de fāngxiàng，zhèyàng fēngshàn kěyǐ zhíjiē duìzhe tā chuī le。
她调整了一下风扇的方向，这样风扇可以直接对着她吹了。
A slight breeze stirred my hair, and I blinked dust out of my silver eyes.
Yízhèn qīngfēng chuī luàn le wǒ de tóufa，wǒ zhǎzhǎ yǎnjing，bǎ chuī jìn yǎnjing de chéntǔ zhǎ chūlái。
一阵清风吹乱了我的头发，我眨眨眼睛，把吹进眼睛的尘土眨出来。
the paper blew away
纸被吹掉了
As I was smoking near the window, the wind blew away all the ash around the room.
我在窗边吸烟时，风吹走了屋子里所有的烟灰。
The smell of the coffee was borne into the house with the wind.
一阵风吹来，把咖啡的香甜吹进了屋子。
Your papers are going to blow away if you\'re not careful.
当心点儿，你的试卷要被吹走了。
The wind dried the wet floor off.
风把湿湿的地板吹干了。
During the night the fence blew down.
在夜里的时候篱笆给吹倒了。
After their boat sank they wound up on a desert island.
他们的船沉没后，他们被风吹到了一个荒无人烟的小岛上。
This windblown scrub pine is over 300 years old.
被风吹斜了的松树已经有三十岁了。
Strong winds felled the road sign.
强风吹倒了这个路标。
The storm with violence knocked over a lot of trees.
猛烈的暴风雨吹倒了很多大树。
The wind caused the trees to bend.
Fēng bǎ shù chuī wān le。
风把树吹弯了。
My gloves had blown away on that windy day.
Wǒ de shǒutào zài guāfēng nàtiān bèi fēng chuī zǒu le。
我的手套在刮风那天被风吹走了。
The kite was carried away by a sudden gust of wind.
Tūrán yí zhèn fēng，bǎ fēngzheng chuīzǒu le。
突然一阵风，把风筝吹走了。
A girl stood on a cliff and the wind tangled her hair.
Yí gè nǚháizǐ zhànzài xuányá biān，bèi fēng chuī luàn le tóufa。
一个女孩子站在悬崖边，被风吹乱了头发。
The wind was beating up the flowers in the garden.
Fēng chuīdòngle huāyuán lǐ de huā。
风吹动了花园里的花。
The willow trees are bending before the wind.
Liǔshù bèi fēng chuīwān le。
柳树被风吹弯了。
There\'s a lot of dust blowing about outside.
Wàimiàn dàliàng de chéntǔ bèi chuīsàn le。
外面大量的尘土被吹散了。
Several trees have been blown down in the area.
Zhège dìqū， yǐ yǒu hǎo jǐ kē shù bèi chuīdǎo le。
这个地区，已有好几颗树被吹倒了。
A cool breeze blew in from the lake.
Húbiān chuīláile yí zhèn liángliáng de wēifēng。
湖边吹来了一阵凉凉的微风。
Pollution was blown into the sea.
Wūrǎnwù bèi chuījìnle dàhǎi。
污染物被吹进了大海。
Strong winds blew the roof off a house.
Giángfēng bǎ wūzi de fángdǐng chuīzǒu le。
强风把屋子的房顶吹走了。
He blew out the candles on the table.
Tā chuīmièle zhuōzi shàng de làzhú。
他吹灭了桌子上的蜡烛。
The icy wind struck through our coats.
Bīnglěng de fēng chuītòule wǒmen de wàitào。
冰冷的风吹透了我们的外套。
The letter blew off the table.
Zhè fēng xìn bèi chuīxiàle zhuōzi。
这封信被吹下了桌子。
He blew out all the candles with a single puff.
Tā yìkǒuqì chuīmièle suǒyǒu làzhú。
他一口气吹灭了所有蜡烛。
The tree was bent almost double by the gust.
Dàshù bèi kuángfēng chuīwān le。
大树被狂风吹弯了。
Trees bent under the fierce winds.
Shù bèi měngliè de fēng chuīwān le。
树被猛烈的风吹弯了。
The ship came up into the wind with all yards aback.
Nà tiáo chuán nìfēng qiánxíng，suǒyǒu de fānhéng dōu bèi chuīwān le。
那条船逆风前行，所有的帆桁都被吹弯了。
The gust of air whiffed away the clouds.
Yízhèn kuángfēng chuīsànle wūyún。
一阵狂风吹散了乌云。
The strong wind tousled my hair.
Kuángfēng chuīluàn le wǒ de tóufa。
狂风吹乱了我的头发。
The wind was winnowing her hair.
Fēng chuī luàn le tā de tóufa。
风吹乱了她的头发。
The wind winnowed the grass.
Fēng chuī zǒule cǎo。
风吹走了草。
I learned how to play the flute as a young child.
Wǒ zài hěn xiǎo de shíhou jiù xuéhuìle chuī chángdí。
我在很小的时候就学会了吹长笛。
A thrilling wind blew off the frozen lake.
Cìgǔ de hánfēng chuīguò jiéle bīng de húpō。

to be blown off course

Zhèjiànshì zhīsuǒyǐ chuīdēng，jiùshì yīnwèi nǐ zǒng zìzuò cōngmíng。
The whole thing was ruined because you always think you are so clever.
听说李霸天已经吹灯拔蜡了，乡亲们心里都很高兴。
Tīngshuō Lǐ Bàtiān yǐjing chuīdēng bálà le，xiāngqīnmen xīnlǐ dōu hěngāoxìng。
Hearing that the despot Li had died, all the villagers were very happy.
这次考试的吹风会昨天刚开完，今天老师会不会带来一些信息呢？
Zhècì kǎoshì de chuīfēnghuì zuótiān gāng kāiwán，jīntiān lǎoshī huìbuhuì dàilái yìxiē xìnxī ne？
We just had a meeting about this exam yesterday, will the teacher bring some more information about it today?
以前吹火筒的功能就类似于现在的鼓风机。
Yǐqián chuī huǒtǒng de gōngnéng jiù lèisìyú xiànzài de gǔfēngjī。
The function of the fire-blower of old times was similar to that of an air-blower now.
现在社会上吹喇叭抬轿子的人太多了，风气都被搞坏了。
Xiànzài shèhuìshàng chuī lǎbā tái jiàozi de rén tài duō le，fēngqì dōu bèi gǎohuài le。
So many people flatter each other nowadays that the atmosphere of society has been ruined.
喜欢吹擂自己的人总是不太招人喜欢的。
Xǐhuān chuīlèi zìjǐ de rén zǒngshì bú tài zhāorén xǐhuan de。
Those who like to boast are always unpopular.
他总是吹牛皮，没人相信他。
Tā zǒngshì chuī niúpí，méirén xiāngxìn tā。
He is always boasting, so no one trusts him.
用吹拍的手段来取悦别人，有时也会碰钉子。
Yòng chuīpāi de shǒuduàn lái qǔyuè biérén，yǒushí yě huì pèng dīngzi。
Flattering others so as to please them doesn\'t always work.
《奇双会》是一出吹腔戏。
《Qíshuānghuì》 shì yìchū chuīqiāngxì。
&quot;Surprising Double Meeting&quot; is blowing tunes style of opera.
他这人爱耍滑，我跟他吹台了。
Tā zhè rén ài shuǎhuá，wǒ gēn tā chuītái le。
He always acts in a slick way, so I ended my relationship with him.
今天晚上有一场吹奏乐演出，我们一起去看看。
Jīntiān wǎnshàng yǒu yìchǎng chuīzòuyuè yǎnchū，wǒmen yìqǐ qù kànkàn。
There is a music performance today, how about going to see it together?
只是点风吹草动，你怎么就大做文章？
Zhǐshì diǎn fēngchuī cǎodòng，nǐ zěnme jiù dàzuò wénzhāng？
Why do you always make a fuss over a trivial things?
股市再吹跌风，她十分紧张。
Gǔshì zài chuī diēfēng，tā shífēn jǐnzhāng。
She is very nervous because stock market prices are likely to fall.
一阵风从窗口吹来，翻动着他摊开的书页。
Yízhènfēng cóng chuāngkǒu chuī lái，fāndòng zhe tā tānkāi de shūyè。
A gust of wind blows from the window, ruffling through the leaves of the book he had left open.
火箭升空时，巨大的反推力吹起好多热浪烟尘。
Huǒjiàn shēngkōng shí，jùdà de fǎntuīlì chuī qǐ hǎo duō rèlàng yānchén。
The enormous reacting force raised a lot of heat and dust when the missile blasted off.
他自称是个方外高人，我却觉得他吹牛。
Tā zìchēng shì gè fāngwài gāorén，wǒ què jué de tā chuīniú。
He calls himself a person outside the boundaries of this earthly world, which I regard as bullshit.
微风吹过，飘来馥馥花香。
Wēifēng chuīguò，piāolái fùfù huāxiāng。
With a breeze gently blowing, I smelled the rich fragrance of flowers.
他这人只会自我吹捧，你可别高看了他。
Tā zhè rén zhǐhuì zìwǒ chuīpěng，nǐ kě bié gāokàn le tā。
He just knows how to glorify himself, don\'t overestimate him.
号兵吹响了紧急集合的哨子。
Hàobīng chuīxiǎng le jǐnjí jíhé de shàozi。
The bugler sounds an emergent rally.
他是当时很红专的人，受到很多人的吹捧。
Tā shì dāngshí hěnhóngzhuān de rén，shòudào hěnduōrén de chuīpěng。
He was both highly skilled and politically aware, earning the praise from many people.
我手里的报纸被风吹得呼啦呼啦地响。
Wǒ shǒulǐ de bàozhǐ bèi fēng chuī de hūlā hūlā de xiǎng。
The newspapers in my hands were blown violently by the wind, and made a loud sound.
他吹胡笳的样子深深的印在我的脑海里。
Tā chuī hújiā de yàngzi shēnshēn de yìnzài wǒ de nǎohǎi lǐ。
The image of his playing Huqie (a type of wind instrument of the Northern Races in ancient China) was engraved in my mind.
槐树上开满了槐花，一阵风吹来，槐花飘香。
Huáishù shàng kāimǎn le huáihuā，yí zhèn fēng chuīlái，huáihuā piāoxiāng。
The Huaishu is full of Huai blosoms. As a blast of wind blows, the fragrance is sent out.
一阵寒风吹过，我猛地打了一个激灵。
Yízhèn hánfēng chuīguò，wǒ měng de dǎ le yígè jīlǐng。
I shivered suddenly when a cold wind passed by.
叫啸着的狂风把一棵大树都吹折了。
Jiàoxiào zhe de kuángfēng bǎ yì kē dàshù dōu chuīshé le。
The roaring wind damaged a big tree.
我军吹响了反攻的进军号。
Wǒ jūn chuīxiǎng le fǎngōng de jìnjūnhào。
The signal for our army to advance sounded.
国家吹响了开发西部的进军号。
Guójiā chuīxiǎng le kāifā xībù de jìnjūnhào。
The state is calling for people to develop Western China.
狼狗的警惕性很高，任何风吹草动都躲不过它的眼睛。
Lánggǒu de jǐngtìxìng hěngāo，rènhé fēngchuī cǎodòng dōu duǒbúguò tā de yǎnjīng。
The demi-wolf is very alert - nothing can escape its eyes.
疾风吹劲草，越是困难的环境，我们越要坚持。
Jífēng chuī jìncǎo，yuèshì kùnnan de huánjìng，wǒmen yuèyào jiānchí。
Strength of character is tested in a crisis; the harder the environment is, the more determined we are.
风一吹，门哐当一声就关上了！
Fēng yìchuī，mén kuāngdāng yìshēng jiù guānshàng le！
The door banged shut after a gust of wind.
她的长发被海风吹得狂乱飘舞。
Tā de chángfà bèi hǎifēng chuī de kuángluàn piāowǔ。
Her long hair is waving disorderly in the sea wind.
裁员这股冷风吹了有一阵，大家整天都提心吊胆的怕这事落在自己身上。
Cáiyuán zhègǔ lěngfēng chuī le yǒuyízhèn，dàjiā zhěngtiān dōu tíxīn diàodǎn de pà zhèshì luò zài zìjǐ shēnshàng。
The cold wind of staff trimming reduction has been blowing for a while. Everyone is in fear, and afraid it will befall on themselves.
冷冽的寒风吹得路上的行人浑身打颤。
Lěngliè de hánfēng chuī de lùshàng de xíngrén húnshēn dǎzhàn。
The chilly wind makes passers-by shiver all over.
一阵寒风吹来，他不由得打了一个冷颤。
Yízhèn hánfēng chuīlái，tā bùyóudé dǎ le yígè lěngchàn。
A gust of cold wind blows, and he can\'t help shivering.
栗烈寒风，吹的人直发抖。
Lìliè hánfēng，chuī de rén zhí fādǒu。
The chilly wind makes us shiver all over.
凉风吹来，我的倦意消除了一半。
Liángfēng chuīlái，wǒ de juànyì xiāochú le yíbàn。
Cool wind blows past, and half of my tiredness is dispelled.
一阵风吹过，木塔上的铃铎发出了叮叮的响声。
Yízhènfēng chuīguò，mùtǎ shàng de língduó fāchū le dīngdīng de xiǎngshēng。
A fit of breeze blows, and the bell on the wood tower tinkles.
和风吹拂，柳梢摇曳。
Héfēng chuīfú，liǔshāo yáoyè。
Willow branches sway in the breeze.
一阵秋风吹过，落花遍地。
Yízhèn qiūfēng chuīguò，luòhuā biàndì。
The floor is covered with fallen flowers after an autumn wind.
风吹过麦野，掀起了一层层的麦浪。
Fēng chuīguò màiyě，xiānqǐ le yìcéngcéng de màilàng。
When wind blows across the wheat field, the wheat billows in the wind.
这么嫩弱的花蕾怎么能经得起暴风雨的吹打呢？
Zhème nènruò de huālěi zěnme néng jīngdéqǐ bàofēngyǔ de chuīdǎ ne？
How could such a tender bud survive the thunderstorm?
又是春天了，暖风吹绿了树叶和草芽。
Yòu shì chūntiān le，nuǎnfēng chuīlǜ le shùyè hé cǎoyá。
Spring comes again, the warm winds blow the leaves and sprouting grass.
只听啪啦一声，树枝被大风吹折了。
Zhǐtīng pālā yìshēng，shùzhī bèi dàfēng chuīshé le。
With a cracking sound, the branch was snapped off by the severe gale.
劈面吹来的狂风使他睁不开眼睛。
Pīmiàn chuīlái de kuángfēng shǐ tā zhēngbùkāi yǎnjīng。
He couldn\'t open his eyes when the gale was blowing dead against him.
历经多年的风吹雨打，老树的躯干有些倾侧了。
Lìjīng duōnián de fēngchuī yǔdǎ，lǎoshù de qūgàn yǒuxiē qīngcè le。
The trunk of the old tree is slightly inclined, after being buffered by wind and rain for many years.
狂风吹过，老树虬枝在风中乱摇。
Kuángfēng chuīguò，lǎoshù qiúzhī zài fēng zhōng luànyáo。
The twisted branches of the old tree are swaying wildly in the gale.
风太大了，伞骨都被吹折了。
Fēng tài dà le，sǎngǔ dōu bèi chuī shé le。
The wind was too strong. The framework of the umbrella was snapped by it.
他浑身被雨淋透了，寒风一吹就不住地瑟索。
Tā húnshēn bèi yǔ líntòu le，hánfēng yí chuī jiù bú zhù de sèsuǒ。
He was drenched, and couldn\'t help shivering in the cold wind.
顺风吹火的机会你不及时把握，难道偏要逆水行舟？
Shùnfēng chuīhuǒ de jīhuì nǐ bùjíshí bǎwò，nándào piānyào nìshuǐ xíngzhōu？
Why didn\'t you take such a favorable opportunity? Do you really want to go against the current?
司号员的冲锋号一吹响，我们的战士像洪水一般冲向了敌人的阵营。
Sīhàoyuán de chōngfēnghào yì chuīxiǎng，wǒmen de zhànshì xiàng hóngshuǐ yìbān chōng xiàng le dírén de zhènyíng。
The moment the bugler sounded the charge, our soldiers rushed towards the enemy\'s positions like a flood.
他穿着湿透了的衣服，风一吹，就感到透心凉。
Tā chuān zhe shītòu le de yīfu，fēng yì chuī，jiù gǎndào tòuxīnliáng。
In his soaked clothes, he felt bitterly cold when a blast of wind passed by.
温煦的春风吹在脸上感觉真是舒服。
Wēnxù de chūnfēng chuīzài liǎnshàng gǎnjué zhēnshì shūfu。
The mild spring wind gently touches your face.
电线经过常年风吹日晒，消蚀情况十分严重。
Diànxiàn jīngguò chángnián fēngchuī rìshai，xiāoshí qíngkuàng shífēn yánzhòng。
The wires are worn after being exposed to the sun and rain all these years.
他的脸被风吹得胭红的，像个小苹果。
Tā de liǎn bèi fēng chuī de yānhóng de，xiàng gè xiǎopíngguǒ。
His face was blown red by the wind and looked like a small apple.
也不知道是从哪里刮来的贼风，吹得我头疼。
Yě bùzhīdào shì cóng nǎlǐ guālái de zéifēng，chuī de wǒ tóuténg。
The harmful wind that appeared out of nowhere gave me a headache.
90分钟战罢，主哨吹响了比赛结束的哨音。
Jiǔshífēnzhōng zhànbà，zhǔshào chuīxiǎng le bǐsài jiéshù de shàoyīn。
After a 90 minute contest, the referee blew the whistle to end the game.
人们往往不太信任那些喜欢自我吹嘘的人。
rénmen wǎngwǎng bú tài xìnrèn nàxiē xǐhuan zìwǒ chuīxū de rén。

The beauty of nature is the inspiration for his works.

All year round, millions of visitors are drawn to the city for a series of remarkable social and cultural events.
这个城市一年四季都会吸引数百万游客前来参加一系列与众不同的社会和文化活动。
I used to jog all year round.
过去我一年四季都慢跑。

第一季度较去年同期增长了6.2%，高于去年第四季度3.5%的增幅。
Remember that nature\'s bounty can be found all year round.
Qǐng jìzhù，dàzìrán de ēncì yìniánsìjì dōu yǒu。
请记住，大自然的恩赐一年四季都有。
The seasons occur because the spinning Earth is tilted on its axis.

四季是因为地球沿着轴线自转而形成的。
The garden contains many rare trees and shrubs，and is beautiful all year round.
Huāyuán lǐ zhòngzhe xǔduō shífēn xīyǒu de shùzhǒng hé guànmù，yìniánsìjì dōu hěn piàoliang。

A year constitutes a cycle of the seasons.

季碳原子
At the end of the season their leaves are frequently dulled and disfigured by powdery mildew.
Zài zhège jìjié mò yèzi tōngcháng méile guāngzé bìng yīn báifěnbìng ér biàn de chǒulòubùkān。
在这个季节末叶子通常没了光泽并因白粉病而变得丑陋不堪。
I enrolled my son in a junior sports league for the summer.
Wǒ bǎ érzi zhāo rù xiàjì chūzhōng tǐyù liánméng。
我把儿子招入夏季初中体育联盟。
The hats are ideal worn with this season\'s long, buttoned skirts.
Zhèzhǒng màozi yǔ zhège jìjié liúxíng de dài kòu chángshān hěn dāpèi。
这种帽子与这个季节流行的带扣长衫很搭配。
They had a rather substantial winter harvest of oranges.
Tāmen yǒu gè xiāngdāng fùzú de júzi dà fēngshōu de dōngjì。
他们有个相当富足的橘子大丰收的冬季。
There was always a large basket of blueberries at home during the harvest.
Zài shōuhuò jìjié，jiāzhōng zǒngshì yǒu yí dà lánzi de lánméi。
在收获季节，家中总是有一大篮子的蓝莓。
空调销售有很强的季节性，相比之下，彩电就是常销产品了。
They had a rather substantial winter harvest of oranges.
Tāmen yǒu gè xiāngdāng fùzú de júzi dà fēngshōu de dōngjì。
他们有个相当富足的橘子大丰收的冬季。
夏季昼长夜短。
Xiàjì zhòuchángyèduǎn。
In summer the days are long and the nights short.
夏季雨水勤。
Xiàjì yǔshuǐ qín。
Rain is frequent in summer.
炎旱的夏季
yánhàn de xiàjì
a hot and dry summer; a scorching, droughty summer
夏季多雨，七月下旬尤甚。
Xiàjì duō yǔ，qīyuè xiàxún yóushèn。
We have abundant rains in summer, especially in the last ten days of July.
夏季，大家普遍使用空调，耗能巨大。
Xiàjì，dàjiā pǔbiàn shǐyòng kōngtiáo，hàonéng jùdà。
In summer, people all use air conditioners, which consumes plenty of energy.
夏季的草原，草木菁菁，一片繁盛的景象。
Xiàjì de cǎoyuán，cǎomù jīngjīng，yí piàn fánshèng de jǐng xiàng。
The meadow in summer is covered with green grass and looks lush.
夏季清晨的水塘上面时常飘浮着团团的水雾。
Xiàjì qīngchén de shuǐtáng shàngmiàn shícháng piāofú zhe tuántuán de shuǐwù。
Masses of water mist often float by the surface of pools in summer mornings.
这座城市夏季需要销纳大量电量。
Zhèzuò chéngshì xiàjì xūyào xiāonà dàliàng diànliàng。
The city consumes large quantity of electricity in summer.
夏收季节快到了。
Xiàshōu jìjié kuài dào le。
It\'s about time for the summer harvest.
夏秋交接的季节
xiàqiū jiāojiē de jìjié 
when summer is changing into autumn
夏天是西瓜旺季。
Xiàtiān shì xīguā wàngjì。
Summer is the season for watermelons.
夏天是流行病的高发季节。
Xiàtiān shì liúxíngbìng de gāofā jìjié。
Summer has a high incidence of epidemic diseases.
他因病停赛两年后，今年夏季又重出江湖。
进入夏季，蔬菜普遍掉价
夏季是空调旺销季节。
本店有近百种夏季面料，欢迎选购。
春夏秋冬，四季递变。
正是夏收大忙季节。
a suit of summer weight
适合夏季穿的衣服
Last year I had the most amazing Summer Ball of my life.
去年我参加了有生以来最精彩的一次夏季舞会。
The temperature can rise up to thirty-eight degrees Celsius in summer.
夏季气温可能升到38摄氏度。
We were careful to avoid the midday sun during our summer travel.
夏季旅游的时候我们都很小心，避开正午的太阳外出。
He was going to run a summer meet, but came down with food poisoning the night before.
他本应主持一个夏季会议，但却在会议前夜因食物中毒病倒了。
This city has always dry summers.
这个城市的夏季总是很干燥。
in (the) summer
在夏季
The women went to the garden party to display their summer toilet.
妇女参加游园会以展示夏季服装。
The museum is open daily during the summer months.
Bówùguǎn xiàjì měitiān dōu kāifàng。
博物馆夏季每天都开放。
I enrolled my son in a junior sports league for the summer.
Wǒ bǎ érzi zhāo rù xiàjì chūzhōng tǐyù liánméng。
我把儿子招入夏季初中体育联盟。
He was the biggest attraction this summer selling out every concert.
Tā shì zhège xiàjì zuì huǒ de yìrén，měi cì yǎnchū，piào dōu shòuqìng。
他是这个夏季最火的艺人，每次演出，票都售罄。
Throwing balloons filled with water is a popular summer pasttime.
Tóuzhì shuǐqiú shì yì zhǒng hěn liúxíng de xiàjì yúlè huódòng。
投掷水球是一种很流行的夏季娱乐活动。
Yet again it is the summer months that look the most fertile.
Zàizhě xiàjì kàn qǐlái shì zuì féiwò de。
再者夏季看起来是最肥沃的。
Basically we\'re sponsoring a new event which is starting this summer.
Wǒmen zhǔyào shì zài zhǔbàn yí gè zài jīnnián xiàjì kāishǐ de huódòng。
我们主要是在主办一个在今年夏季开始的活动。
Both museums are open on weekdays only in the summer months.
Zhǐyǒu zài xiàjì de gōngzuòrì，zhè liǎng gè bówùguǎn cái kāifàng。
只有在夏季的工作日，这两个博物馆才开放。
Lakes and reservoirs may have to be shut during the summer as increasing pollution.
Zài xiàjì wūrǎn zēngjiā shí，yìxiē húpō hé xùshuǐchí bèipò guānbì。
在夏季污染增加时，一些湖泊和蓄水池被迫关闭。
The release is now planned for the middle of the summer.
Fāxíngqī zhǔnbèi dìng zài xiàjì zhōngqī。
发行期准备定在夏季中期。
Sales for the summer are finally starting to pick up.
Zhège xiàjì de xiāoshòu\'é zuìzhōng kāishǐ huíshēng。
这个夏季的销售额最终开始回升。
Summer temperatures reached an all-time high.
Xiàjì wēndù kōngqián zhī gāo。
夏季温度空前之高。
Our new synthetic fabric breathes and is perfect for summer wear.
Wǒmen de xīn hùnhé xiānwéi tòuqì，shìhézài xiàjì chuān。
我们的新混合纤维透气，适合在夏季穿。
We need extra employees for summer fill-ins.
Wǒmen xūyào éwài de gùyuán tiánbǔ xiàjì de kòngquē。
我们需要额外的雇员填补夏季的空缺。
In the summer the nightlife shifts to the dance clubs.
Yèshēnghuó zài xiàjì zhuǎndàole tiàowǔ Jùlèbù。
夜生活在夏季转到了跳舞俱乐部。
The remaining days of my summer internship are dwindling rapidly.
wǒ de xiàjì shíxí hěnkuài jiùyào jiéshù。
我的夏季实习很快就要结束。
Keep the atmosphere moist and humid throughout the spring and summer.
Zài chūn xià liǎng jì dōu yào bǎochí kōngqì shīrùn。
在春夏两季都要保持空气湿润。
明朝季世，农民起义层出不穷。
Míngcháo jìshì，nóngmín qǐyì céngchūbùqióng。
At the end of the Ming Dynasty, peasant revolts broke out again and again.
马季先生的去世真是出人意外。
Mǎ Jì xiānshēng de qùshì zhēnshì chūrén yìwài。
Mr. Ma ji\'s death was unexpected.
南宋季世。
她在3，000米跑中夺得季军。
Tā zài sānqiānmǐpǎo zhōng duódé jìjūn。
She came third in the 3,000-meter race.
她在这次写作大赛中获得季军。
Tā zài zhècì xiězuò dàsài zhōng huòdé jìjūn.
She came third in this major writing competition.
他拿了季军。
Tā nále jìjūn.
He got third prize.
男篮季军。
The team we will compete with is the champion of last season.
我们的对手是上个赛季的冠军。
Our company will hatch out into Asia this quarter.
Wǒmen gōngsī jiāng yú zhè yí jìdù jìnjūn Yàzhōu。
我们公司将于这一季度进军亚洲。
Two more of last season \'s title-winners will find themselves warming the bench.
Lìng yǒu liǎnggè shàng sàijì de guànjūn huòdézhě jiāng huì zuò lěngbǎndèng。
另有两个上赛季的冠军获得者将会坐冷板凳。
Only once in the previous 11 seasons had the Cup holders fallen at the first hurdle.
在过去11季的比赛中，卫冕冠军只在第一个跨栏处摔倒了一次。
这个季节的江南经常会下弥月的细雨。
Zhège jìjié de jiāngnán jīngcháng huì xià míyuè de xìyǔ。
Drizzle often continues for a whole month south of the lower reaches of the Yangtze River in this season.
The Dutch often skate along the canals in winter.
Hélánrén zài dōngjì jīngcháng shùnzhe hédào huábīng。
荷兰人在冬季经常顺着河道滑冰。
The rain was sheeting down during the monsoon.
Zài yǔjì，jīngcháng xià qīngpéndàyǔ。
在雨季，经常下倾盆大雨。
That blouse is completely out this season.
本季已经不流行这种上衣了。
She was not beautiful and was obviously far beyond the first bloom of womanhood.
Tā bú piàoliang，érqiě hěn míngxiǎn，zǎo yǐjīng guòle huājì shàonǚ de niánlíng。
她不漂亮，而且很明显，早已经过了花季少女的年龄。
This country\'s economy is at the mercy of the monsoon.
Zhège guójiā de jīngjì zài yǔjì zhōng háowúbànfǎ。
这个国家的经济在雨季中毫无办法。
They used to drive the cattle across the open range every spring.
Tāmen céngjīng měi nián chūnjì zài guǎngmào de yuányě shàng fàngmù。
他们曾经每年春季在广袤的原野上放牧。
The Chinese economy expanded 8.9 per cent in the third quarter compared with the year-earlier period.
zhōngguójīngjì zài dìsān jìdù jiào shàngnián tóngqī zēngzhǎng 8.9%。
中国经济在第三季度较上年同期增长8.9%。
Chartered has already pencilled in a loss for this quarter.
běn jìdù，tèxǔ bàndǎotǐ yǐjīng zuòhǎole kuīsǔn de zhǔnbèi。
本季度，特许半导体已经做好了亏损的准备。
Economic activity contracted by 3 per cent in the final quarter of the year.
Jīngjìhuódòng zài dàngnián zuìhòu yí gè jìdù suōjiǎnle bǎifēnzhī sān。
经济活动在当年最后一个季度缩减了百分之三。
The team had a very disappointing winless season.
Zhè zhī qiúduì jīnglìle yí gè shībài de lìngrénshīwàng de sàijì。
这支球队经历了一个失败的令人失望的赛季。
Our team had a disappointing winless season.
我们的队伍经历了一个令人失望的，毫无胜绩的赛季。
季节性工作
jìjiéxìnggōngzuò
seasonal work; seasonal jobs
农活有季节性，必须抢时间。
Nónghuó yǒu jìjiéxìng，bìxū qiǎngshíjiān。
Farm work is seasonal, so we must race against time.
空调销售有很强的季节性，相比之下，彩电就是常销产品了。
这种花的季节性很强。
Seasonal food shortages prevail in some pockets of the country.
季节性食物短缺主要集中在这个国家的小部分地区。
Seasonal items were on special feature in the department store.
Jìjiéxìng chǎnpǐn zài zhèjiā bǎihuòshāngdiàn shì zhòngdiǎn xuānchuán de tèsè shāngpǐn。
季节性产品在这家百货商店是重点宣传的特色商品。
The migrating birds took off for their seasonal flight.
Hòuniǎomen fēile qǐlái，kāishǐle tāmen de jìjiéxìng fēixíng。
候鸟们飞了起来，开始了它们的季节性飞行。
Seasonal adjustments for housing starts must be made in mid-winter.
Fángjià de jìjiéxìng tiáozhěng kěndìng huì zài niándǐ kāishǐ。
房价的季节性调整肯定会在年底开始。
这个季节是禽流感的高发季节。
Zhège jìjié shì qínliúgǎn de gāofā jìjié。
It\'s high season for bird flu.
季节差价
jìjié chājià 
seasonal price differences; seasonal variations in price
秋天是毛织品畅销的季节。
Qiūtiān shì máozhīpǐn chàngxiāo de jìjié。
Autumn is a lively season for the wool market.
春耕大忙季节
chūngēng dàmáng jìjié 
busy spring ploughing season
大忙季节
dàmáng jìjié 
rush (or busy) season
繁忙的收获季节
fánmáng de shōuhuò jìjié
the busy harvest season
初春季节仍有寒意。
Chūchūn jìjié réngyǒu hányì。
It\'s spring but there\'s still a chill in the air.
农忙季节
nóngmángjìjié 
a busy farming season
收获季节
shōuhuò jìjié 
harvest season; harvest time
旅游季节
lǚyóu jìjié 
tourist season
季节性工作
jìjiéxìnggōngzuò
seasonal work; seasonal jobs
夏秋交接的季节
xiàqiū jiāojiē de jìjié 
when summer is changing into autumn
接羔季节
jiēgāo jìjié
lambing season
解冻季节
jiědòngjìjié 
thawing season
麦收季节要派人看场。
Màishōu jìjié yào pài rén kān chǎng。
We should send someone to guard the threshing floor during the wheat harvest season.
农忙季节，人都下地了，村子里显得空荡荡的。
Nóngmángjìjié，rén dōu xiàdì le，cūnzi lǐ xiǎnde kōngdàngdàng de。
In the busy season the village looked deserted when all the peasants had gone to the fields.
农活有季节性，必须抢时间。
Nónghuó yǒu jìjiéxìng，bìxū qiǎngshíjiān。
Farm work is seasonal, so we must race against time.
冬春之交是时令病流行的季节。
Dōngchūn zhī jiāo shì shílìngbìng liúxìng de jìjié。
Seasonal diseases are prevalent when winter is changing into spring.
夏收季节快到了。
Xiàshōu jìjié kuài dào le。
It\'s about time for the summer harvest.
现在正是农忙季节，村里一个闲人也没有。
Xiànzài zhèngshì nóngmángjìjié，cūn lǐ yígè xiánrén yě méiyǒu。
It\'s the busy season for farmers and nobody in the village is idle.
眼下正是秋收大忙季节。
Yǎnxià zhèngshì qiūshōu dàmángjìjié。
We\'re right in the middle of the autumn harvest rush.
每年这个季节，家家都得抢种、保种。
Měinián zhège jìjié，jiājiā dōu děi qiǎngzhòng、bǎozhòng。
During this season every year, all the households in this area go out to plant crops.
在季节的递变中，我们可以体会不同的风景。
Zài jìjié de dìbiàn zhōng，wǒmen kěyǐ tǐhuì bùtóng de fēngjǐng。
We can experience different scenery as the seasons change.
这个季节正是鱼洄游的时候。
Zhège jìjié zhèngshì yú huíyóu de shíhou。
This is the season when fish migrate.
大批的季节工赶往新疆从事摘棉花的工作。
Dàpī de jìjiégōng gǎnwǎng Xīnjiāng cóngshì zhāi miánhuā de gōngzuò。
Many seasonal workers go to Xinjiang to pick cotton.
眼下正是金桂飘香的季节。
Yǎnxià zhèngshì jīnguì piāoxiāng de jìjié。
It is the time when osmanthus flowers bloom.
又到了小麦开镰的季节，农忙即将开始。
Yòu dào le xiǎomài kāilián de jìjié，nóngmáng jíjiāng kāishǐ。
With the coming of the season for reaping wheat, the busy harvest season will start.
每到秋收季节，地主都要到农民家里大肆敛钱。
Měidào qiūshōu jìjié，dìzhǔ dōuyào dào nóngmín jiā lǐ dàsì liǎnqián。
At the arrival of each autumn\'s harvest season, the landowner would collect money from the farmers without restraint.
由于季节的变化，我公司的零售额有所下降。
Yóuyú jìjié de biànhuà，wǒ gōngsī de língshòué yǒusuǒ xiàjiàng。
The retail sales of our company are down due to the change of seasons.
这个季节的江南经常会下弥月的细雨。
Zhège jìjié de jiāngnán jīngcháng huì xià míyuè de xìyǔ。
Drizzle often continues for a whole month south of the lower reaches of the Yangtze River in this season.
又到了木莲树开花的季节，我特别喜欢这种花。
Yòu dào le mùliánshù kāihuā de jìjié，wǒ tèbié xǐhuan zhèzhǒng huā。
It is the season for the climbing fig to blossom. I like that flower very much.
又到了攀枝花盛开的季节，远远望去片片火红。
Yòudào le pānzhīhuā shèngkāi de jìjié，yuǎnyuǎn wàngqù piànpiàn huǒhóng。
Since he strained his foot when he was playing basketball, it\'s been hard for him to move a few steps.
最近是流行病高发季节，公共场所应该适当泼洒些消毒水。
Zuìjìn shì liúxíngbìng gāofā jìjié，gōnggòng chǎngsuǒ yīnggāi shìdàng pōsǎ xiē xiāodúshuǐ。
It\'s the season when epidemics happen frequently, so we should sprinkle some disinfectant in public
又到了秋种的季节，农民们在地里忙活不停。
Yòu dào le qiūzhòng de jìjié，nóngmínmenzàidì lǐ mánghuó bùtíng。
Autumn is a time to sow, and farmers are busy working in the fields.
在干燥的季节里，我每天都要抹一些润肤膏。
Zài gānzào de jìjié lǐ，wǒ měitiān dōuyào mǒ yìxiē rùnfūgāo。
In dry seasons, I would apply some moisture cream every day.
现在这个季节正是小麦生长的盛期。
Xiànzài zhège jìjié zhèngshì xiǎomài shēngzhǎng de shèngqī。
Now is the peak season for wheat.
时序循环自有定律，我们也应该应时而动，随季节变化而调整自己的生活起居。
Shíxù xúnhuán zìyǒu dìnglǜ，wǒmen yě yīnggāi yìngshí ér dòng，suí jìjié biànhuà ér tiáozhěng zìjǐ de shēnghuó qǐjū。
There are rules for the alternation of seasons, and we should adjust our living habits according to them.
下个月就是桐子开花的季节了。
Xià gè yuè jiùshì tóngzǐ kāihuā de jìjié le。
The paulownia will blossom next month.
时间过得真快，一转眼又到晚春季节了！
Shíjiān guò de zhēn kuài，yìzhuǎnyǎn yòu dào wǎnchūn jìjié le！
How time flies! Late spring has come in the twinkling of an eye.
夏天是流行病的高发季节。
Xiàtiān shì liúxíngbìng de gāofā jìjié。
Summer has a high incidence of epidemic diseases.
养生书籍上讲，人应该多吃时菜，少吃反季节食品。
Yǎngshēng shūjí shàng jiǎng，rén yīnggāi duō chī shícài，shǎo chī fǎnjìjié shípǐn。
Regimen books say that people should eat more seasonal vegetables and avoid unseasonal food.
冬季是牲畜保膘的关键时节。
Dōngjì shì shēngchù bǎobiāo de guānjiàn shíjié。
Winter is the best season for livestock to put on weight.
一年最冷的季节自然是冬季。
空调销售有很强的季节性，相比之下，彩电就是常销产品了。
这个季节，要特别防止羊群掉膘。
流感多发季节。
反季节蔬菜。
流感高发季节。
冬季需要大批烧锅炉的季节工。

昨天公布的能源巨头第三季度业绩显示巨亏高达5000万美金，这不免令人大失所望。
Our company will hatch out into Asia this quarter.
Wǒmen gōngsī jiāng yú zhè yí jìdù jìnjūn Yàzhōu。
我们公司将于这一季度进军亚洲。
A new chair lift is presently under construction to be ready for next season.
Yí gè xīn de shēngjiàngyǐ mùqián zhèngzài jiànzào zhōng，yǐ gōng xià gè jìdù shǐyòng。
一个新的升降椅目前正在建造中，以供下个季度使用。
Our sales have slipped from the previous quarter.
Wǒmen de xiāoshòuliàng dīyú shàng gè jìdù。
我们的销售量低于上个季度。
Unemployment fell during the last quarter.
Shàng gè jìdù de shīyèlǜ yǒusuǒxiàjiàng。
上个季度的失业率有所下降。
They were playing better at the close of the season.
Zài zhège jìdù jiéshù shí，tāmen dǎ de hǎoxiē le。
在这个季度结束时，他们打得好些了。
Both teams scored in the first quarter.
Liǎng gè duì zài dì-yī jìdù dōu yǒu défēn。
两个队在第一季度都有得分。
Cabbage patch dolls were hot last season.
Shàng gè jìdù yēcài wáwa fēicháng liúxíng huǒbào。
上个季度椰菜娃娃非常流行火爆。
Interest is compounded quarterly.
Àn jìdù lái jìsuàn fùlì。
按季度来计算复利。
A year constitutes a cycle of the seasons.
Yì nián yóu zhōuqī xúnhuán de sì gè jìdù zǔchéng。
一年由周期循环的四个季度组成。
A declining dollar pulled down the export figures for the last quarter.
Búduàn zǒudī de měiyuán lādīle shàng yí gè jìdù de chūkǒu shùjù。
不断走低的美元拉低了上一个季度的出口数据。
Production was up in the second quarter.

第二季度的产量有所增加。
He had more than 100 RBI last season.
Tā shànggè jìdù yǒu chāoguò yìbǎi cì pǎolěi défēn。
他上个季度有超过100次跑垒得分。
The Chinese economy expanded 8.9 per cent in the third quarter compared with the year-earlier period.

中国经济在第三季度较上年同期增长8.9%。
Quarterly reporting is already the norm on the mainland.

在中国内地，季度业绩报告已成为标准。
Chartered has already pencilled in a loss for this quarter.
běn jìdù，tèxǔ bàndǎotǐ yǐjīng zuòhǎole kuīsǔn de zhǔnbèi。
本季度，特许半导体已经做好了亏损的准备。
Summer temperatures reached an all-time high.
Xiàjì wēndù kōngqián zhī gāo。
夏季温度空前之高。
The tyres generally wore well and would have lasted out the season with no trouble.
Zǒngtǐ lái shuō，zhèzhǒng lúntāi búcuò，yīnggāi néng ānquán dùguò zhège sàijì bùchū wèntí。
总体来说，这种轮胎不错，应该能安全度过这个赛季不出问题。
Ana had a sweet sixteen.
安娜度过了十六岁花季的生日。
During the winter in Scandinavia, temperatures fall to 30 degrees below zero.
在冬季，斯堪的纳维亚的温度会降到零下30度。
The temperature can rise up to thirty-eight degrees Celsius in summer.
夏季气温可能升到38摄氏度。
The flowers come together with colour and intensity as the season develops.
Suízhe jìjié de biànhuà，huā de yánsè yǔ nóngdù yě zài fāshēng biànhuà。
随着季节的变化，花的颜色与浓度也在发生变化。
昆明四季如春。
Kūnmíng sìjìrúchūn。
In Kunming it\'s like spring all the year round.
昆明的气候四季如春，所以有“春城”之称。
Kūnmíng de qìhou sìjì rúchūn，suǒyǐ yǒu“chūnchéng”zhī chēng。
It feels like spring all four seasons in Kunming, so the city has the nickname &quot;City of Perpetual Spring&quot;.
初春季节仍有寒意。
Chūchūn jìjié réngyǒu hányì。
It\'s spring but there\'s still a chill in the air.
进入春季，要做好农田的保墒保苗工作。
Jìnrù chūnjì，yào zuò hǎo nóngtián de bǎoshāng bǎomiáo gōngzuò。
In the coming spring, it is extremely important to keep the moisture content in farmland up to a certain level, to ensure the growth of crops.
春季服装登市了。
Chūnjì fúzhuāng dēngshì le。
Spring clothes are coming onto the market now.
时间过得真快，一转眼又到晚春季节了！
Shíjiān guò de zhēn kuài，yìzhuǎnyǎn yòu dào wǎnchūn jìjié le！
How time flies! Late spring has come in the twinkling of an eye.

jìdù bàogào 
a quarterly report
我这份报纸是按季度订的。

他们在收获季节出卖劳动力，通常只获得很低的报酬。
争取做到蔬菜淡季不淡，旺季不烂
Zhēngqǔ zuòdào shūcài dànjì bú dàn, wàngjì bú làn。 
strive for an ample supply of vegetables in the off seasons and avoid waste in the peak periods
由种一季改为种两季
yóu zhòngyí jì gǎi wéi zhòngliǎngjì
reap two crops a year instead of one
过去这里的水田多只种一季，现在全部种两季。
Guòqù zhèlǐ de shuǐtián duō zhǐ zhòngyí jì，xiànzài quánbùzhòngliǎngjì。
Most paddy fields here used to yield only one crop a year, but now they all yield two crops.
这个季节是禽流感的高发季节。

dàmáng jìjié

四季的循环
sìjì de xúnhuán
the cycle of the seasons
炎旱的夏季
yánhàn de xiàjì
a hot and dry summer; a scorching, droughty summer

Yǎnxià zhèngshì qiūshōu dàmángjìjié。
We\'re right in the middle of the autumn harvest rush.
雨季已过。
Yǔjì yǐ guò。
The rainy season is over.
夏季多雨，七月下旬尤甚。
Xiàjì duō yǔ，qīyuè xiàxún yóushèn。
We have abundant rains in summer, especially in the last ten days of July.
我们这里一年种两季稻子。
Wǒmen zhèlǐ yìnián zhòngliǎngjì dàozi。
We grow two crops of rice a year here.
四季更迭，周而复始。
Sìjì gēngdié，zhōu\'érfùshǐ。
The seasons of the year make a cycle. When one cycle is completed, another begins.
淡季
dànjì
slack (or dull, off) season
旱季
hànjì
dry season
四季
sìjì
the four seasons
蝴蝶从来熬不过严寒的冬季。
Húdié cónglái áo búguò yánhán de dōngjì。
Butterflies never make it through a cold winter.
白头鹎不耐寒，因此在北方进入冬季都要室内饲养。
Báitóupí búnàihán，yīncǐ zài běifāng jìnrù dōngjì dōuyào shìnèi sìyǎng。
The light-vented bulbul is not cold-resistant, so in the north, when winter arrives, it should be reared in-house to protect it from the cold.
冬季是牲畜保膘的关键时节。
Dōngjì shì shēngchù bǎobiāo de guānjiàn shíjié。
Winter is the best season for livestock to put on weight.
进入春季，要做好农田的保墒保苗工作。
Jìnrù chūnjì，yào zuò hǎo nóngtián de bǎoshāng bǎomiáo gōngzuò。
In the coming spring, it is extremely important to keep the moisture content in farmland up to a certain level, to ensure the growth of crops.
每年这个季节，家家都得抢种、保种。
Měinián zhège jìjié，jiājiā dōu děi qiǎngzhòng、bǎozhòng。
During this season every year, all the households in this area go out to plant crops.
为了冬季的货物运输，他们开辟了冰道。
Wèile dōngjì de huòwù yùnshū，tāmen kāipì le bīngdào。
They opened up an ice passage for the transportation of goods in Winter.
马季先生的去世真是出人意外。
Mǎ Jì xiānshēng de qùshì zhēnshì chūrén yìwài。
Mr. Ma ji\'s death was unexpected.
本季度的财政收入大幅增加。
Běnjìdù de cáizhèng shōurù dàfú zēngjiā。
Revenues increased sharply this quarter.
春季服装登市了。
Chūnjì fúzhuāng dēngshì le。
Spring clothes are coming onto the market now.
这个国家处于低纬度，四季气温都很高。
Zhège guójiā chǔyú dī wěidù，sìjì qìwēn dōu hěngāo。
This country is located between 0 and 30 degrees longitude, where the temperature is high all the year round.
在季节的递变中，我们可以体会不同的风景。
Zài jìjié de dìbiàn zhōng，wǒmen kěyǐ tǐhuì bùtóng de fēngjǐng。
We can experience different scenery as the seasons change.
即使在冬季，我们也可以吃到新鲜的洞子菜。
Jíshǐ zài dōngjì，wǒmen yě kěyǐ chī dào xīnxiān de dòngzicài。
Even in winter, fresh vegetables are still available because we can plant them in greenhouses.
由于营销策略的改变，第三季度的销售额陡增。
Yóuyú yíngxiāo cèlüè de gǎibiàn，dìsān jìdù de xiāoshòu\'é dǒuzēng。
The sales volume in the third quarter skyrocketed, which should be attributed to the change in marketing strategy.
漫天的飞雪，妆扮着冬季的美丽。
Màntiān de fēixuě，zhuāngbànzhe dōngjì de měilì。
The flying snow adds more charm to winter.
山河风月四季美景都是他创作灵感的源泉。
Shānhé fēngyuè sìjì měijǐng dōushì tā chuàngzuò línggǎn de yuánquán。
The beauty of nature is the inspiration for his works.
季羡林先生是有名的国学大师。
Jì Xiànlín xiānshēng shì yǒumíng de guóxué dàshī。
Mr. Ji Xianlin is a famous master of Chinese culture.
夏季，大家普遍使用空调，耗能巨大。
Xiàjì，dàjiā pǔbiàn shǐyòng kōngtiáo，hàonéng jùdà。
In summer, people all use air conditioners, which consumes plenty of energy.
雨季前夕，我们要加固河坝。
Yǔjì qiánxī，wǒmen yào jiāgù hébà。
We should reinforce the river embankment before the wet season.
这个季节正是鱼洄游的时候。
Zhège jìjié zhèngshì yú huíyóu de shíhou。
This is the season when fish migrate.
胃病患者的秋季饮食应忌嘴保养。
Wèibìng huànzhě de qiūjì yǐnshí yīng jìzuǐ bǎoyǎng。
People with stomach illnesses should avoid certain foods in autumn.
大批的季节工赶往新疆从事摘棉花的工作。
Dàpī de jìjiégōng gǎnwǎng Xīnjiāng cóngshì zhāi miánhuā de gōngzuò。
Many seasonal workers go to Xinjiang to pick cotton.
明朝季世，农民起义层出不穷。
Míngcháo jìshì，nóngmín qǐyì céngchūbùqióng。
At the end of the Ming Dynasty, peasant revolts broke out again and again.
眼下正是金桂飘香的季节。
Yǎnxià zhèngshì jīnguì piāoxiāng de jìjié。
It is the time when osmanthus flowers bloom.
夏季的草原，草木菁菁，一片繁盛的景象。
Xiàjì de cǎoyuán，cǎomù jīngjīng，yí piàn fánshèng de jǐng xiàng。
The meadow in summer is covered with green grass and looks lush.
最近一段时间，各商家都在竞销反季商品。
Zuìjìn yíduàn shíjiān，gè shāngjiā dōu zài jìngxiāo fǎnjì shāngpǐn。
Many dealers have been competing with each other recently to sell seasonal products.
又到了小麦开镰的季节，农忙即将开始。
Yòu dào le xiǎomài kāilián de jìjié，nóngmáng jíjiāng kāishǐ。
With the coming of the season for reaping wheat, the busy harvest season will start.
每到秋收季节，地主都要到农民家里大肆敛钱。
Měidào qiūshōu jìjié，dìzhǔ dōuyào dào nóngmín jiā lǐ dàsì liǎnqián。
At the arrival of each autumn\'s harvest season, the landowner would collect money from the farmers without restraint.
由于季节的变化，我公司的零售额有所下降。
Yóuyú jìjié de biànhuà，wǒ gōngsī de língshòué yǒusuǒ xiàjiàng。
The retail sales of our company are down due to the change of seasons.
下个月就是麦季了，我要回家收割麦子。
Xià gè yuè jiùshì màijì le，wǒ yào huíjiā shōugē màizi。
The wheat harvest season will come next month, and I will go home to reap wheat.
马上就要到忙季了，我们需要更多的人手。
Mǎshàng jiùyào dào mángjì le，wǒmen xūyào gèngduō de rénshǒu。
The busy season is coming, so we need more hands.
这个季节的江南经常会下弥月的细雨。
Zhège jìjié de jiāngnán jīngcháng huì xià míyuè de xìyǔ。
Drizzle often continues for a whole month south of the lower reaches of the Yangtze River in this season.
又到了木莲树开花的季节，我特别喜欢这种花。
Yòu dào le mùliánshù kāihuā de jìjié，wǒ tèbié xǐhuan zhèzhǒng huā。
It is the season for the climbing fig to blossom. I like that flower very much.
坐在狗拉的扒犁上在雪地里滑行，是北方冬季里最有趣的运动。
Zuòzài gǒulā de pálí shàng zài xuědì lǐ huáxíng，shì běifāng dōngjì lǐ zuì yǒuqù de yùndòng。
Sleighing over the snow is the most interesting sport in the north in winter.
又到了攀枝花盛开的季节，远远望去片片火红。
Yòudào le pānzhīhuā shèngkāi de jìjié，yuǎnyuǎn wàngqù piànpiàn huǒhóng。
Since he strained his foot when he was playing basketball, it\'s been hard for him to move a few steps.
最近是流行病高发季节，公共场所应该适当泼洒些消毒水。
Zuìjìn shì liúxíngbìng gāofā jìjié，gōnggòng chǎngsuǒ yīnggāi shìdàng pōsǎ xiē xiāodúshuǐ。
It\'s the season when epidemics happen frequently, so we should sprinkle some disinfectant in public
又到了秋种的季节，农民们在地里忙活不停。
Yòu dào le qiūzhòng de jìjié，nóngmínmenzàidì lǐ mánghuó bùtíng。
Autumn is a time to sow, and farmers are busy working in the fields.
高山滑雪是我们这里开展冬季旅游的拳头项目。
Gāoshān huáxuě shì wǒmen zhèlǐ kāizhǎn dōngjì lǚyóu de quántóu xiàng mù。
Alpine skiing is the key item of business for us to develop winter tourism.
在干燥的季节里，我每天都要抹一些润肤膏。
Zài gānzào de jìjié lǐ，wǒ měitiān dōuyào mǒ yìxiē rùnfūgāo。
In dry seasons, I would apply some moisture cream every day.
现在这个季节正是小麦生长的盛期。
Xiànzài zhège jìjié zhèngshì xiǎomài shēngzhǎng de shèngqī。
Now is the peak season for wheat.
时序循环自有定律，我们也应该应时而动，随季节变化而调整自己的生活起居。
Shíxù xúnhuán zìyǒu dìnglǜ，wǒmen yě yīnggāi yìngshí ér dòng，suí jìjié biànhuà ér tiáozhěng zìjǐ de shēnghuó qǐjū。
There are rules for the alternation of seasons, and we should adjust our living habits according to them.
秋季食补适宜多吃些梨。
Qiūjì shíbǔ shìyí duō chī xiē lí。
It\'s appropriate to eat more pears in autumn to supplement nutrition.
冬季供暖的标准是：室温不得低于16度。
Dōngjì gōngnuǎn de biāozhǔn shì：shìwēn bùdé dīyú shíliùdù。
The standard for heating in winter: the room temperature should not be lower than 16 degrees centigrade.
今年首季的营业额比去年同期高了两个百分点。
Jīnnián shǒujì de yíngyèé bǐ qùnián tóngqī gāo le liǎnggè bǎifēndiǎn。
The turnover in the first quarter of the year was 2% higher than that of the same period last year.
夏季清晨的水塘上面时常飘浮着团团的水雾。
Xiàjì qīngchén de shuǐtáng shàngmiàn shícháng piāofú zhe tuántuán de shuǐwù。
Masses of water mist often float by the surface of pools in summer mornings.
昆明的气候四季如春，所以有“春城”之称。
Kūnmíng de qìhou sìjì rúchūn，suǒyǐ yǒu“chūnchéng”zhī chēng。
It feels like spring all four seasons in Kunming, so the city has the nickname &quot;City of Perpetual Spring&quot;.
下个月就是桐子开花的季节了。
Xià gè yuè jiùshì tóngzǐ kāihuā de jìjié le。
The paulownia will blossom next month.
每逢雨季，村里的土坑就成了泥潭。
Měiféng yǔjì，cūnlǐ de tǔkēng jiù chéng le nítán。
The pits in the earth of the village turn to mud puddles in every rainy season.
时间过得真快，一转眼又到晚春季节了！
Shíjiān guò de zhēn kuài，yìzhuǎnyǎn yòu dào wǎnchūn jìjié le！
How time flies! Late spring has come in the twinkling of an eye.
这间老宅子一年四季都是温湿的。
Zhè jiān lǎozháizi yìnián sìjì dōushì wēnshī de。
It is wild, and humid all year around in this old house.
四季豆现在还没下市，我逛了几天都没买到。
Sìjìdòu xiànzài hái méi xiàshì，wǒ guàng le jǐtiān dōu méi mǎidào。
Kidney beans didn\'t go out of season yet, but I wasn\'t able to buy it several times.
这座城市夏季需要销纳大量电量。
Zhèzuò chéngshì xiàjì xūyào xiāonà dàliàng diànliàng。
The city consumes large quantity of electricity in summer.
例会将在下季度续会，你们还有什么意见吗？
Lìhuì jiāngzài xià jìdù xùhuì，nǐmen háiyǒu shénme yìjiàn ma？
The regular meeting will take place the next quater, any questions?
植物必须应季栽种，否则肯定无法获得丰收。
Zhíwù bìxū yīngjì zāizhòng，fǒuzé kěndìng wúfǎ huòdé fēngshōu。
We should plant in accordance with the season, or else we can\'t have a good harvest.
现在是旅游旺季，游厗上挤满了游人。
Xiànzài shì lǚyóu wàngjì，yóutí shàng jǐmǎn le yóurén。
Now is the busy tourist season, and the pleasure-boat is crowded with tourists.
每当榨季到来，糖厂就忙起来。
Měidāng zhàjì dàolái，tángchǎng jiù máng qǐlái。
Every time during the sugar production season, the sugar factory would be very busy.
那个地区主要以季风气候为主要气候类型。
Nàge dìqū zhǔyào yǐ jìfēng qìhou wéi zhǔyào qìhou lèixíng。
The main climate type in that region is monsoon.
夏天是流行病的高发季节。
Xiàtiān shì liúxíngbìng de gāofā jìjié。
Summer has a high incidence of epidemic diseases.
养生书籍上讲，人应该多吃时菜，少吃反季节食品。
Yǎngshēng shūjí shàng jiǎng，rén yīnggāi duō chī shícài，shǎo chī fǎnjìjié shípǐn。
Regimen books say that people should eat more seasonal vegetables and avoid unseasonal food.

when enemies come face to face, their eyes blaze with hate
听说他的仇人要出狱了，他整天惊魂不定。

He is frightened at the news that his enemy is being released from jail.
听说仇人要回来了，他犹如芒刺在背，坐卧不宁。

Having heard that his enemy was going home, he felt uneasy and nervous, and became very fidgety.
为了向杀父仇人进行报复，他一直忍辱偷生。
Wèile xiàng shāfù chóurén jìnxíng bàofù，tā yìzhí rěnrǔ tōushēng。
In order to take revenge on the enemy who killed his father, he has been enduring humiliation in order to survive.
他咬牙切齿地说出仇人的名字，吓我们一跳。
Tā yǎoyá qièchǐ de shuōchū chóurén de míngzi，xià wǒmen yítiào。
He spoke out his enemy\'s name between clinched teeth, which gives us a fright.
真是冤家路窄，这两个仇人居然碰到了一起。
Zhēnshi yuānjiā lùzhǎi，zhè liǎnggè chóurén jūrán pèngdào le yìqǐ。
Just as the old saying,&quot;Enemies are bound to meet on a narrow road&quot;, what a coincidence it is these two foes came aross each other.
他是个嫉恶如仇的人。
Tā shì gè jí\'èrúchóu de rén。
要做一个不计个人恩仇得失的人很难。
Yào zuò yígè bú jì gèrén ēnchóu déshī de rén hěn nán。
It is hard for people to care nothing about kindness and hatred.
你必须除掉心头的仇恨，原谅别人就是原谅自己。
Nǐ bìxū chúdiào xīntóu de chóuhèn，yuánliàng biérén jiùshì yuánliàng zìjǐ。
You must release the hatred in your heart. To forgive others is to forgive yourself.
仇人相见，分外眼红
仇人相见，分外眼红。
这两个人有仇
对敌人有彻骨仇恨
仇恨为非作歹的人
这个人心胸狭窄，好记仇。
The two enemies finally confronted each other.
Zhè liǎng jiā chóurén zuìhòu zhōngyú pèngmiàn le。
这两家仇人最后终于碰面了。
A vindictive man will look for occasions for resentment.
Chōngmǎn fùchóu xīn de rén huì xúnzhǎo fāxiè fènhèn de jīhuì。
充满复仇心的人会寻找发泄愤恨的机会。
There are a few things as sweet as revenge.
几乎没有什么事情可以像复仇一样，让人感觉如此畅快。
The ostentatious way of living of the rich ignites the hatred of the poor.
Fùrén xuànyào de shēnghuó fāngshì jīqǐle qióngrén de chóuhèn。
富人炫耀的生活方式激起了穷人的仇恨。
With their help, she exacts revenge on her tormentors in a spectacular way.
Zài tāmen de bāngzhù xià，tā yǐ yì zhǒng jīngrén de fāngshì xiàng zhémó guò tā de rén bàole chóu。
在他们的帮助下，她以一种惊人的方式向折磨过她的人报了仇。
Excessive partriotism might lead to xenophobia
过度的爱国主义可能导致仇视一切外国人。
Marie felt herself caught up in the intensity of the old woman\'s hatred.
Mǎlì juéde zìjǐ xiànrùle lǎo fùrén de qiángliè chóuhèn zhīzhōng。

Wǒ gēn tā fēiqīnfēigù，gēn nǐ yě wúyuānwúchóu，wǒ bùpiān xiàng nǎgè，zhǐ shuō jǐ jù liángxīnhuà。
He\'s not my relative, and you are not my enemy. I don\'t favour either one of you. I only want to say a few honest words.

fùchóu xīnlǐ
vindictiveness; a desire for revenge
他发誓要复仇。
Tā fāshì yào fùchóu。
He vowed to avenge himself.
他的绝对公正和疾恶如仇赢得了群众的信任和拥护。

他可不记仇。

他们去年赢了我们，这回我们以二比一击败他们，报了一箭之仇。

他是个嫉恶如仇的人。
Tā shì gè jí\'èrúchóu de rén。
昔日的队友如今反目成仇，兵戎相见。
Xīrì de duìyǒu rújīn fǎnmù chéngchóu，bīngróng xiāngjiàn。
The former teammates now became enemies and had to fight against each other.
把仇雠变为朋友，这该多好啊。
Bǎ chóuchóu biànwéi péngyou，zhè gāi duōhǎo a。
It is great to change foe to friend.
媚外与仇外都是不可取的。
Mèiwài yǔ chóuwài dōushì bùkěqǔ de。
One shouldn\'t blindly worship foreign things, or be xenophobic.
如果心中的仇怨太多，怎么可能生活得开心呢。
Rúguǒ xīn zhōng de chóuyuàn tài duō，zěnme kěnéng shēnghuó de kāixīn ne。
You can not live a happy life if you carry much hatred.
你必须除掉心头的仇恨，原谅别人就是原谅自己。
Nǐ bìxū chúdiào xīntóu de chóuhèn，yuánliàng biérén jiùshì yuánliàng zìjǐ。
You must release the hatred in your heart. To forgive others is to forgive yourself.

Wǒmen yào quánmín tuánjié，díkài tóngchóu。
We should unite and share a bitter hatred of the enemy.
要做一个不计个人恩仇得失的人很难。
Yào zuò yígè bú jì gèrén ēnchóu déshī de rén hěn nán。
It is hard for people to care nothing about kindness and hatred.
亲戚朋友之间因为金钱而反目成仇的事儿还少吗？
Qīnqi péngyou zhījiān yīnwèi jīnqián ér fǎnmù chéngchóu de shì\'ér hái shǎo ma?
There are too many cases in which family members and friends quarrel with each other and become enemies, aren\'t there?
战士们同仇敌忾，英勇赴敌。
Zhànshìmen tóngchóu díkài，yīngyǒng fùdí。
Sharing a bitter hatred for the enemy, soldiers fight against them with great bravery.
《长歌行》（陆游）：“国仇未报壮士老，匣中宝剑夜有声”。
《Chánggēxíng》（Lù Yóu）：“Guóchóu wèibào zhuàngshìlǎo，xiázhōng bǎojiàn yèyǒushēng”。
Luyou wrote in the A Long Song: &quot;The warrior\'s too old to avenge the disgrace of his nation,\nas the sword at night vainly voices its ambition.&quot;
他具有正义感，一向嫉恶如仇。
Tā jùyǒu zhèngyìgǎn，yí xiàng jí\'èrúchóu。
He is a very upright man, abhorring evil as a deadly foe.
听说他的仇人要出狱了，他整天惊魂不定。
Tīngshuō tā de chóurén yào chūyù le，tā zhěngtiān jīnghún búdìng。
He is frightened at the news that his enemy is being released from jail.
他一副苦大仇深的样子，好象谁都欠了他的钱似的。
Tā yífù kǔdà chóushēn de yàngzi，hǎo xiàng shéi dōu qian le tā de qián sì de。
It seems that he suffers bitterly and nurses deep hatred, believing everybody owes him.
我们的仇恨不共戴天，我与你势不两立。
Wǒmen de chóuhèn búgòng dàitiān，wǒ yǔ nǐ shìbùliǎnglì。
Our hatred for each other is absolutely irreconcilable. You and I are at daggers drawn.
听说仇人要回来了，他犹如芒刺在背，坐卧不宁。
Tīngshuō chóurén yào huílái le，tā yóurú mángcì zàibèi，zuòwò bùníng。
Having heard that his enemy was going home, he felt uneasy and nervous, and became very fidgety.
这切骨之仇，我永生难忘。
Zhè qiēgǔ zhī chóu，wǒ yǒngshēng nánwàng。
This is deep hatred, I will never forget it in my whole life.
他向来疾恶如仇、去恶务尽。
Tā xiàng lái jíè rúchóu、qùè wùjìn。
He always has a strong hatred of evil practices and he hopes to do away with evil completely.
为了向杀父仇人进行报复，他一直忍辱偷生。
Wèile xiàng shāfù chóurén jìnxíng bàofù，tā yìzhí rěnrǔ tōushēng。
In order to take revenge on the enemy who killed his father, he has been enduring humiliation in order to survive.
他下定决心要为父亲伸冤报仇。
Tā xiàdìng juéxīn yào wéi fùqīn shēnyuānbàochóu。
He decided to redress and revenge the injustice on his father.
他俩结仇的原委说来话长了，有时间我跟你慢慢道来。
Tā liǎ jiéchóu de yuánwěi shuōlái huàcháng le，yǒu shíjiān wǒ gēn nǐ mànmàn dàolái。
Why they became enemies is a long story, I\'ll tell you when there is time.
他说杀父血仇一定要报，只是现在还不是时候。
Tā shuō shāfù xuèchóu yídìng yào bào，zhǐshì xiànzài hái búshì shíhou。
He said that he would definitely take revenge on the person who killed his father; it\'s just not the right time yet.
他咬牙切齿地说出仇人的名字，吓我们一跳。
Tā yǎoyá qièchǐ de shuōchū chóurén de míngzi，xià wǒmen yítiào。

他们去年赢了我们，这回我们以二比一击败他们，报了一箭之仇。
